translated_text: しかし,上記のカジノはほとんどすべて飲み物を提供しており,そのうちのいくつかはブランドのエンターテインメントをもたらします (主にアルベックルクとサンタフェ周辺の大きなカジノ).

original_text: Beware: small-town bars here are not always good places for the out-of-state visitor to hang out.
translated_text: 小町のバーは 外国の訪問者のためにいつも良い場所ではありません.

original_text: For one thing, northern New Mexico has significant problems with drunk driving, and the concentration of intoxicated drivers is high close to small-town bars.
translated_text: 一つは ニューメキシコ北部には 酔っぱらった運転の問題があり 酔っぱらった運転手の濃度は 小町のバーの近くにあります

original_text: Unwanted murals or scribble is known as graffiti.
translated_text: 不必要な壁画はグラフィティと呼ばれます

original_text: While it's far from a modern phenomenon, most people probably associate it with youth vandalizing public and private property using spray paint.
translated_text: 近代的な現象とは程遠いですが ほとんどの人は スプレーペイントを使って 公共と私有財産を 破壊する若者と 関連付けています

original_text: However, nowadays there are established graffiti artists, graffiti events and "legal" walls. Graffiti paintings in this context often resemble artworks rather than illegible tags.
translated_text: しかし,現在,グラフィティ芸術家,グラフィティイベント,そして"法的"壁が確立されています.この文脈でグラフィティ絵画は,読めないタグよりも芸術作品に似ていることが多い.

original_text: Boomerang throwing is a popular skill that many tourists want to acquire.
translated_text: ブーメランの投げは,多くの観光客が習得したい人気のスキルです.

original_text: If you want to learn throwing a boomerang that comes back to your hand, make sure you have a suitable boomerang for returning.
translated_text: 手に返ってくるブーメランを投げることを学びたいなら 戻るのに適したブーメランを用意してください

original_text: Most boomerangs available in Australia are in fact non-returning. It is best for beginners to not try throwing in windy
translated_text: オーストラリアで利用できるブーメランのほとんどは 戻りません. 初心者は風が吹くのを 試さないほうがいいでしょう.

original_text: A Hangi Meal is cooked in a hot pit in the ground.
translated_text: ハンギの料理は,地下で熱い穴で調理されます.

original_text: The pit is either heated with hot stones from a fire, or in some places geothermal heat makes areas of ground naturally hot.
translated_text: 穴は火から温かい石で加熱されるか 地熱熱によって 地面は自然に熱くなります

original_text: The hangi is often used to cook a traditional roast style dinner.
translated_text: 漢ギは伝統的な焼肉式ディナーを調理するのによく使われます.

original_text: Several places in Rotorua offer geothermal hangi, while other hangi can be sampled in Christchurch, Wellington and elsewhere.
translated_text: ロトロア州のいくつかの場所では地熱の hangiが提供され,他の hangiはクライストチャーチ,ウェリントンなどで試用できます.

original_text: MetroRail has two classes on commuter trains in and around Cape Town: MetroPlus (also called First Class) and Metro (called Third Class).
translated_text: メトロレイルにはケープタウン内および周辺の通勤列車で2つのクラスがあります. メトロプラス (ファーストクラスとも呼ばれます) とメトロ (サードクラスとも呼ばれます).

original_text: MetroPlus is more comfortable and less crowded but slightly more expensive, though still cheaper than normal metro tickets in Europe.
translated_text: メトロプラスは快適で混雑が少ないが,ヨーロッパでは通常のメトロチケットよりも安くても,わずかに高価です.

original_text: Every train has both MetroPlus and Metro coaches; the MetroPlus coaches are always on the end of the train nearest Cape Town.
translated_text: 各列車にはMetroPlusとMetroのバスがあります.MetroPlusのバスは常に最も近いケープタウンにある列車の端にあります.

original_text: Carrying for others - Never let your bags out of your sight, especially when you are crossing international borders.
translated_text: 他 の 人 を 運ぶ こと - 特に 国際 国境 を 越える 時,決して 荷物 を 視野 から 離さない こと に なり ませ ん.

original_text: You could find yourself being used as a drug carrier without your knowledge, which will land you in a great deal of trouble.
translated_text: 知らないうちに 麻薬を運ぶのに 使われるかもしれないし 困ったことになるでしょう

original_text: This includes waiting in line, as drug-sniffing dogs could be used at any time without notice.
translated_text: 麻薬を吸う犬は 予告なしに いつでも使用できるので 排列を待つことも含まれます

original_text: Some countries have exceedingly draconian punishments even for first time offenses; these can include prison sentences of over 10 years or death.
translated_text: ある 国 に は,初 度 犯罪 に つい て も,極度に 厳しい 罰 が 与え られ て い ます.この 罰 に 10 年 以上 の 懲役刑 や 死刑 が 含ま れ て い ます.

original_text: Unattended bags are a target for theft and can also attract attention from authorities wary of bomb threats.
translated_text: 監視されていないバッグは盗難の標的であり 爆弾の脅威を懸念する当局の注意を惹きつけることもできます

original_text: At home, due to this constant exposure to the local germs, odds are very high that you're already immune to them.
translated_text: 自宅では 地方の細菌に 常に接触しているので 免疫力が高いのです

original_text: But in other parts of the world, where the bacteriological fauna are new to you, you're far more likely to run into problems.
translated_text: しかし世界の他の地域では 細菌学的な動物が新しい場所では 問題を抱える可能性がはるかに高いのです

original_text: Also, in warmer climates bacteria both grow more quickly and survive longer outside the body.
translated_text: また 温暖な気候では バクテリアは 早く成長し 体外では 長生きします

original_text: Thus the scourges of Delhi Belly, the Pharaoh's Curse, Montezuma's Revenge, and their many friends.
translated_text: デリーバellyの惨めさ,ファラオの呪い,モンテツマの復讐,そして彼らの多くの友人.

original_text: As with respiratory problems in colder climates, intestinal problems in hot climates are fairly common and in most cases are distinctly annoying but not really dangerous.
translated_text: 寒い気候の呼吸器疾患と同様に 暑い気候の腸内疾患は かなり一般的であり ほとんどの場合 明らかにイライラするが 危険ではない.

original_text: If traveling in a developing country for the first time – or in a new part of the world – don't underestimate the potential culture shock.
translated_text: 発展途上国に初めて旅行する場合は 文化ショックの可能性を過小評価しないでください

original_text: Many a stable, capable traveler has been overcome by the newness of developing world travel, where many little cultural adjustments can add up quickly.
translated_text: 発展途上国 の 旅 の 新しさ に よっ て 安定 し,能力 を 持っ て いる 旅行 者 の 多く が 圧倒 さ れ て い ます.

original_text: Especially in your initial days, consider splurging on Western-style and -quality hotels, food, and services to help acclimatize.
translated_text: 西洋風のホテルや 食品やサービスに お金を費やすことを考えてください

original_text: Do not sleep on a mattress or pad on the ground in areas where you do not know the local fauna.
translated_text: 地元の動物を知らない地域では床に寝たり,床に寝たりしないでください.

original_text: If you are going to camp out, bring a camp cot or hammock to keep you away from snakes, scorpions and such.
translated_text: キャンプに行くと 蛇やスkorpionsなどから身を守るために キャンプベッドやハンマックを持参してください.

original_text: Fill your home with a rich coffee in the morning and some relaxing chamomile tea at night.
translated_text: 朝は豊かなコーヒーと 夜はリラックスするカモミールティーで家を満たす.

original_text: When you're on a staycation, you have the time to treat yourself and take a few extra minutes to brew up something special.
translated_text: 休暇をとると 自分に 時間をかけて 特別なものを作ります

original_text: If you're feeling more adventurous, take the opportunity to juice or blend up some smoothies:
translated_text: もっと冒険的な気分になるなら 果汁を飲んだり スムージーを混ぜたりしてください

original_text: maybe you'll discover a simple beverage that you can make for breakfast when you're back to your daily routine.
translated_text: 朝食に簡単な飲み物を 見つけられるかもしれません 日常生活に戻るとね

original_text: If you live in a city with a varied drinking culture, go to bars or pubs in neighborhoods you don't frequent.
translated_text: 飲酒文化が 多様なもので 都市に住んでるなら 頻繁に訪れない街のバーやパブに行ってください.

original_text: For those unfamiliar with medical jargon, the words infectious and contagious have distinct meanings.
translated_text: 伝染性 と 伝染性 の 言葉 は 医学 の 語 に 慣れ ない 人々 に は 異なっ た 意味 を 持っ て い ます.

original_text: An infectious disease is one that is caused by a pathogen, such as a virus, bacterium, fungus or other parasites.
translated_text: 感染症とは,ウイルス,細菌,真菌,その他の寄生虫などの病原体によって引き起こされる病気である.

original_text: A contagious disease is a disease which is easily transmitted by being in the vicinity of an infected person.
translated_text: 伝染性疾患は,感染した人の近くにあることで容易に伝染する病気です.

original_text: Many governments require visitors entering, or residents leaving, their countries to be vaccinated for a range of diseases.
translated_text: 多くの政府は 国内に入国する訪問者や 国内を出国する住民に対し 様々な病気に対して ワクチン接種を義務付けています

original_text: These requirements may often depend on what countries a traveller has visited or intends to visit.
translated_text: これらの要件はしばしば旅行者が訪れた国や訪ろうとしている国に依存する可能性があります.

original_text: One of strong points of Charlotte, North Carolina, is that it has an abundance of high-quality options for families.
translated_text: シャーロット (ノースカロライナ州) の 強いところの一つは 家庭のための 質の高い選択肢が豊富にあることです

original_text: Residents from other areas often cite family-friendliness as a primary reason for moving there, and visitors often find the city easy to enjoy with children around.
translated_text: 他 の 地域 の 住民 は,その 移住 の 主要 の 理由 と し て 家族 の 友好 を 挙げ て い ます.訪問 者 たち は,周囲 の 子供 たち と 一緒 に 都市 を 楽しめる こと が 容易 な こと を 見 て い ます.

original_text: In the past 20 years, the amount of child-friendly options in Uptown Charlotte has grown exponentially.
translated_text: 過去20年間 シャーロット市内では 子供向けの選択肢が 急増しています

original_text: Taxis are not generally used by families in Charlotte, though they can be of some use in certain circumstances.
translated_text: タクシーは一般的にシャーロットで家族によって使用されませんが,特定の状況では有用な可能性があります.

original_text: There is a surcharge for having more than 2 passengers, so this option might be more expensive than necessary.
translated_text: 2名以上の乗客に追加料金があるため,このオプションは必要以上に高価な可能性があります.

original_text: Antarctica is the coldest place on Earth, and surrounds the South Pole.
translated_text: 南極は地球上で最も寒い場所であり 南極を囲んでいます

original_text: Tourist visits are costly, demand physical fitness, can only take place in summer Nov-Feb, and are largely limited to the Peninsula, Islands and Ross Sea.
translated_text: 観光訪問は費用がかかり 身体的体調が求められ 夏の11~2月にしか行われず 半島,島々,ロス海に限られている.

original_text: A couple of thousand staff live here in summer in some four dozen bases mostly in those areas; a small number stay over winter.
translated_text: 数千人のスタッフが夏の間 この地域を中心に 約4ダースの基地に住んでいますが 冬の間には少数のスタッフが滞在しています

original_text: Inland Antarctica is a desolate plateau covered by 2-3 km of ice.
translated_text: 内陸南極は2〜3kmの氷で覆われている荒れ果てた高原です

original_text: Occasional specialist air tours go inland, for mountaineering or to reach the Pole, which has a large base.
translated_text: 時々専門的な航空ツアーは内陸,登山や広大な基地を持つ極まで行きます.

original_text: The South Pole Traverse (or Highway) is a 1600 km trail from McMurdo Station on the Ross Sea to the Pole.
translated_text: 南極経路 (南極経路) は,ロス海にあるマクマード駅から極まで1600kmの経路である.

original_text: It's compacted snow with crevasses filled in and marked by flags. It can only be traveled by specialized tractors, hauling sleds with fuel and supplies.
translated_text: 雪が密集され 裂け目があり 旗で記印されています 特殊なトラクターしか 移動できません 燃料や物資を運ぶスレッドを運びます

original_text: These aren't very nimble so the trail has to take a long swerve around the Transantarctic Mountains to come onto the plateau.
translated_text: トランサンタラクティック山脈を曲がって 高原にたどり着くには 長い曲がりくねる必要があります

original_text: The most common cause for accidents in winter is slippery roads, pavements (sidewalks) and especially steps.
translated_text: 冬の事故の最も一般的な原因は,滑りやすい道路,歩道,特に階段です.

original_text: At a minimum, you need footwear with suitable soles. Summer shoes are usually very slippery on ice and snow, even some winter boots are deficient.
translated_text: 夏 の 靴 は 通常 氷 や 雪 に 滑りやすい もの で あり,冬 の 靴 も 欠乏 し て い ます.

original_text: The pattern should be deep enough, 5 mm (1/5 inch) or more, and the material soft enough in cold temperatures.
translated_text: パターンは十分に深く,5mm (1/5インチ) 以上で,冷たい温度では材料は十分に柔らかくなければならない.

original_text: Some boots have studs and there is studded add-on equipment for slippery conditions, suitable for most shoes and boots, for the heels or heels and sole.
translated_text: 靴にはが付いており,滑りやすい条件のための補足装置があり,ほとんどの靴や靴,ヒールやヒールとソールに適しています.

original_text: Heels should be low and wide. Sand, gravel or salt (calcium chloride) is often scattered on roads or paths to improve traction.
translated_text: サンド,石灰,塩 (カルシウム塩化) は,牽引力を向上させるために,道路や道に散らばる.

original_text: Avalanches are not an abnormality; steep slopes can hold only so much slow, and the excess volumes will come down as avalanches.
translated_text: 崖っぷちは異常ではありません 斜面はそれほど遅いので 余分な量も雪崩のように減少します

original_text: The problem is that snow is sticky, so it needs some triggering to come down, and some snow coming down can be the triggering event for the rest.
translated_text: 問題は雪が粘着しているため 降るには触発が必要で 降るには触発効果があります

original_text: Sometimes the original trigging event is the sun warming the snow, sometimes some more snowfall, sometimes other natural events, often a human.
translated_text: 時には太陽が雪を暖める 時にはさらに雪が降る 時には自然現象が起こります

original_text: A tornado is a spinning column of very low-pressure air, which sucks the surrounding air inward and upward.
translated_text: 竜巻は非常に低圧の空気の回転する柱で,周囲の空気を内側と上へと吸い込む.

original_text: They generate high winds (often 100-200 miles/hour) and can lift heavy objects into the air, carrying them as the tornado moves.
translated_text: 竜巻が動いていると 重い物体を空に持ち上げることができる.

original_text: They begin as funnels descending from storm clouds, and become "tornadoes" when they touch the ground.
translated_text: 嵐の雲から降りるのように始まり 地面に触ると"竜巻"になります

original_text: Personal VPN (virtual private network) providers are an excellent way of circumventing both political censorship and commercial IP-geofiltering.
translated_text: 個人VPN (仮想プライベートネットワーク) プロバイダは,政治的検閲と商用IPジオフィルタリングの両方を回避する優れた方法です.

original_text: They are superior to web proxies for several reasons: They re-route all Internet traffic, not only http.
translated_text: 複数の理由からウェブプロキシよりも優れている: httpだけでなく,インターネットトラフィックをすべてリルーティングする.

original_text: They normally offer higher bandwidth and better quality of service. They are encrypted and thus harder to spy on.
translated_text: 通常はより高い帯域幅とよりよいサービスの質を提供しているため,暗号化されているため,監視するのが難しくなります.

original_text: The media companies routinely lie about the purpose of this, claiming that it is to "prevent piracy".
translated_text: メディア会社は"海賊行為を防ぐ"と主張し その目的について定期的に嘘をつく.

original_text: In fact, region codes have absolutely no effect on illegal copying; a bit-for-bit copy of a disk will play just fine on any device where the original will.
translated_text: 実際,地域コードは違法なコピーに全く影響を与えない. ディスクのビット-バイ-ビットコピーは,オリジナルのデバイスが好きなどのデバイスでもうまく再生できます.

original_text: The actual purpose is to give those companies more control over their markets; it's all about money spinning.
translated_text: 実際の目的は 企業が市場を支配する力を 増やすことです それはお金の回転です

original_text: Because calls are routed over the Internet, you do not need to use a phone company located where you live or where you travel.
translated_text: インターネット で 電話 を 送る の は なぜ です か

original_text: There is also no requirement that you obtain a local number from the community in which you live; you can obtain a satellite Internet connection in the wilds of Chicken, Alaska and select a number which claims you're in sunny Arizona.
translated_text: アラスカ州チキンで衛星インターネット接続を入手し 陽気なアリゾナにいるという番号を選択できます

original_text: Often, you have to buy a global number separately that allows PSTN phones to call you. Where the number is from makes a difference for people calling you.
translated_text: PSTNの電話が電話できる グローバル番号を別々に購入する必要があります その番号がどこから来たかによって 連絡する人の関心が大きくなります

original_text: Real-time text translator apps – applications that are capable of automatically translating whole segments of text from one language into another.
translated_text: リアルタイムのテキスト翻訳アプリ  テキストを1言語から別の言語に自動的に翻訳できるアプリケーション.

original_text: Some of the applications in this category can even translate texts in foreign languages on signs or other objects in the real world when the user points the smartphone towards those objects.
translated_text: このカテゴリーのいくつかのアプリケーションは,ユーザがスマートフォンをこれらの物体に向けるときに,実世界のサインや他の物体の外国語のテキストを翻訳することもできます.

original_text: The translation engines have improved dramatically, and now often give more or less correct translations (and more seldom gibberish), but some care is due, as they still may have gotten it all wrong.
translated_text: 翻訳エンジンは劇的に改善し,現在ではほとんど正確な翻訳を (そしてよりめったにガッバーリッシュな翻訳を) 与えていますが,彼らはまだすべて間違っていたかもしれないので,少し注意を払う必要があります.

original_text: One of the most prominent apps in this category is Google Translate, which allows offline translation after downloading the desired language data.
translated_text: このカテゴリーの最も顕著なアプリの一つはGoogle Translateです 必要な言語データをダウンロードした後はオフライン翻訳を可能にします.

original_text: Using GPS navigation apps on your smartphone can be the easiest and most convenient way to navigate when out of your home country.
translated_text: スマートフォンのGPSナビゲーションアプリを使うことは 自国外でのナビゲーションの最も簡単で便利な方法です

original_text: It can save money over buying new maps for a GPS, or a standalone GPS device or renting one from a car rental company.
translated_text: 新しいGPS地図を買うか 自動GPSデバイスを買うか レンタカー会社からレンタを借りるよりも お金を節約できます

original_text: If you don't have a data connection for your phone, or when it is out of range, their performance can be limited or unavailable.
translated_text: スマホのデータ接続がない場合,または範囲外にある場合,その性能が制限されるか利用できない可能性があります.

original_text: Every corner store is filled with a confusing array of pre-paid phone cards that can be used from pay phones or ordinary telephones.
translated_text: 携帯電話や普通の電話から利用できる プレペイド電話カードの 混沌とした配列が 隅々まで広がっています

original_text: While most cards are good for calling anywhere, some specialise in providing favourable call rates to specific groups of countries.
translated_text: ほとんどのカードはどこにでも電話をするのに役立ちますが,一部のカードは特定の国のグループに有利な通話率を提供することに特化したものです.

original_text: Access to these services is often through a toll-free telephone number that can be called from most phones without charge.
translated_text: これらのサービスへのアクセスは,ほとんどの電話から無料の電話番号を介して行うことがよくあります.

original_text: Rules regarding regular photography also apply to video recording, possibly even more so.
translated_text: 定期的な写真撮影に関する規則は ビデオ録音にも適用されます

original_text: If just taking a photo of something isn't allowed, then you shouldn't even think of recording a video of it.
translated_text: 写真を撮るだけで 許されないなら ビデオを撮るなんて考えない

original_text: If using a drone, check well in advance as to what you are allowed to film and what permits or additional licensing are required.
translated_text: ドローンを使用する場合は 撮影許可があり 許可や追加許可が必要か 十分に前に確認してください.

original_text: Flying a drone near an airport or over a crowd is almost always a bad idea, even if it's not illegal in your area.
translated_text: 空港近くや 群衆の上に ドローンを飛ばすことは ほとんど常に 悪いアイデアです あなたの地域では違法ではないとしてもです

original_text: Nowadays air travel is only rarely booked directly through the airline without first searching and comparing prices.
translated_text: 現在,航空旅行は,まず価格を検索して比較せずに航空会社を通じて直接予約することはめったにありません.

original_text: Sometimes the same flight can have vastly differing prices at various agregators and it pays to compare search results and to also look at the website of the airline itself before booking.
translated_text: 時には同じフライトは様々な agregatorで非常に異なる価格を持つことがあり,検索結果を比較し,予約する前に航空会社のウェブサイトも調べる価値があります.

original_text: While you may not need a visa for short visits to certain countries as a tourist or for business, going there as an international student generally requires a longer stay than going there just as a casual tourist.
translated_text: 旅行 旅行 旅行 旅行 旅行 旅行 旅行 旅行 旅行 旅行 旅行 旅行 旅行 旅行 旅行 旅行 旅行 旅行 旅行 旅行 旅行 旅行 旅行 旅行 旅行 旅行 旅行 旅行 旅行 旅行 旅行 旅行 旅行 旅行 旅行 旅行 旅行 旅行 旅行 旅行 旅行 旅行 旅行 旅行 旅行 旅行 旅行 旅行 旅行 旅行 旅行 旅行 旅行 旅行 旅行 旅行 旅行 旅行 旅行 旅行 旅行 旅行 旅行

original_text: In general, staying in any foreign country for an extended period of time will require you to obtain a visa in advance.
translated_text: 一般的に,長期滞在の際には,ビザを事前に取得する必要があります.

original_text: Student visas generally have different requirements and application procedures from normal tourist or business visas.
translated_text: 学生ビザは一般的には通常の観光ビザやビジネスビザとは異なる要件と申請手続きがあります.

original_text: For most countries, you will need an offer letter from the institution you wish to study at, and also evidence of funds to support yourself for at least the first year of your course.
translated_text: ほとんどの国では,あなたが勉強したい機関からの申し込み書簡と,少なくともあなたのコースの最初の年間を支えるための資金の証明が必要です.

original_text: Check with the institution, as well as the immigration department for the country you wish to study in for detailed requirements.
translated_text: 詳細な要件については,勉強を希望する国の教育機関や移民局にご相談ください.

original_text: Unless you are a diplomat, working overseas generally means that you will have to file income tax in the country you are based in.
translated_text: 外交官でない限り,海外で働くことは通常,あなたが所在する国で所得税を納める必要があることを意味します.

original_text: Income tax is structured differently in different countries, and the tax rates and brackets vary widely from one country to another.
translated_text: 所得税の構造は各国によって異なります 税率と格差は各国によって大きく異なります

original_text: In some federal countries, such as the United States and Canada, income tax is levied both at the federal level and at the local level, so the rates and brackets can vary from region to region.
translated_text: 米国やカナダなどの一部の連邦国では,連邦レベルと地方レベルの両方で所得税が徴収されるため,税率と括弧は地域によって異なります.

original_text: While immigration check is usually absent or a formality when you arrive in your homeland, customs control can be a hassle.
translated_text: 移民検定は通常行われず 移民検定は通常行われず 移民検定は通常行われず 移民検定は困難です

original_text: Make sure you know what you can and cannot bring in and declare anything over the legal limits.
translated_text: 法律上の制限を超えたものを 持ち出したり 宣言したりできないことを 知っておいてください.

original_text: The easiest way to get started in the business of travel writing is to hone your skills on an established travel blog website.
translated_text: トラベル・ライティングを始める最も簡単な方法は 既成のトラベル・ブログのウェブサイトでスキルを磨くことです

original_text: After you become comfortable with formatting and editing on the web, then later, you might create your own website.
translated_text: ウェブのフォーマットや編集に 慣れ親しくなったら 後に自分のウェブサイトを作ることができます

original_text: Volunteering while travelling is a great way to make a difference but it's not just about giving.
translated_text: 旅行中にボランティアをすることは 大きな変化をもたらす方法ですが 寄付だけでは不十分です

original_text: Living and volunteering in a foreign country is a great way to get to know a different culture, meet new people, learn about yourself, get a sense of perspective and even gain new skills.
translated_text: 外国での生活やボランティア活動は 異なる文化を知り 新しい人々と出会い 自分自身について学び 新たな視点を得たり 新しいスキルを習得する 素晴らしい方法です

original_text: It can also be a good way to stretch a budget to allow a longer stay somewhere since many volunteer jobs provide room and board and a few pay a small salary.
translated_text: また 長期滞在を許可するために 予算を伸ばす 良い方法でもあり 多くのボランティア の 仕事は 宿泊 給食 を 提供し,少数の 給与 が 少なくなる の です.

original_text: Vikings used the Russian waterways to get to the Black Sea and Caspian Sea. Parts of these routes can still be used. Check possible need for special permits, which may be difficult to get.
translated_text: ヴァイキング は ロシア の 水路 を 使っ て 黒海 と カスピ海 に 行く こと に なり まし た.これら の 経路 の 部分 は 今 も 使っ て い ます.特殊 な 許可 を 取得 する 必要 が あり ます か を 調べ て みてください.

original_text: The White Sea–Baltic Canal connects the Arctic Ocean to the Baltic Sea, via Lake Onega, Lake Ladoga and Saint Petersburg, mostly by rivers and lakes.
translated_text: ホワイト海バルト運河は北極海とバルト海を繋ぎ,オネガ湖,ラドーガ湖,サンクトペテルブルク湖を通り,主に川や湖によってつながっています.

original_text: Lake Onega is also connected to Volga, so coming from the Caspian Sea through Russia is still possible.
translated_text: オーネガ湖もヴォルガと繋がっているので カスピ海からロシアを通って行くことはまだ可能だ.

original_text: Be assured that once you hit the marinas everything will be pretty obvious. You will meet other boat hitchhikers and they will share their information with you.
translated_text: マリーナにたどり着いたら 全てが明らかになり 他のボートハイクヤーと出会い 情報を共有してくれます

original_text: Basically you'll be putting up notices offering your help, pacing the docks, approaching people cleaning their yachts, trying to make contact with sailors in the bar, etc.
translated_text: 基本的には 支援を申し出る通知を貼り 港に足を踏み入れ ヨット掃除をする人に近づいて バーの水手と連絡をしようとします

original_text: Try to talk to as many people as possible. After a while everyone will know you and will give you hints as to which boat is looking for someone.
translated_text: できるだけ多くの人と話をしてみてください しばらくすると 皆があなたを知って 誰かを探している船のヒントを教えてくれるでしょう

original_text: You should choose your Frequent Flyer airline in an alliance carefully.
translated_text: 航空会社を慎重に選んでください

original_text: Although you may think it is intuitive to join the airline you fly most, you should be aware that privileges offered are often different and frequent flyer points may be more generous under a different airline in the same alliance.
translated_text: あなたが最も多く飛んでいる航空会社に加わることは直感的に思えるかもしれませんが 提供される特権はしばしば異なるものであり 同じ同盟の異なる航空会社の下で 頻繁に飛ぶポイントがより寛大であることが認識すべきです

original_text: Airlines such as Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways & Turkish Airlines have greatly expanded their services to Africa, and offer connections to many major African cities at competitive rates than other European airlines.
translated_text: エミレーツ,エチハッド航空,カタール航空,トルコ航空などの航空会社はアフリカへのサービスを大幅に拡大し,他の欧州航空会社よりも競争力のある価格で多くの主要なアフリカ都市への接続を提供しています.

original_text: Turkish Airlines flies to 39 destinations in 30 African countries as of 2014.
translated_text: ターキッシュ・エアラインズは2014年現在,アフリカ30カ国の39の目的地に飛行している.

original_text: If you have additional travel time, check to see how your total fare quote to Africa compares with a round-the-world fare.
translated_text: アフリカへの 合計 料金 料金 料金 は 世界 周りの 料金 と どの よう に 比較 さ れ て い ます か を 確認 する こと に 余裕 が ある の は なぜ です か.

original_text: Don't forget to add in the extra costs of additional visas, departure taxes, ground transportation, etc. for all those places outside of Africa.
translated_text: 追加ビザ,出張税,陸上交通等の追加費用を アフリカ以外のすべての場所に 追加することを忘れないでください.

original_text: If you want to fly around the world completely in the Southern Hemisphere, the choice of flights and destinations is limited due to the lack of transoceanic routes.
translated_text: 南半球で世界中を飛び回りたいなら 航路や目的地の選択は 海外の航路が不足しているため 限られています

original_text: No airline alliance covers all three ocean crossings in the Southern Hemisphere (and SkyTeam covers none of the crossings).
translated_text: 南半球の3つの海域をカバーする航空連合はありません (スカイチームもいずれもカバーしていません).

original_text: However, Star Alliance covers everything except the eastern South Pacific from Santiago de Chile to Tahiti, which is a LATAM Oneworld flight.
translated_text: しかし,スター・アライアンスはサンティアゴ・デ・チリからタヒティまでの東南太平洋を除く全てをカバーしています. これはLATAM Oneworldのフライトです.

original_text: This flight is not the only option if you want to skip the South Pacific and the west coast of South America. (see below)
translated_text: 南太平洋と南米西海岸を飛び越えたい場合,このフライトは唯一の選択肢ではありません. (下記を参照)

original_text: In 1994, the ethnically Armenian Nagorno-Karabakh region of Azerbaijan waged war against the Azeris.
translated_text: 1994年,アゼルバイジャンのアルメニア民族のナゴルノ・カラバヒ地域は,アゼルバイジャン人と戦争を行いました.

original_text: With Armenian backing, a new republic was created. However, no established nation - not even Armenia - officially recognizes it.
translated_text: アルメニア の 支援 に よっ て,新しい 共和 国 が 設立 さ れ まし た.しかし,確立 さ れ た 国,アルメニア も しれ ませ ん.それ は 正式 に 認め られ て い ませ ん.

original_text: Diplomatic arguments over the region continue to mar relations between Armenia and Azerbaijan.
translated_text: この地域に関する外交的議論は,アルメニアとアゼルバイジャンとの関係を悪化させ続けている.

original_text: The Canal District (Dutch: Grachtengordel) is the famous 17th-century district surrounding the Binnenstad of Amsterdam.
translated_text: カナール地区 (オランダ語: Grachtengordel) は,アムステルダムのバーンシュタッドを囲む有名な17世紀の地区です.

original_text: The whole district is designated as a UNESCO World Heritage Site for its unique cultural and historical value, and its property values are among the highest of the country.
translated_text: 全地区は,独特の文化・歴史的価値のため,ユネスコ世界遺産に指定され,その財産価値は国内で最も高いものである.

original_text: Cinque Terre, which means Five Lands, comprises the five small coastal villages of Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza and Monterosso located in the Italian region of Liguria.
translated_text: Cinque Terre (五つの土地) は,イタリアのリグリア地域に位置するリオマギョーレ,マナロラ,コルニグリア,ヴェルナツァ,モンテロスソの5つの小さな沿岸村で構成されています.

original_text: They are listed on the UNESCO World Heritage List.
translated_text: 彼らはユネスコの世界遺産リストに登録されています.

original_text: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
translated_text: 何世紀にも渡って 人々は海を眺める 崖っぷちまで 険しい 険しい景観に 慎重にテラス を 建ててきた.

original_text: Part of its charm is the lack of visible corporate development. Paths, trains and boats connect the villages, and cars cannot reach them from the outside.
translated_text: その魅力の一部は,可視な企業開発の欠如です. 道路,列車,船は村を繋ぎ,車も外から到達できません.

original_text: The varieties of French which are spoken in Belgium and Switzerland differ slightly from the French spoken in France, though they are similar enough to be mutually intelligible.
translated_text: ベルギーとスイスで話すフランス語の種類は,フランス語とわずかに異なるが,相互に理解できるほど似ている.

original_text: In particular, the numbering system in French-speaking Belgium and Switzerland has some slight peculiarities that are different from the French spoken in France, and the pronunciation of some words is slightly different.
translated_text: 特にフランス語圏のベルギーとスイスの番号制度は,フランス語とはわずかな違いがあり,いくつかの単語の発音はわずかに異なる.

original_text: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
translated_text: それでも フランス語を話すベルギー人とスイス人は皆 学校で標準的なフランス語を学んでいたので,標準的なフランス語の番号を用いても,皆さんのことを理解できるでしょう.

original_text: In many parts of the world, waving is a friendly gesture, indicating "hello."
translated_text: 世界 の 多く の 地域 で,手を振る こと は,友好 的 な 行動 で "こんにちは" を 示す こと です.

original_text: However, in Malaysia, at least among the Malays in rural areas, it means "come over," similar to the index finger bent toward the body, a gesture which is used in certain Western countries, and should be used only for that purpose.
translated_text: しかし,マレーシアでは,少なくとも農村部に住むマラヤ人の間では, 指針指が身体に向かって傾いているような"横越し"を意味します. これは一部の西洋諸国で使用されているジェスチャーで,その目的のためにのみ使用されるべきです.

original_text: Similarly, a British traveller in Spain may mistake a wave goodbye involving the palm facing the waver (rather than the person being waved at) as a gesture to come back.
translated_text: 同じ よう に,スペイン の イギリス の 旅行 者 は,波 を 抱きしめる 腕 を 抱きしめる 挨拶 を 返事 する 姿 と 勘違い し て い ます.

original_text: Auxiliary languages are artificial or constructed languages created with the intent of facilitating communication between peoples who would otherwise have difficulty communicating.
translated_text: 補助言語は,コミュニケーションが困難である人々の間のコミュニケーションを容易にする目的で作られた人工または構築された言語です.

original_text: They are separate from lingua francas, which are natural or organic languages that become dominant for one reason or another as means of communication between speakers of other languages.
translated_text: 言語は自然または有機的な言語で,他の言語の話者間のコミュニケーション手段として,何らかの理由で支配的なものになっています.

original_text: In the heat of the day, travelers can experience mirages that give the illusion of water (or other things).
translated_text: 日の暑さでは 旅行者は 水 (または他のもの) の幻覚を味わうことができる.

original_text: These can be dangerous if the traveler pursue the mirage, wasting precious energy and remaining water.
translated_text: 旅行 者 が 迷路 を 追っ て 行く と,貴重 な エネルギー と 残る 水 を 浪費 する なら,これら は 危険 な こと に なり ます.

original_text: Even the hottest of deserts can become extremely cold at night. Hypothermia is a real risk without warm clothing.
translated_text: 砂漠 の 最も 暑い 場所 で も 夜 に 極端 に 寒い こと が あり ます.暖かい 服 を 持っ て い ない なら 低温 が 危険 です.

original_text: In summer, especially, you'll need to watch out for mosquitoes if you decide to hike through the rainforest.
translated_text: 特に夏には 雨林で散歩をするなら 蚊に注意を払う必要があります

original_text: Even if you're driving through the subtropical rainforest, a few seconds with the doors open while you get inside the vehicle is enough time for mosquitoes to get in the vehicle with you.
translated_text: 熱帯雨林を運転している場合でも 車の内側に入ると ドアが開いている数秒で 蚊が車に乗るのに十分です

original_text: Bird flu, or more formally avian influenza, can infect both birds and mammals.
translated_text: 鳥インフルエンザ (鳥インフルエンザ) は鳥と哺乳類の両方に感染します

original_text: Fewer than a thousand cases have ever been reported in humans, but some of them have been fatal.
translated_text: 人体で発生した病例は 千件以下で 報告されていますが そのうちのいくつかは致命的です

original_text: Most have involved people who work with poultry, but there is also some risk to birdwatchers.
translated_text: ほとんどの場合 鳥類を飼う人に関わっていますが 鳥類の観察者にもリスクがあります

original_text: Typical for Norway are steep fjords and valleys that suddenly give way to a high, more or less even plateau.
translated_text: ノルウェーには 突如高い高原や平原に 取って代わられる 崖っぷちのフィヨードや谷が典型的です

original_text: These plateaus are often referred to as "vidde" meaning a wide, open treeless space, a boundless expanse.
translated_text: これらの高原はしばしば"vidde"と呼ばれ 広い,開いた木のない空間,無限の広域を意味する.

original_text: In Rogaland and Agder they are usually called "hei" meaning a treeless moorland often covered in heather.
translated_text: ローガランドとアグダーでは通常"ヘイ"と呼ばれている.

original_text: The glaciers are not stable, but flow down the mountain. This will cause cracks, crevasses, which may be obscured by snow bridges.
translated_text: 氷河は安定していないが,山を下り流れるので,雪の橋によって覆われる裂け目や裂け目が生じます.

original_text: The walls and roofs of ice caves can collapse and cracks can get closed.
translated_text: 氷の洞窟の壁や屋根は崩壊し 裂け目も閉まります

original_text: At the edge of glaciers huge blocks break loose, fall down and perhaps jump or roll farther from the edge.
translated_text: 氷河の端には巨大なブロックが 解き放ち 落ちて 横から飛び降りたり 滑ったりするかもしれません

original_text: The tourist season for the hill stations generally peaks during the Indian summer.
translated_text: ヒルステーションの観光季節は,一般的にはインドの夏にピークです.

original_text: However, they have a different kind of beauty and charm during winter, with many hill stations receiving healthy amounts of snow and offering activities such as skiing and snowboarding.
translated_text: しかし,冬には 美しい景色と魅力が異なっており,多くの丘陵駅には 十分な量の雪が降り,スキーやスノーボードなどの活動が提供されています.

original_text: Only a few airlines still offer bereavement fares, which slightly discount the cost of last-minute funeral travel.
translated_text: 葬儀旅行の費用をわずかに削減する 哀悼の料金を提供している航空会社はまだ少ない.

original_text: Airlines that offer these include Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa for flights originating from the U.S. or Canada, and WestJet.
translated_text: これらのサービスを提供する航空会社には,エア・カナダ,デルタ・エア・ラインズ,ルフタンザ,米国またはカナダからのフライト,ウェストジェットなどがあります.

original_text: In all cases, you must book by phone directly with the airline.
translated_text: すべての場合,航空会社に直接電話で予約する必要があります.

original_text: On Monday, scientists from the Stanford University School of Medicine announced the invention of a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type: a tiny printable chip that can be manufactured using standard inkjet printers for possibly about one U.S. cent each.
translated_text: 周一,斯坦福大学医学院的科学家宣布发明了一种新的诊断工具,可以按类型分类细胞:一个可打印的小芯片,

original_text: Lead researchers say this may bring early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria to patients in low-income countries, where the survival rates for illnesses such as breast cancer can be half those of richer countries.
translated_text: 主要研究人员表示,这可能会使低收入国家患者早期发现癌症,结核病,艾滋病毒和疟疾,

original_text: The JAS 39C Gripen crashed onto a runway at around 9:30 am local time (0230 UTC) and exploded, closing the airport to commercial flights.
translated_text: 在当地时间9点30分时,JAS 39C Gripen撞上了跑道,并爆炸,将机场封闭给商业航班.

original_text: The pilot was identified as Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee.
translated_text: 飞行员被确定为小队长迪洛克里特·帕塔维.

original_text: Local media reports an airport fire vehicle rolled over while responding.
translated_text: 据当地媒体报道,

original_text: 28-year-old Vidal had joined Barça three seasons ago, from Sevilla.
translated_text: 28岁的维达尔3个赛季前从塞维利亚加入巴萨.

original_text: Since moving to the Catalan-capital, Vidal had played 49 games for the club.
translated_text: 自从转移到加泰罗尼亚首都以来,维达尔为俱乐部打了49场比赛.

original_text: The protest started around 11:00 local time (UTC+1) on Whitehall opposite the police-guarded entrance to Downing Street, the Prime Minister's official residence.
translated_text: 抗议活动开始于当地时间11点左右 (UTC+1) 在怀特霍尔,

original_text: Just after 11:00, protesters blocked traffic on the northbound carriage in Whitehall.
translated_text: 在11点之后,示威者封锁了北方车辆的交通.

original_text: At 11:20, the police asked the protesters to move back on to the pavement, stating that they needed to balance the right to protest with the traffic building up.
translated_text: 警方要求抗议者回到行人行道,

original_text: Around 11:29, the protest moved up Whitehall, past Trafalgar Square, along the Strand, passing by Aldwych and up Kingsway towards Holborn where the Conservative Party were holding their Spring Forum in the Grand Connaught Rooms hotel.
translated_text: 在11点29分左右,抗议者上升到怀特哈尔,经过特拉法加广场,沿着Strand,经过阿尔迪维奇,

original_text: Nadal's head to head record against the Canadian is 7–2.
translated_text: 纳达尔对加拿大人的总数是72.

original_text: He recently lost against Raonic in the Brisbane Open.
translated_text: 他最近在布里斯班公开赛中输了罗尼克.

original_text: Nadal bagged 88% net points in the match winning 76 points in the first serve.
translated_text: 纳达尔在比赛中获得了88%的净积分,

original_text: After the match, King of Clay said, "I am just excited about being back in the final rounds of the most important events. I am here to try to win this."
translated_text: 在比赛结束后,克莱王说:"我很高兴能回到最重要的赛事的最后一轮.

original_text: "Panama Papers" is an umbrella term for roughly ten million documents from Panamanian law firm Mossack Fonseca, leaked to the press in spring 2016.
translated_text: "巴拿马文件"是巴拿马律师事务所莫萨克·芬塞卡约1000万份文件的总称,

original_text: The documents showed fourteen banks helped wealthy clients hide billions of US dollars of wealth to avoid taxes and other regulations.
translated_text: 文件显示,十四家银行帮助富有的客户隐藏数十亿美元的财富,

original_text: British newspaper The Guardian suggested Deutsche Bank controlled roughly a third of the 1200 shell companies used to accomplish this.
translated_text: 据英国"卫报"报道,德意志银行控制了大约1200家公司的三分之一.

original_text: There were protests worldwide, several criminal prosecutions, and the leaders of the governments of Iceland and Pakistan both resigned.
translated_text: 伊斯兰和巴基斯坦政府的领导人都辞职.

original_text: Born in Hong Kong, Ma studied at New York University and Harvard Law School and once held an American permanent resident "green card".
translated_text: 在香港出生,马在纽约大学和哈佛法学院学习,曾经持有美国永久居民"绿卡".

original_text: Hsieh implied during the election that Ma might flee the country during a time of crisis.
translated_text: 在选举期间,Hsieh暗示马可能在危机时期逃离该国.

original_text: Hsieh also argued that the photogenic Ma was more style than substance.
translated_text: 希希还认为光基 Ma 更多的是风格而不是物质.

original_text: Despite these accusations, Ma won handily on a platform advocating closer ties with the Chinese mainland.
translated_text: 尽管受到这些指控,但马在一个倡导与中国大陆更紧密的关系的平台上很方便地赢得了胜利.

original_text: Today's Player of the Day is Alex Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals.
translated_text: 今天的最佳球员是华盛顿资本队的亚历克斯·奥维奇金.

original_text: He had 2 goals and 2 assists in Washington's 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers.
translated_text: 他在华盛顿5-3胜亚特兰大热刺队的比赛中取得了2个进球和2次助攻.

original_text: Ovechkin's first assist of the night was on the game-winning goal by rookie Nicklas Backstrom;
translated_text: 欧维奇金的首次助攻是新手尼克拉斯·巴克斯特罗姆的胜利进球;

original_text: his second goal of the night was his 60th of the season, becoming the first player to score 60 or more goals in a season since 1995-96, when Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux each reached that milestone.
translated_text: 他今晚的第二个进球是本赛季的第60进球,成为自1995-96年以来,自1995-96年以来,在一个赛季中打进60或更多进球的第一个球员,当时贾罗米尔·贾格尔和马里奥·莱米耶斯都达到了这一里程碑.

original_text: Batten was ranked 190th on the 2008 400 Richest Americans list with an estimated fortune of $2.3 billion.
translated_text: 在2008年400富豪美国人榜单上,巴顿排名第190位,估计财富为23亿美元.

original_text: He graduated from the College of Arts & Sciences of the University of Virginia in 1950 and was a significant donor to that institution.
translated_text: 他于1950年毕业于弗吉尼亚大学艺术与科学学院,并为该机构做出了重要捐赠.

original_text: Iraq's Abu Ghraib prison has been set alight during a riot.
translated_text: 伊拉克的阿布格莱布监狱在骚乱中被点燃.

original_text: The jail became notorious after prisoner abuse was discovered there after US forces took over.
translated_text: 在美国军队接管后,监狱成为臭名昭著的监狱.

original_text: Piquet Jr. crashed in the 2008 Singapore Grand Prix just after an early pit stop for Fernando Alonso, bringing out the safety car.
translated_text: 在2008年新加坡大奖赛中,小皮克在费尔南多·阿隆索早点停车后毁,

original_text: As the cars ahead of Alonso went in for fuel under the safety car, he moved up the pack to take victory.
translated_text: 当阿隆索前面的汽车在安全车下面油时,

original_text: Piquet Jr. was sacked after the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.
translated_text: 在2009年匈牙利大奖赛之后,皮quet Jr.被解雇.

original_text: At exactly 8:46 a.m. a hush fell across the city, marking the exact moment the first jet struck its target.
translated_text: 在早上8点46分,整个城市都沉默了,

original_text: Two beams of light have been rigged up to point skywards overnight.
translated_text: 两个光束被安装,以指向夜间的天空.

original_text: Construction is ongoing for five new skyscrapers at the site, with a transportation center and memorial park in the middle.
translated_text: 现场正在建设五座新的摩天大楼,中间有一个交通中心和纪念公园.

original_text: The PBS show has more than two-dozen Emmy awards, and its run is shorter only than Sesame Street and Mister Rogers' Neighborhood.
translated_text: 广播电视台的节目获得了二十多项艾美奖项,其运行时间仅比芝麻街和罗杰斯先生的邻居短.

original_text: Each episode of the show would focus on a theme in a specific book and then explore that theme through multiple stories.
translated_text: 每个节目都会集中在特定书中的一个主题,然后通过多个故事探索这个主题.

original_text: Each show would also provide recommendations for books that children should look for when they went to their library.
translated_text: 每个节目还提供了孩子们去图书馆时应该寻找的书籍的建议.

original_text: John Grant, from WNED Buffalo (Reading Rainbow's home station) said "Reading Rainbow taught kids why to read,... the love of reading — [the show] encouraged kids to pick up a book and to read."
translated_text: 约翰·格兰特 (John Grant) 来自WNED Buffalo (阅读彩虹的本站) 说:"阅读彩虹教导了孩子们为什么要阅读,...

original_text: It is believed by some, including John Grant, that both the funding crunch and a shift in the philosophy of educational television programming contributed to ending the series.
translated_text: 包括约翰·格兰特在内的一些人认为,资金紧缩和教育电视节目哲学转变都导致了该系列的结束.

original_text: The storm, situated about 645 miles (1040 km) west of the Cape Verde islands, is likely to dissipate before threatening any land areas, forecasters say.
translated_text: 预报人员说,距离开普维尔德岛西部约1040公里处的风暴可能会在威胁任何陆地之前消失.

original_text: Fred currently has winds of 105 miles per hour (165 km/h) and is moving towards the northwest.
translated_text: 弗雷德目前的风速为每小时165公里,

original_text: Fred is the strongest tropical cyclone ever recorded so far south and east in the Atlantic since the advent of satellite imagery, and only the third major hurricane on record east of 35°W.

original_text: This causes the skater to turn. If the skates tilt to the right, the skater turns right, if the skates tilt to the left, the skater turns left.
translated_text: 如果滑板向右,滑板向右,如果滑板向左,滑板向左.

original_text: To return to their previous energy level, they must get rid of the extra energy they got from the light.
translated_text: 为了回到以前的能量水平, 他们必须摆脱了他们从光中获得的额外能量.

original_text: They do this by emitting a tiny particle of light called a "photon".
translated_text: 它们通过发射一个称为"光子"的微小光粒子来做到这一点.

original_text: Scientists call this process "stimulated emission of radiation" because the atoms are stimulated by the bright light, causing the emission of a photon of light, and light is a type of radiation.
translated_text: 科学家们称这一过程为"刺激辐射发射",因为原子被明亮的光刺激,导致光子发射.

original_text: The next picture shows the atoms emitting photons. Of course, in reality photons are a lot smaller than those in the picture.
translated_text: 下一张图片显示原子发射光子.当然,实际上光子比图片中的小得多.

original_text: Photons are even smaller than the stuff that makes up atoms!
translated_text: 光子甚至比构成原子的物质更小!

original_text: After hundreds of hours of operation the filament in the bulb eventually burns out and the light bulb no longer works.
translated_text: 在经过数百个小时的操作后,灯泡中的光线最终会燃烧,灯泡不再工作.

original_text: The light bulb then needs replacing. It is necessary to be careful in replacing the light bulb.
translated_text: 灯泡需要更换. 在更换灯泡时,必须小心.

original_text: First, the switch for the light fixture needs to be turned off or the cable disconnected.
translated_text: 首先,必须关闭灯具的开关或切断电缆.

original_text: This is because electricity flowing into the socket where the metallic part of bulb sits can give you a severe electric shock if you touch the inside of the socket or the metal base of the bulb while it is still partly in the socket.
translated_text: 由于电力流入灯泡的金属部分的插座,如果你触摸灯泡的内部或金属底部,而灯泡部分仍处于插座,这可能会给你带来严重的电击.

original_text: The major organ of the circulatory system is the heart, which pumps the blood.
translated_text: 循环系统的主要器官是心脏,它出血液.

original_text: Blood goes away from the heart in tubes called arteries and comes back to the heart in tubes called veins. The smallest tubes are called capillaries.
translated_text: 血液从心脏中转移到称为动脉的管道,然后回到心脏中转移到称为静脉的管道. 最小的管道称为毛囊.

original_text: A triceratops' teeth would have been able to crush not only leaves but even very tough branches and roots.
translated_text: 一个三角兽的牙不仅能碎叶子,而且还能碎非常坚硬的树枝和根.

original_text: Some scientists think Triceratops ate cycads, which are a type of plant that was common in the Cretaceous.
translated_text: 一些科学家认为三类动物吃了,

original_text: These plants look like a small palm tree with a crown of sharp, spiky leaves.
translated_text: 这些植物看起来像一个小的棕树,

original_text: A Triceratops could have used its strong beak to strip off the leaves before eating the trunk.
translated_text: 一个三角形可以用其强的嘴巴在吃树木之前剥离叶子.

original_text: Other scientists argue that these plants are very poisonous so it is unlikely that any dinosaur ate them, even though today the sloth and other animals like the parrot (a descendant of the dinosaurs) can eat poisonous leaves or fruit.
translated_text: 其他科学家认为,这些植物非常有毒,所以不可能有恐龙吃过它们,尽管今天和其他动物如子 (恐龙的后代) 可以吃有毒的叶子或水果.

original_text: How would Io's gravity pull on me? If you stood on the surface of Io, you would weigh less than you do on Earth.
translated_text: 如果你站在Io的表面上,你重量会比地球更小.

original_text: A person who weighs 200 pounds (90kg) on Earth would weigh about 36 pounds (16kg) on Io. So the gravity, of course, pulls less on you.
translated_text: 在地球上体重90公斤的人,在地球上体重约16公斤.

original_text: The Sun doesn't have a crust like the Earth that you can stand on. The whole Sun is made out of gases, fire, and plasma.
translated_text: 整个太阳是由气体,火焰和等离子体组成的.

original_text: The gas becomes thinner as you go farther from the center of the Sun.
translated_text: 随着你离太阳中心越来越远,气体变得越来越薄.

original_text: The outer-part we see when we look at the Sun is called the photosphere, which means "ball of light".
translated_text: 当我们看着太阳时,我们看到的外部部分被称为光圈,意思是"光球".

original_text: About three thousand years later, in 1610, Italian astronomer Galileo Galilei used a telescope to observe that Venus has phases, just as the moon does.
translated_text: 大约三千年后,在1610年,意大利天文学家加利略·加利利用望远镜观察到金星有相,正如月球一样.

original_text: Phases happen because only the side of Venus (or of the Moon) facing the Sun is lighted. The phases of Venus supported the theory of Copernicus that the planets go around the Sun.
translated_text: 由于金星 (或月球) 面向太阳的侧面才被照亮,所以发生了阶段.金星的阶段支持哥伯尼克斯的理论,即行星围绕太阳旋转.

original_text: Then, a few years later in 1639, an English astronomer named Jeremiah Horrocks observed a transit of Venus.
translated_text: 1639年,英国天文学家杰里米亚·霍洛克斯 (Jeremiah Horrocks) 观察到金星的过境.

original_text: England had experienced a long period of peace after the reconquest of the Danelaw.
translated_text: 英格兰在重新征服丹莱夫之后经历了漫长的和平时期.

original_text: However in 991 Ethelred was faced with a Viking fleet larger than any since Guthrum's a century earlier.
translated_text: 然而,在991年,埃塞尔雷德面临了自古特鲁姆一世纪前以来规模较大的维京舰队.

original_text: This fleet was led by Olaf Trygvasson, a Norwegian with ambitions to reclaim his country from Danish domination.
translated_text: 这艘舰队由挪威人奥拉夫·特里格瓦森 (Olaf Trygvasson) 领导.

original_text: After initial military setbacks, Ethelred was able to agree to terms with Olaf, who returned to Norway to try to gain his kingdom with mixed success.
translated_text: 在最初的军事挫折之后,埃特尔雷德能够与奥拉夫达成协议,奥拉夫回到挪威试图获得他的王国,

original_text: Hangeul is the only purposely invented alphabet in popular daily use. The alphabet was invented in 1444 during the reign of King Sejong (1418 – 1450).
translated_text: 汉古尔是人们日常使用的唯一故意发明的字母.

original_text: King Sejong was the fourth king of the Joseon Dynasty and is one of the most highly regarded.
translated_text: 塞国王是乔森王朝的第四位国王,也是最受尊敬的国王之一.

original_text: He originally named the Hangeul alphabet Hunmin Jeongeum, which means "the correct sounds for the instruction of the people".
translated_text: 他最初把汉吉尔字母命名为汉吉尔字母 (Hunmin Jeongeum),这意味着"正确的声音用于教导人民".

original_text: There are many theories to how Sanskrit came into existence. One of them is about an Aryan migration from the west into India who brought their language with them.
translated_text: 一个是关于阿里亚人从西方迁移到印度,带着他们的语言.

original_text: Sanskrit is an ancient language and is comparable to the Latin language spoken in Europe.
translated_text: 语是一个古老的语言,与欧洲使用的拉丁语言相比.

original_text: The earliest known book in the world was written in Sanskrit. After the compilation of Upanishads, Sanskrit just faded due to hierarchy.
translated_text: 世界上最早已知的书是用三文书写的.Upanishads编译后,三文书由于层次结构而消失.

original_text: Sanskrit is a very complex and rich language, which has served to be the source for many modern Indian languages, just like Latin is the source for European languages like French and Spanish.
translated_text: 汉语是一个非常复杂而丰富的语言,它已成为许多现代印度语言的源头,

original_text: With the battle for France over, Germany began to get ready to invade the island of Britain.
translated_text: 战争结束后,德国开始准备入侵英国岛屿.

original_text: Germany code-named the attack “Operation Sealion”. Most of the British Army's heavy weapons and supplies had been lost when it evacuated from Dunkirk, so the army was fairly weak.
translated_text: 德国代号称这次袭击为Sealion行动.英国军队撤离敦克基尔时,大部分重型武器和供应都丢失了,所以军队相当弱.

original_text: But the Royal Navy was still much stronger than the German Navy (“Kriegsmarine”) and could have destroyed any invasion fleet sent across the English Channel.
translated_text: 但皇家海军仍然比德国海军更强大,并且可以摧毁任何在英国海峡中发送的入侵舰队.

original_text: However, very few Royal Navy ships were based near the likely invasion routes as the admirals were afraid they would be sunk by German air attack.
translated_text: 然而,很少有皇家海军舰艇在可能的入侵路线附近基地,因为海军将军担心将被德国空袭淹没.

original_text: Let's start with an explanation about Italy's plans. Italy was mainly the "little brother" of Germany and Japan.
translated_text: 我们首先要解释意大利的计划. 意大利主要是德国和日本的"小兄弟".

original_text: It had a weaker army and a weaker navy, although they had just built four new ships right before the beginning of the war.
translated_text: 虽然他们刚刚在战争开始之前建造了四艘新船,

original_text: Italy's main goals were African countries. To capture those countries, they would need to have a troop launching pad, so as troops could sail across the Mediterranean Sea and invade Africa.
translated_text: 意大利的主要目标是非洲国家. 为了占领这些国家,他们需要一个部队发射台,

original_text: For that, they had to get rid of British bases and ships in Egypt. Besides those actions, Italy's battleships were not supposed to do anything else.
translated_text: 除了这些行动之外,意大利的战舰不应该做其他任何事情.

original_text: Now for Japan. Japan was an island country, just like Britain.
translated_text: 日本是一个岛国,就像英国一样.

original_text: Submarines are ships designed to travel underwater, and remain there for an extended amount of time.
translated_text: 潜艇是旨在在在水下旅行的船只,

original_text: Submarines were used in World War I and World War II. Back then they were very slow and had a very limited shooting range.
translated_text: 在第一次世界大战和第二次世界大战中,潜艇使用.当时它们非常缓慢,射程非常有限.

original_text: In the beginning of the war they mostly travelled on top of the sea, but as radar began developing and becoming more accurate the submarines were forced to go under water to avoid being seen.
translated_text: 在战争开始时,他们主要在海上旅行,但随着雷达的发展和变得更加准确,

original_text: German submarines were called U-Boats. The Germans were very good at navigating and operating their submarines.
translated_text: 德国潜艇被称为U-Boats. 德国人非常擅长导航和运营潜艇.

original_text: Because of their success with submarines, after the war Germans aren't trusted to have many of them.
translated_text: 由于他们的潜艇成功,战后,德国人不相信有很多潜艇.

original_text: Yes! King Tutankhamun, sometimes referred to as "King Tut" or "The Boy King", is one of the most well known ancient Egyptian kings in modern times.
translated_text: 图坦哈蒙王,有时被称为"图特王"或"少年王",是现代最知名的古埃及王之一.

original_text: Interestingly, he was not considered to be very important in ancient times and was not recorded on most ancient king lists.
translated_text: 值得注意的是,在古代,他并不被视为非常重要的,并且没有被列入大多数古代国王名单.

original_text: However, the discovery of his tomb in 1922 made him a celebrity. While many tombs of the past were robbed, this tomb was left virtually undisturbed.
translated_text: 然而,他在1922年发现他的坟墓,使他成为一个名人.虽然许多古墓被抢劫,但这座坟墓几乎没有被破坏.

original_text: Most of the items buried with Tutankhamun have been well preserved, including thousands of artefacts made from precious metals and rare stones.
translated_text: 图坦卡蒙埋葬的大部分物品都保存得很好,包括成千上万件由宝贵金属和稀有石头制成的文物.

original_text: The invention of spoke wheels made Assyrian chariots lighter, faster, and better prepared to outrun soldiers and other chariots.
translated_text: 随着轮的发明,亚述的车辆变得更轻,更快,更准备好逃离士兵和其他车辆.

original_text: Arrows from their deadly crossbows could penetrate the armor of rival soldiers. About 1000 B.C., the Assyrians introduced the first cavalry.
translated_text: 约在公元前1000年,亚述人引进了第一支骑兵队伍.

original_text: A cavalry is an army that fights on horseback. The saddle had not yet been invented, so the Assyrian cavalry fought on the bare backs of their horses.
translated_text: 马兵是一个骑马战斗的军队. 马还没有被发明,所以亚述骑马兵用他们的马背上战斗.

original_text: We know many Greek politicians, scientists, and artists. Possibly the most known person of this culture is Homer, the legendary blind poet, who composed two masterpieces of Greek literature: the poems Iliad and Odyssey.
translated_text: 我们认识许多希腊政客,科学家和艺术家.这个文化中最著名的人可能是希腊文学两部杰作"伊利亚德"和"奥迪西亚"的传奇盲诗人荷马斯.

original_text: Sophocles and Aristophanes are still popular playwrights and their plays are considered to be among the greatest works of world literature.
translated_text: 索福克里斯和亚里斯托法尼斯仍然是受欢迎的戏剧作家,他们的戏剧被认为是世界文学中最伟大的作品之一.

original_text: Another famous Greek is a mathematician Pythagoras, mostly known for his famous theorem about relations of the sides of right triangles.
translated_text: 另一个著名的希腊人是数学家皮塔哥拉斯.

original_text: There are varying estimates for how many people speak Hindi. It is estimated to be between the second and fourth most commonly spoken language in the world.
translated_text: 据估计,印度语是世界上第二至第四种最常见的语言.

original_text: The number of native speakers varies depending on whether or not very closely related dialects are counted.
translated_text: 母语发音者数量不同,取决于是否计算密切相关的方言.

original_text: Estimates range from 340 million to 500 million speakers, and as many as 800 million people can understand the language.
translated_text: 估计有3.4亿到5亿人说语言,有多达8亿人能理解语言.

original_text: Hindi and Urdu are similar in vocabulary but different in script; in everyday conversations, speakers of both languages can usually understand each other.
translated_text: 印度语和乌尔都语的词汇相似,但字体不同;在日常对话中,两种语言的说者通常可以互相理解.

original_text: Around the 15th century, northern Estonia was under great cultural influence of Germany.
translated_text: 在15世纪左右,爱沙尼亚北部受到德国的巨大文化影响.

original_text: Some German monks wanted to bring God closer to the native people, so they invented the Estonian literal language.
translated_text: 一些德国僧侣想使上帝更接近当地人,所以他们发明了爱沙尼亚字面语言.

original_text: It was based on the German alphabet and one character "Õ/õ" was added.
translated_text: 它是基于德语字母,并添加了一个字符"Õ/õ".

original_text: As time passed, many words that were borrowed from German coalesced. This was the beginning of enlightenment.
translated_text: 随着时间的推移,许多从德语借来的词汇融合了起来.

original_text: Traditionally, the heir to the throne would go straight into the military after finishing school.
translated_text: 传统上,王位继承人在学校毕业后直接进入军队.

original_text: However, Charles went to university at Trinity College, Cambridge where he studied Anthropology and Archaeology, and later History, earning a 2:2 (a lower second class degree).
translated_text: 然而,查尔斯进入了剑桥的三位一体学院的大学,在那里他学习了人类学和考古学,后来读了历史,获得了2:2 (低二级学位).

original_text: Charles was the first member of the British Royal Family to be awarded a degree.
translated_text: 查尔斯是英国皇家家庭的第一个获得学位的成员.

original_text: European Turkey (eastern Thrace or Rumelia in the Balkan peninsula) includes 3% of the country.
translated_text: 欧洲土耳其 (巴尔干半岛的东特拉基或鲁梅利亚) 占该国3%

original_text: The territory of Turkey is more than 1,600 kilometres (1,000 mi) long and 800 km (500 mi) wide, with a roughly rectangular shape.
translated_text: 土耳其的领土长达1,600多公里 (1,000英里) 宽达800公里 (500英里),形状大致是矩形.

original_text: Turkey's area, including lakes, occupies 783,562 square kilometres (300,948 sq mi), of which 755,688 square kilometres (291,773 sq mi) are in south west Asia and 23,764 square kilometres (9,174 sq mi) in Europe.
translated_text: 土耳其的面积包括湖泊,占有783,562平方公里 (300,948平方英里),其中755,688平方公里 (291,773平方英里) 在西南亚和23,764平方公里 (9,174平方英里) 在欧洲.

original_text: Turkey's area makes it the world's 37th-largest country, and is about the size of Metropolitan France and the United Kingdom combined.
translated_text: 土耳其的面积使其成为世界上第37个最大的国家.

original_text: Turkey is encircled by seas on three sides: the Aegean Sea to the west, the Black Sea to the north and the Mediterranean Sea to the south.
translated_text: 土耳其周围有三条海:以西面是爱琴海,以北面是黑海,以南面是地中海.

original_text: Luxembourg has a long history but its independence dates from 1839.
translated_text: 卢森堡拥有悠久的历史,但其独立始于1839年.

original_text: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
translated_text: 目前的比利时部分过去是卢森堡的一部分,但在1830年代的比利时革命后成为比利时.

original_text: Luxembourg has always tried to remain a neutral country but it was occupied in both World War I and World War II by Germany.
translated_text: 卢森堡一直试图保持中立状态,但在第一次世界大战和第二次世界大战中,德国占领了它.

original_text: In 1957 Luxembourg became a founding member of the organization which is today known as the European Union.
translated_text: 1957年,卢森堡成为今天被称为欧盟的组织的创始成员.

original_text: The Drukgyal Dzong is a ruined fortress and Buddhist monastery in the upper part of the Paro District (in Phondey Village).
translated_text: 德鲁吉尔 Dzong 是一个废墟的堡垒和佛教修道院,位于帕罗区上部 (在德伊村).

original_text: It is said that in 1649, Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyel created the fortress to commemorate his victory against the Tibetan-Mongol forces.
translated_text: 据说1649年,扎布德龙·纳旺·纳姆吉尔创建了这座堡垒,以纪念他在西藏-蒙古军队中取得的胜利.

original_text: In 1951, a fire caused for only some of the relics of the Drukgyal Dzong to remain, such as the image of Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyal.
translated_text: 1951年,一场火灾只剩下了德鲁克吉尔 Dzong 的一些遗迹,例如Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyal的形象.

original_text: After the fire, the fortress was preserved and protected, remaining to be one of Bhutan's most sensational attractions.
translated_text: 在火灾后,堡垒被保存和保护, 仍然是布丹最令人惊叹的景点之一.

original_text: During the 18th century Cambodia found itself squeezed between two powerful neighbors, Thailand and Vietnam.
translated_text: 在18世纪,柬埔寨被两个强大的邻国 - - 泰国和越南 - 压迫.

original_text: The Thais invaded Cambodia several times in the 18th century and in 1772 they destroyed Phnom Phen.
translated_text: 在18世纪,泰国人多次入侵柬埔寨,

original_text: In the last years of the 18th century the Vietnamese also invaded Cambodia.
translated_text: 在18世纪的最后几年,越南人也入侵了柬埔寨.

original_text: Eighteen percent of Venezuelans are unemployed, and most of those who are employed work in the informal economy.
translated_text: 委内瑞拉18%的人失业,

original_text: Two thirds of Venezuelans who work do so in the service sector, nearly a quarter work in industry and a fifth work in agriculture.
translated_text: 三分之二的委内瑞拉人从事服务业,近四分之一从事工业,五分之一从事农业.

original_text: An important industry for Venezuelans is oil, where the country is a net exporter, even though only one percent work in the oil industry.
translated_text: 委内瑞拉石油对委内瑞拉人来说是重要的行业,

original_text: Early in the nation's independence, Singapore Botanic Gardens' expertise helped to transform the island into a tropical Garden City.
translated_text: 在该国独立初期,新加坡植物园的专业知识帮助使岛屿成为一个热带的花园城市.

original_text: In 1981, Vanda Miss Joaquim, an orchid hybrid, was chosen as the nation's national flower.
translated_text: 在1981年,达小姐乔亚金 (Vanda Miss Joaquim) 一种类混合物被选为国家花.

original_text: Every year around October nearly 1.5 million herbivores travel towards the southern plains, crossing the Mara River, from the northern hills for the rains.
translated_text: 每年10月左右,近150万种草食动物前往南方平原,

original_text: And then back to the north through the west, once again crossing the Mara river, after the rains in around April.
translated_text: 经过4月左右的降雨后,再次穿越马拉河.

original_text: The Serengeti region contains the Serengeti National Park, the Ngorongoro Conservation Area and Maswa Game Reserve in Tanzania and the Maasai Mara National Reserve in Kenya.
translated_text: 塞伦盖蒂地区包括塞伦盖蒂国家公园,南戈朗戈罗保护区和坦桑尼亚的马斯瓦野生动物保护区以及肯尼亚的马赛马拉国家保护区.

original_text: Learning to create interactive media requires conventional and traditional skills, as well as tools mastered in interactive classes (storyboarding, audio and video editing, story telling, etc.)
translated_text: 学习创建互动媒体需要传统和传统技能,以及掌握互动课程的工具 (讲故事,音频和视频编辑,讲故事等).

original_text: Interactive design requires that you re-assess your assumptions about media production and learn to think in a non-linear ways.
translated_text: 互动设计需要你重新评估关于媒体制作的假设,

original_text: Interactive design requires that components of a project connect to each other, but also make sense as a separate entity.
translated_text: 互动设计需要一个项目的组件相互连接,但也作为一个独立的实体具有意义.

original_text: The disadvantage of zoom lenses is that the focal complexity and number of lens elements required to achieve a range of focal lengths is much greater than for prime lenses.
translated_text: 放大镜头的缺点是,实现焦距范围所需的焦点复杂性和镜头元素数量远大于主要镜头.

original_text: This is becoming less of an issue as lens manufacturers achieve higher standards in lens production.
translated_text: 由于镜头制造商在镜头生产方面达到更高的标准,

original_text: This has allowed zoom lenses to produce pictures of a quality comparable to that achieved by lenses with fixed focal length.
translated_text: 这使得变焦镜头能够产生与固定焦距镜头相比的质量的图像.

original_text: Another disadvantage of zoom lenses is that the maximum aperture (the speed) of the lens is usually lower.
translated_text: 变焦镜头的另一个缺点是,镜头的最大开口 (速度) 通常较低.

original_text: This makes inexpensive zoom lenses hard to use in low-light conditions without a flash.
translated_text: 这使得在低光条件下使用不昂贵的变焦镜头,

original_text: One of the most common problems when trying to convert a movie to DVD format is the overscan.
translated_text: 试图将电影转换为DVD格式时最常见的问题之一是过度扫描.

original_text: Most televisions are made in a way to please the general public.
translated_text: 大多数电视都是为了让公众满意.

original_text: For that reason, everything you see on the TV had the borders cut, top, bottom and sides.
translated_text: 因此,所有你在电视上看到的东西都切断了边界,上,下,侧面.

original_text: This is made to ensure that the image covers the whole screen. That is called overscan.
translated_text: 这就是为了确保图像覆盖整个屏幕. 这被称为过度扫描.

original_text: Unfortunately, when you make a DVD, it's borders will most likely be cut too, and if the video had subtitles too close to the bottom, they won't be fully shown.
translated_text: 不幸的是,当你制作DVD时,它的边界也很可能会被切断,如果视频的字幕太接近底部,

original_text: The traditional medieval castle has long inspired the imagination, conjuring up images of jousts, banquets and Arthurian chivalry.
translated_text: 传统的中世纪城堡长期以来一直激发了人们的想象力,

original_text: Even standing amidst thousand year-old ruins it is easy to bring to mind the sounds and smells of battles long gone, to almost hear the clatter of hooves on the cobbles and to smell the fear rising from the dungeon pits.
translated_text: 即使站在千年历史的废墟中, 很容易想起已久的战斗的声音和气味,

original_text: But is our imagination based on reality? Why were castles built in the first place? How were they designed and built?
translated_text: 但我们的想象力是基于现实吗?

original_text: Typical for the period, Kirby Muxloe Castle is more of a fortified house than a true castle.
translated_text: 基尔比·穆克洛城堡比一个真正的城堡更像是一个坚固的房子.

original_text: Its large glazed windows and thin walls would not have been able to resist a determined attack for long.
translated_text: 它的大型玻璃窗和薄薄的墙壁将无法长期抵御决心的攻击.

original_text: In the 1480s, when its construction was begun by Lord Hastings, the country was relatively peaceful and defense was only required against small bands of roving marauders.
translated_text: 在1480年代,当哈斯廷斯爵士开始建造时,这个国家相对和平,

original_text: The balance of power was a system in which European nations sought to maintain the national sovereignty of all European states.
translated_text: 权力平衡是欧洲国家试图维护所有欧洲国家的民族主权的体系.

original_text: The concept was that all European nations had to seek to prevent one nation from becoming powerful, and thus national governments often changed their alliances in order to maintain the balance.
translated_text: 欧洲所有国家都必须努力阻止一个国家变得强大,因此国家政府经常改变他们的联盟,以保持平衡.

original_text: The War of Spanish Succession marked the first war whose central issue was the balance of power.
translated_text: 西班牙继承战争标志着第一场战争,其核心问题是权力平衡.

original_text: This marked an important change, as European powers would no longer have the pretext of being religious wars. Thus, the Thirty Years' War would be the last war to be labeled a religious war.
translated_text: 这标志着一个重要的变化,因为欧洲大国不再有宗教战争的借口.因此,三十年战争将是最后一次被称为宗教战争的战争.

original_text: The temple of Artemis at Ephesus was destroyed on July 21, 356 BCE in an act of arson committed by Herostratus.
translated_text: 356年7月21日,以弗所的阿特米斯寺被摧毁.

original_text: According to the story, his motivation was fame at any cost. The Ephesians, outraged, announced that Herostratus' name never be recorded.
translated_text: 根据传说,他的动机是名声,无论如何,以弗所人愤怒地宣布,赫罗斯特拉斯的名字永远不会被记载.

original_text: The Greek historian Strabo later noted the name, which is how we know today. The temple was destroyed on the same night that Alexander the Great was born.
translated_text: 希腊历史学家斯特拉博后来指出了这个名字,这就是我们今天所知道的.

original_text: Alexander, as king, offered to pay to rebuild the temple, but his offer was denied. Later, after Alexander died, the temple was rebuilt in 323 BCE.
translated_text: 亚历山大作为国王提供了支付重建寺的费用,但他的报价被拒绝.后来,亚历山大去世后,公元前323年,寺重建.

original_text: Make sure your hand is as relaxed as possible while still hitting all the notes correctly - also try not to make much extraneous motion with your fingers.
translated_text: 确保你的手尽可能放松,同时正确敲击所有音符.

original_text: This way, you will tire yourself out as little as possible. Remember there's no need to hit the keys with a lot of force for extra volume like on the piano.
translated_text: 这样,你会尽可能少地疲.记住,你不需要用太多的力量敲键来增加音量,就像在钢琴上一样.

original_text: On the accordion, to get extra volume, you use the bellows with more pressure or speed.
translated_text: 在调音器上,为了获得额外的音量,

original_text: Mysticism is the pursuit of communion with, identity with, or conscious awareness of an ultimate reality, divinity, spiritual truth, or God.
translated_text: 神秘主义是追求与一个最终的现实,神性,精神真理或上帝的联系,认同或意识.

original_text: The believer seeks a direct experience, intuition, or insight into divine reality/the deity or dieties.
translated_text: 相信者寻求直接的体验,直觉,或洞察神圣的现实/神性或饮食.

original_text: Followers pursue certain ways of living, or practices that are intended to nurture those experiences.
translated_text: 追随者追求某些生活方式或习俗,旨在培养这些经历.

original_text: Mysticism can be distinguished from other forms of religious belief and worship by its emphasis on the direct personal experience of a unique state of consciousness, particularly those of a peaceful, insightful, blissful, or even ecstatic character.
translated_text: 神秘主义可以与其他形式的宗教信仰和崇拜区别出来,它强调一个独特的意识状态的直接个人体验,特别是那些和平,有洞察力,幸福,甚至狂喜的性格.

original_text: Sikhism is a religion from the Indian sub-continent. It originated in the Punjab region during the 15th century from a sectarian split within the Hindu tradition.
translated_text: 锡克教是一个来自印度亚洲的宗教.它起源于15世纪的印度教传统中的宗派分裂.

original_text: Sikhs consider their faith to be a separate religion from Hinduism though they acknowledge its Hindu roots and traditions.
translated_text: 锡克教徒认为他们的信仰是独立于印度教的宗教,尽管他们承认印度教的根源和传统.

original_text: Sikhs call their religion Gurmat, which is Punjabi for "way of the guru". The guru is a fundamental aspect of all Indian religions but in Sikhism has taken on an importance that forms the core of Sikh beliefs.
translated_text: 锡克教徒称他们的宗教为古尔马特 (Gurmat),这意味着"Guru的路".Guru是所有印度宗教的一个基本方面,但在锡克教中,它已经占据了构成锡克教信仰的核心的重要地位.

original_text: The religion was founded in the 15th century by Guru Nanak (1469–1539). There followed in succession a further nine gurus.
translated_text: 该宗教于15世纪由Guru Nanak (1469~1539年) 创立.

original_text: However, in June 1956, Krushchev's promises were put to the test when riots in Poland, where workers were protesting against food shortages and wage cuts, turned into a general protest against Communism.
translated_text: 然而,在1956年6月,克鲁什乔夫的承诺被考验,当时波兰的暴动,工人抗议食物短缺和工资削减,变成了反对共产主义的普遍抗议.

original_text: Although in the end, Krushchev sent in tanks to restore order, he did give way to some economic demands and agreed to appoint the popular Wladyslaw Gomulka as the new prime minister.
translated_text: 尽管克鲁什乔夫最终派出坦克恢复秩序,但他确实放弃了一些经济要求,并同意任命受欢迎的瓦迪斯拉夫·戈穆尔卡为新总理.

original_text: The Indus Valley Civilization was a Bronze Age civilisation in the northwest Indian subcontinent encompassing most of modern-day Pakistan and some regions in northwest India and northeast Afghanistan.
translated_text: 印度山谷文明是印度西北部的一个青铜时代文明,包括现代巴基斯坦大部分地区和印度西北部和阿富汗东北部的一些地区.

original_text: The civilisation flourished in the basins of the Indus River wherefore it derives its name.
translated_text: 这种文明在印度斯河盆地勃发展,因此它取出了这个名字.

original_text: Although some scholars speculate that since the civilisation also existed in the basins of the now dried up Sarasvati River, it should be aptly called the Indus-Sarasvati Civilization, while some call it the Harappan Civilization after Harappa, the first of its sites to be excavated in the 1920s.
translated_text: 虽然一些学者猜测,由于这个文明也存在于现在干燥的萨拉斯瓦蒂河盆地,因此它应该被称作印度斯-萨拉斯瓦蒂文明,而一些人称之为哈拉帕文明,这是20年代首个被挖掘的遗址.

original_text: The militaristic nature of the Roman empire aided in the development of medical advances.
translated_text: 罗马帝国的军事性助长了医疗技术的发展.

original_text: Doctors began to be recruited by Emperor Augustus and even formed the first Roman Medical Corps for use in the aftermath of battles.
translated_text: 皇帝奥古斯塔斯开始招募医生,甚至成立了第一支罗马医疗队,

original_text: Surgeons had knowledge of various sedatives including morphine from extracts of poppy seeds and scopolamine from herbane seeds.
translated_text: 医生们对各种镇静剂有了解,其中包括子种子提取物中的胺和草本种子中的 scopolamine.

original_text: They became proficient at amputation to save patients from gangrene as well as tourniquets and arterial clamps to stem blood flow.
translated_text: 他们变得熟练于截肢,以保护病人免受,以及和动脉,以阻止血液流动.

original_text: Over multiple centuries, the Roman empire led to great gains in the field of medicine and formed much of the knowledge we know today.
translated_text: 在多个世纪内,罗马帝国在医学领域取得了巨大进步,并形成了我们今天所知的大部分知识.

original_text: Pureland origami is origami with the restriction that only one fold may be done at a time, more complex folds like reverse folds are not allowed, and all folds have straightforward locations.
translated_text: 纯地原创原创原创原创原创原创原创原创原创原创原创原创原创原创原创原创原创原创原创原创原创原创原创原创原创原创原创原创原创原创原创原创原创原创原创原创原创原创原创原创原创原创原创原创原创原创原创原创原创原创原创原创原创原创原创原创原创原创原创原创原创原

original_text: It was developed by John Smith in the 1970s to help inexperienced folders or those with limited motor skills.
translated_text: 在1970年代由约翰·史密斯开发,以帮助没有经验的文件或运动能力有限的人.

original_text: Children develop an awareness of race and racial stereotypes quite young and these racial stereotypes affect behavior.
translated_text: 孩子们很年轻就对种族和种族刻板印象产生了意识,这些种族刻板印象影响了行为.

original_text: For instance, children who identify with a racial minority that is stereotyped as not doing well in school tend to not do well in school once they learn about the stereotype associated with their race.
translated_text: 例如,那些认同一个被认为不擅长学校的种族少数群体的孩子,一旦他们了解与他们的种族相关的刻板印象,

original_text: MySpace is the third most popular website used in the United States and has 54 million profiles currently.
translated_text: 目前,MySpace是美国第三大受欢迎的网站,拥有5400万个个人资料.

original_text: These websites have gotten a lot of attention, especially in the education setting.
translated_text: 这些网站得到了大量的关注, 特别是在教育领域.

original_text: There are positive aspects to these websites, which include, being able to easily setup a class page which can include blogs, videos, photos, and other features.
translated_text: 这些网站有积极的方面, 其中包括, 能够轻松设置一个类页面, 可以包含博客,视频,照片和其他功能.

original_text: This page can easily be accessed by providing just one web address, which makes it easy to remember and easy to type in for students who may have trouble using the keyboard or with spelling.
translated_text: 这个页面可以轻松访问,只需提供一个网址,使得学生轻松记忆并轻松输入键盘或拼写问题.

original_text: It can be customized to make it easy to read and also with as much or little color as desired.
translated_text: 它可以定制,使其容易阅读,而且有多或少的颜色.

original_text: Attention Deficit Disorder "is a neurological syndrome whose classic defining triad of symptoms including impulsivity, distractibility, and hyperactivity or excess energy".
translated_text: 注意力缺陷障碍"是一种神经系统综合症,其典型的定义症状包括冲动性,分散注意力和过度活动或过量的能量.

original_text: It is not a learning disability, it is a learning disorder; it "affects 3 to 5 percent of all children, perhaps as many as 2 million American children".
translated_text: 这不是学习障碍,而是学习障碍;它"影响了三到五百分之三的儿童,可能是美国有200万儿童".

original_text: Children with ADD have a hard time focusing on things like school work, but they can concentrate on things they enjoy doing like playing games or watching their favorite cartoons or writing sentences without punctuation.
translated_text: 患有ADD的孩子很难专注于学校工作,但他们可以专注于他们喜欢做的事情,比如玩游戏,看他们最喜欢的卡通,或写句子.

original_text: These children tend to get into a lot of trouble, because they "engage in risky behaviors, get into fights, and challenge authority" in order to stimulate their brain, since their brain can not be stimulated by normal methods.
translated_text: 这些孩子往往会陷入很多麻烦,因为他们"会冒险的行为,架,挑战权威",以刺激他们的大脑,因为他们的大脑不能通过正常方法被刺激.

original_text: ADD affects relationships with other peers because other children can not understand why they act the way that they do or why they spell they way they do or that their maturity level is different.
translated_text: 其他孩子无法理解为什么他们表现得像他们一样,或者为什么他们拼写得像他们一样,或者他们的成熟程度是不同的.

original_text: As the ability to obtain knowledge and to learn changed in such a way as mentioned above the base rate at which knowledge was obtained changed.
translated_text: 随着获得知识和学习能力的变化,如上所述,知识获得的基率发生了变化.

original_text: The approach to obtaining information was different. No longer did pressure reside within individual recall, but the ability to recall text became more of a focus.
translated_text: 获取信息的方法不同.不再是个人回忆的压力,而是回忆文本的能力成为了重点.

original_text: In essence, the Renaissance made a significant change in the approach to learning and the dissemination of knowledge.
translated_text: 在本质上,文艺复兴对学习和知识传播的方法进行了重大变化.

original_text: Unlike other primates, hominids no longer use their hands in locomotion or bearing weight or swinging through the trees.
translated_text: 与其他灵长类动物不同,人类类动物不再使用手来移动,携带重量或在树木中摇摆.

original_text: The chimpanzee's hand and foot are similar in size and length, reflecting the hand's use for bearing weight in knuckle walking.
translated_text: 黑猩猩的手和脚的尺寸和长度相似,

original_text: The human hand is shorter than the foot, with straighter phalanges.
translated_text: 人手比脚更短,手更直.

original_text: Fossil hand bones two million to three million years old reveal this shift in specialization of the hand from locomotion to manipulation.
translated_text: 两到三百万年历史的手骨化石显示了手从运动转向操纵的专业化转变.

original_text: Some people believe that experiencing many artificially induced lucid dreams often enough can be very exhausting.
translated_text: 一些人认为, 经历许多人工诱导的清晰梦想,

original_text: The main reason for this phenomenon is the result of the lucid dreams expanding the length of time between REM states.
translated_text: 这种现象的主要原因是清晰的梦想扩大REM状态之间的时间长度.

original_text: With fewer REMs per night, this state in which you experience actual sleep and your body recovers becomes infrequent enough to become a problem.
translated_text: 由于每晚 REM 频率较少,

original_text: This is just as exhausting as if you were to wake up every twenty or thirty minutes and watch TV.
translated_text: 这就像每20到30分钟就醒来看电视一样.

original_text: The effect is dependent on how often your brain attempts to lucidly dream per night.
translated_text: 这种效果取决于你的大脑每晚有多少次试图清晰地做梦.

original_text: Things did not go well for the Italians in North Africa almost from the start. Within a week of Italy's declaration of war on June 10, 1940, the British 11th Hussars had seized Fort Capuzzo in Libya.
translated_text: 在1940年6月10日意大利宣战后一周内,英国第十一军军占领了利比亚的卡普兹索堡.

original_text: In an ambush east of Bardia, the British captured the Italian Tenth Army's Engineer-in-Chief, General Lastucci.
translated_text: 在巴尔迪亚东部的伏击中,英国人俘获了意大利第十军的总工程师拉斯图奇将军.

original_text: On June 28, Marshal Italo Balbo, the Governor-General of Libya and apparent heir to Mussolini, was killed by friendly fire while landing in Tobruk.
translated_text: 6月28日,利比亚总督兼穆索利尼的继承人伊塔罗·巴尔波元在东布鲁克着陆时被友好枪击杀害.

original_text: The modern sport of fencing is played at many levels, from students learning at a university to professional and Olympic competition.
translated_text: 现代球运动在许多层面上进行,从大学学习的学生到专业和奥运会比赛.

original_text: The sport is primarily played in a duel format, one fencer dueling another.
translated_text: 这项运动主要以决斗格式进行,一个士对另一个决斗.

original_text: Golf is a game in which players use clubs to hit balls into holes.
translated_text: 高尔夫是玩家用棍子打球进洞的游戏.

original_text: Eighteen holes are played during a regular round, with players usually starting on the first hole on the course and finishing on the eighteenth.
translated_text: 在常规赛中,玩家通常从赛场上的第一洞开始,并在第十八洞结束.

original_text: The player who takes the fewest strokes, or swings of the club, to complete the course wins.
translated_text: 最少打球的球员赢得了胜利.

original_text: The game is played on grass, and the grass around the hole is mown shorter and called the green.
translated_text: 这个游戏是在草地上玩的, 洞周围的草被剪短, 称为绿色.

original_text: Perhaps the most common type of tourism is what most people associate with traveling: Recreation tourism.
translated_text: 也许最常见的旅游是大多数人与旅游联系的:娱乐旅游.

original_text: This is when people go to a place that is very different from their regular day-to-day life to relax and have fun.
translated_text: 这就是人们去一个与日常生活非常不同的地方放松和娱乐.

original_text: Beaches, theme parks and camp grounds are often the most common places frequented by recreational tourists.
translated_text: 游客经常去海,游乐公园和露营场所.

original_text: If the objective of one’s visit to a particular place is to get to know its history and culture then this type of tourism is known as cultural tourism.
translated_text: 如果去某个地方的目的是了解它的历史和文化,那么这种旅游被称为文化旅游.

original_text: Tourists may visit different landmarks of a particular country or they may simply opt to focus on just one area.
translated_text: 旅游者可能会参观一个特定国家的不同地标,或者他们只能专注于一个地区.

original_text: The Colonists, seeing this activity, had also called for reinforcements.
translated_text: 殖民者看到这种活动,他们也要求增援.

original_text: Troops reinforcing the forward positions included the 1st and 3rd New Hampshire regiments of 200 men, under Colonels John Stark and James Reed (both later became generals).
translated_text: 增强前位置的部队包括200名新罕布什尔州第1和第3个团,由约翰·斯塔克和詹姆斯·里德上校 (后者都成为将军) 领导.

original_text: Stark's men took positions along the fence on the north end of the Colonist's position.
translated_text: 斯塔克的士兵在殖民者位置的北端的围上定位.

original_text: When low tide opened a gap along the Mystic River along the northeast of the peninsula, they quickly extended the fence with a short stone wall to the north ending at the water's edge on a small beach.
translated_text: 当低潮在半岛东北部沿着密斯蒂河开辟了一个隙时,

original_text: Gridley or Stark placed a stake about 100 feet (30 m) in front of the fence and ordered that no one fire until the regulars passed it.
translated_text: 格里德利或斯塔克把木头放在围前30米左右,
