translated_text: 여행 할 때, 모든 일 이 '집'처럼 되지 않기를 기대 하십시오. 관습, 법, 음식, 교통, 숙소, 표준, 언어 등은 어느 정도 당신 거주지와는 다를 것 입니다.

original_text: This is something you always need to keep in mind, to avoid disappointment or perhaps even distaste over local ways to do things.
translated_text: 이 점 을 항상 염두 에 두어야 하며, 지역 에서 일 하는 방식 을 실망 시키거나 심지어 싫어 하는 것 을 피 해야 한다.

original_text: Travel agencies have been around since the 19th century. A travel agent is usually a good option for a journey which extends beyond a traveller's previous experience of nature, culture, language or low-income countries.
translated_text: 여행 에이전지는 19세기부터 존재하고 있습니다. 여행 에이전트는 일반적으로 여행자의 자연, 문화, 언어 또는 저소득 국가에 대한 이전 경험을 뛰어넘는 여행에 대한 좋은 옵션입니다.

original_text: Although most agencies are willing to take on most regular bookings, many agents specialise in particular types of travel, budget ranges or destinations.
translated_text: 대부분의 에이전시들은 대부분의 정기적인 예약에 기꺼이 참여하지만, 많은 에이전시들은 특정 유형의 여행, 예산 범위 또는 목적지에 특화되어 있습니다.

original_text: It can be better to use an agent who frequently books similar trips to yours.
translated_text: 당신의 여행과 비슷한 여행을 자주 예약하는 에이전트를 이용하는 것이 더 낫습니다.

original_text: Take a look at what trips the agent is promoting, whether on a website or in a shop window.
translated_text: 에이전트가 어떤 트리프를 홍보하고 있는지 확인해 보세요. 웹사이트나 상점 창에서요.

original_text: If you want to see the world on the cheap, for necessity, lifestyle or challenge, there are some ways to do that.
translated_text: 만약 당신이 필요성, 생활방식 또는 도전으로 세상을 저렴하게 보고 싶다면,

original_text: Basically, they fall into two categories: Either work while you travel or try and limit your expenses. This article is focused on the latter.
translated_text: 이 기사 는 두 가지 범주 로 나뉘어 있습니다. 여행 하는 동안 일 하거나 지출 을 제한 하는 것 입니다.

original_text: For those willing to sacrifice comfort, time and predictability to push expenses down close to zero, see minimum budget travel.
translated_text: 편안함, 시간 및 예측가능성을 희생하고 비용을 거의 0으로 낮추기 위해 준비하는 사람들을 위해 최소한의 예산 여행을 참조하십시오.

original_text: The advice assumes that travellers do not steal, trespass, participate in the illegal market, beg, or otherwise exploit other people for their own gain.
translated_text: 이 조언 은 여행자 들 이 자신 의 이익을 위해 다른 사람 들 을 훔치거나 침입 하거나 불법 시장 에 참여 하거나 구부짖거나 다른 방법으로 착취 하지 않음을 가정 한다.

original_text: An immigration checkpoint is usually the first stop when disembarking from a plane, a ship, or another vehicle.
translated_text: 이민자 체크포스트는 보통 비행기, 배, 또는 다른 차량에서 착륙할 때 첫 번째 정류가 됩니다.

original_text: In some cross-border trains inspections are done on the running train and you should have valid ID with you when boarding one of those trains.
translated_text: 일부 국경을 넘는 열차에서는 열차에서 검사가 이루어지고 있으며 열차에 탑승할 때 유효한 주민등록증을 가지고 있어야 합니다.

original_text: On night sleeper trains, passports may be collected by the conductor so that you do not have your sleep interrupted.
translated_text: 야간 잠자리 열차에서, 운전자는 당신의 수면을 방해하지 않기 위해 여권을 수집할 수 있습니다.

original_text: Registration is an additional requirement for the visa process. In some countries, you must register your presence and address where you are staying with the local authorities.
translated_text: 주민등록은 비자 절차에 추가적인 요건입니다. 일부 국가에서는 주민등록과 거주지 주소를 지방자치단체에 등록해야 합니다.

original_text: This might require filling out a form with the local police or a visit to the immigration offices.
translated_text: 이 경우 현지 경찰에 양식을 작성하거나 이민청을 방문해야 합니다.

original_text: In many countries with such a law, local hotels will handle the registration (make sure to ask).
translated_text: 그러한 법이 있는 많은 나라들에서, 현지 호텔들은 등록을 처리할 것입니다.

original_text: In other cases, only those staying outside of tourist accommodations need to register.  However, this makes the law much more obscure, so find out beforehand.
translated_text: 다른 경우, 관광객 숙소 밖 에 머무는 사람 들 만 이 등록 해야 합니다. 하지만, 이 법 은 훨씬 더 미묘 하게 됩니다. 그러므로 미리 알아보십시오.

original_text: Architecture is concerned with the design and construction of buildings. The architecture of a place is often a tourist attraction in its own right.
translated_text: 건축은 건물의 설계와 건설에 관한 것입니다. 장소의 건축은 종종 그 자체로 관광 명소입니다.

original_text: Many buildings are quite beautiful to look at and the view from a tall building or from a cleverly-positioned window can be a beauty to behold.
translated_text: 많은 건물이 보기에는 매우 아름답고 높은 건물이나 현명한 창문에서 볼 수 있는 전망은 아름다울 수 있습니다.

original_text: Architecture overlaps considerably with other fields including urban planning, civil engineering, decorative arts, interior design and landscape design.
translated_text: 건축은 도시계획, 토목공학, 장식 예술, 인테리어 디자인 및 풍경 디자인을 포함한 다른 분야와 상당히 겹친다.

original_text: Given how remote many of the pueblos are, you won't be able to find a significant amount of nightlife without traveling to Albuquerque or Santa Fe.
translated_text: 많은 Pueblos이 얼마나 멀리 떨어져 있는지 고려하면 알부케르크나 산타페로 여행하지 않고도 상당한 양의 야간 생활을 찾을 수 없습니다.

original_text: However, nearly all of the casinos listed above serve drinks, and several of them bring in name-brand entertainment (primarily the large ones immediately surrounding Albuquerque and Santa Fe).
translated_text: 그러나, 위에 나열된 거의 모든 카지노는 음료수를 제공하며, 그들 중 몇몇은 이름의 브랜드 엔터테인먼트를 제공합니다 (특히 알부케르크와 산타페를 둘러싼 큰 곳).

original_text: Beware: small-town bars here are not always good places for the out-of-state visitor to hang out.
translated_text: 조심하세요. 작은 마을의 술집들은 항상 외국 방문객들이 어울리는 좋은 장소가 아닙니다.

original_text: For one thing, northern New Mexico has significant problems with drunk driving, and the concentration of intoxicated drivers is high close to small-town bars.
translated_text: 첫째, 뉴멕시코 북부에는 음주운전 문제가 있고, 소규모 도시 술집 근처에는 음주운전자의 수치가 높습니다.

original_text: Unwanted murals or scribble is known as graffiti.
translated_text: 바람직하지 않은 벽화 또는 스크립트는 그래피티로 알려져 있습니다.

original_text: While it's far from a modern phenomenon, most people probably associate it with youth vandalizing public and private property using spray paint.
translated_text: 현대적인 현상과는 거리가 멀지만 대부분의 사람들은 아마도 스프레이 페인트를 사용하여 공공 및 민간 재산을 파괴하는 청소년과 연관시킵니다.

original_text: However, nowadays there are established graffiti artists, graffiti events and "legal" walls. Graffiti paintings in this context often resemble artworks rather than illegible tags.
translated_text: 그러나 오늘날에는 그래피티 예술가, 그래피티 이벤트 및 "법적" 벽이 있습니다. 이 맥락에서 그래피티 그림은 종종 읽을 수없는 태그보다는 예술 작품과 비슷합니다.

original_text: Boomerang throwing is a popular skill that many tourists want to acquire.
translated_text: 부메랑 던지는 것은 많은 관광객들이 습득하고자 하는 인기 있는 기술입니다.

original_text: If you want to learn throwing a boomerang that comes back to your hand, make sure you have a suitable boomerang for returning.
translated_text: 만약 당신이 손에 돌아오는 부메랑을 던지는 법을 배우고 싶다면, 돌아오는 데 적합한 부메랑을 가지고 있는지 확인하십시오.

original_text: Most boomerangs available in Australia are in fact non-returning. It is best for beginners to not try throwing in windy
translated_text: 오스트레일리아에서 볼 수 있는 대부분의 부메랑은 실제로 돌아오지 않습니다. 초보자가 바람을 던지려고 하지 않는 것이 좋습니다.

original_text: A Hangi Meal is cooked in a hot pit in the ground.
translated_text: 힌가리 식사는 땅에 있는 뜨거운 덩굴에서 요리된다.

original_text: The pit is either heated with hot stones from a fire, or in some places geothermal heat makes areas of ground naturally hot.
translated_text: 굴은 불에서 온난한 돌로 열거나, 어떤 곳에서는 지열로 인해 땅이 자연적으로 뜨거워진다.

original_text: The hangi is often used to cook a traditional roast style dinner.
translated_text: 기니지는 종종 전통적인 로스트 스타일의 저녁 식사를 요리하는 데 사용됩니다.

original_text: Several places in Rotorua offer geothermal hangi, while other hangi can be sampled in Christchurch, Wellington and elsewhere.
translated_text: 로토루아의 여러 곳에서는 지열 지를 제공하며, 다른 지를 크라이스트처치, 웰링턴 등지에서 샘플링 할 수 있습니다.

original_text: MetroRail has two classes on commuter trains in and around Cape Town: MetroPlus (also called First Class) and Metro (called Third Class).
translated_text: 메트로레일은 케이프타운 및 그 주변 교외 열차에서 두 개의 클래스를 가지고 있습니다: 메트로플러스 (또한 퍼스트 클래스라고도 불립니다) 및 메트로 (제3 클래스라고도 불립니다).

original_text: MetroPlus is more comfortable and less crowded but slightly more expensive, though still cheaper than normal metro tickets in Europe.
translated_text: 메트로플러스는 더 편안하고 더 적은 사람이 많지만 약간 더 비싸지만 여전히 유럽에서 일반적인 지하철 티켓보다 저렴합니다.

original_text: Every train has both MetroPlus and Metro coaches; the MetroPlus coaches are always on the end of the train nearest Cape Town.
translated_text: 모든 열차에는 메트로플러스 (MetroPlus) 와 메트로 (Metro) 버스가 있습니다. 메트로플러스 (MetroPlus) 버스는 항상 가장 가까운 케이프타운의 열차 끝에 있습니다.

original_text: Carrying for others - Never let your bags out of your sight, especially when you are crossing international borders.
translated_text: 다른 사람 들 을 위해 짐 을 들고 다니는 것 - 특히 국제 국경 을 넘어가고 있을 때, 결코 짐 을 눈에 띄지 않게 하라.

original_text: You could find yourself being used as a drug carrier without your knowledge, which will land you in a great deal of trouble.
translated_text: 당신은 자신도 모르는 사이에 마약 운반자로 사용되고 있을 수도 있고, 이로 인해 큰 곤경에 빠질 수도 있습니다.

original_text: This includes waiting in line, as drug-sniffing dogs could be used at any time without notice.
translated_text: 여기에는 노선을 기다리는 것도 포함되는데, 마약취하는 개들은 언제든 예고 없이 사용할 수 있기 때문입니다.

original_text: Some countries have exceedingly draconian punishments even for first time offenses; these can include prison sentences of over 10 years or death.
translated_text: 일부 나라 에서는 처음 범죄 를 저지른 사람 들 에게도 극심 한 처벌 을 받는다. 그 들 은 10 년 이상 징역 또는 사형 을 받을 수 있습니다.

original_text: Unattended bags are a target for theft and can also attract attention from authorities wary of bomb threats.
translated_text: 방치되지 않은 가방은 도둑질의 대상이며 폭탄 위협에 대해 경계하는 당국의 관심도 끌 수 있습니다.

original_text: At home, due to this constant exposure to the local germs, odds are very high that you're already immune to them.
translated_text: 가정에서는 이러한 지역 세균에 대한 지속적인 노출로 인해 이미 면역력이 높습니다.

original_text: But in other parts of the world, where the bacteriological fauna are new to you, you're far more likely to run into problems.
translated_text: 하지만 세계 다른 지역에서는 박테리아학적 동물이 새로운 곳이라면 문제가 발생할 확률이 훨씬 높습니다.

original_text: Also, in warmer climates bacteria both grow more quickly and survive longer outside the body.
translated_text: 또한 더 따뜻한 기후에서 박테리아는 더 빨리 성장하고 몸 밖으로 더 오래 생존합니다.

original_text: Thus the scourges of Delhi Belly, the Pharaoh's Curse, Montezuma's Revenge, and their many friends.
translated_text: 그래서 델리 배의 재앙, 파라오의 저주, 몬테즈마의 복수, 그리고 그들의 많은 친구들.

original_text: As with respiratory problems in colder climates, intestinal problems in hot climates are fairly common and in most cases are distinctly annoying but not really dangerous.
translated_text: 추운 기후의 호흡기 문제와 마찬가지로, 뜨거운 기후의 장질환은 상당히 흔하며 대부분의 경우 매우 짜증나는 것이지만 실제로 위험하지는 않습니다.

original_text: If traveling in a developing country for the first time – or in a new part of the world – don't underestimate the potential culture shock.
translated_text: 개발도상국에 처음 여행하는 경우  또는 세계의 새로운 지역에  잠재적인 문화 충격을 과소평가하지 마십시오.

original_text: Many a stable, capable traveler has been overcome by the newness of developing world travel, where many little cultural adjustments can add up quickly.
translated_text: 많은 안정적이고 능력 있는 여행자는 개발도상국 여행의 새로운 모습에 의해 극복되었습니다.

original_text: Especially in your initial days, consider splurging on Western-style and -quality hotels, food, and services to help acclimatize.
translated_text: 특히 초기에는 서양 스타일의 호텔, 음식, 서비스 등에 돈을 버는 것을 고려해 보세요.

original_text: Do not sleep on a mattress or pad on the ground in areas where you do not know the local fauna.
translated_text: 지역 동물 을 모르는 곳 에서 매트래스 이나 바닥 에 누워 잠을 자지 마십시오.

original_text: If you are going to camp out, bring a camp cot or hammock to keep you away from snakes, scorpions and such.
translated_text: 캠핑을 할 경우, 뱀, 스korpions 등으로부터 멀리 유지하기 위해 캠프 침대 또는 망치 가져가십시오.

original_text: Fill your home with a rich coffee in the morning and some relaxing chamomile tea at night.
translated_text: 아침에는 풍부한 커피와 밤에는 편안한 호모밀 차로 집을 가득 채우세요.

original_text: When you're on a staycation, you have the time to treat yourself and take a few extra minutes to brew up something special.
translated_text: 휴가를 할 때, 당신은 자신을 치료하고 몇 분 더 특별한 것을 만드는 시간을 가질 수 있습니다.

original_text: If you're feeling more adventurous, take the opportunity to juice or blend up some smoothies:
translated_text: 만약 당신이 더 모험적이라고 생각한다면, 주스를 먹거나 스무티를 섞으세요.

original_text: maybe you'll discover a simple beverage that you can make for breakfast when you're back to your daily routine.
translated_text: 어쩌면 아침 식사로 만들 수 있는 간단한 음료를 발견할 수도 있습니다. 일상으로 돌아왔을 때 말이죠.

original_text: If you live in a city with a varied drinking culture, go to bars or pubs in neighborhoods you don't frequent.
translated_text: 다양한 음주 문화가 있는 도시에서 살고 있다면, 자주 방문하지 않는 이웃의 술집이나 술집에 가십시오.

original_text: For those unfamiliar with medical jargon, the words infectious and contagious have distinct meanings.
translated_text: 의학 용어에 익숙하지 않은 사람들에게는 전염병과 전염병이라는 단어들은 서로 다른 의미를 가지고 있습니다.

original_text: An infectious disease is one that is caused by a pathogen, such as a virus, bacterium, fungus or other parasites.
translated_text: 전염병은 바이러스, 박테리아, 곰팡이 또는 다른 기생충과 같은 병원균으로 인해 발생하는 질병입니다.

original_text: A contagious disease is a disease which is easily transmitted by being in the vicinity of an infected person.
translated_text: 전염병은 감염된 사람의 근처에 있으면 쉽게 전염되는 질병입니다.

original_text: Many governments require visitors entering, or residents leaving, their countries to be vaccinated for a range of diseases.
translated_text: 많은 정부는 여러 질병에 대한 백신 접종을 입국하거나 출국하는 방문객들에게 요구합니다.

original_text: These requirements may often depend on what countries a traveller has visited or intends to visit.
translated_text: 이러한 요구 사항은 종종 여행자가 방문한 국가 또는 방문할 계획에 따라 달라질 수 있습니다.

original_text: One of strong points of Charlotte, North Carolina, is that it has an abundance of high-quality options for families.
translated_text: 노스캐롤라이나 샤를로트의 강점 중 하나는 가족들을 위한 좋은 선택지가 풍부하다는 것입니다.

original_text: Residents from other areas often cite family-friendliness as a primary reason for moving there, and visitors often find the city easy to enjoy with children around.
translated_text: 다른 지역 의 거주자 들 은 종종 가족 친화적 인 이유 를 그 지역 으로 이사 하는 주된 이유 로 언급 하며, 방문자 들 은 종종 어린이 들 과 함께 그 도시 를 즐기기 쉽다는 것 을 발견 한다.

original_text: In the past 20 years, the amount of child-friendly options in Uptown Charlotte has grown exponentially.
translated_text: 지난 20년 동안 샬럿의 아가씨 친화적인 선택의 수는 기하급수적으로 증가했습니다.

original_text: Taxis are not generally used by families in Charlotte, though they can be of some use in certain circumstances.
translated_text: 택시는 일반적으로 샬럿의 가족들에 의해 사용되지는 않지만 특정 상황에서 유용하게 사용할 수 있습니다.

original_text: There is a surcharge for having more than 2 passengers, so this option might be more expensive than necessary.
translated_text: 2명 이상의 승객을 탑승할 경우 추가 요금이 부과되므로 이 옵션은 필요 이상으로 비용이 들 수 있습니다.

original_text: Antarctica is the coldest place on Earth, and surrounds the South Pole.
translated_text: 남극은 지구에서 가장 추운 곳이고 남극을 둘러싸고 있습니다.

original_text: Tourist visits are costly, demand physical fitness, can only take place in summer Nov-Feb, and are largely limited to the Peninsula, Islands and Ross Sea.
translated_text: 관광 방문은 비용이 많이 들고 신체적 체력을 요구하며, 여름 11~2월에만 진행될 수 있으며, 반도, 섬 및 로스 해에만 국한되어 있습니다.

original_text: A couple of thousand staff live here in summer in some four dozen bases mostly in those areas; a small number stay over winter.
translated_text: 몇 천 명의 직원들이 여름철에 이 곳에 거주하고 있으며, 대부분 이 지역에 있는 약 40여개의 기지에 거주하고 있으며, 적은 수의 직원들은 겨울철에 머물고 있습니다.

original_text: Inland Antarctica is a desolate plateau covered by 2-3 km of ice.
translated_text: 내륙 남극은 2~3km의 얼음으로 덮인 황폐한 고원이다.

original_text: Occasional specialist air tours go inland, for mountaineering or to reach the Pole, which has a large base.
translated_text: 때때로 전문적인 항공 투어는 내륙, 산악 또는 큰 기지를 가진 폴르에 도달하기 위해 이동합니다.

original_text: The South Pole Traverse (or Highway) is a 1600 km trail from McMurdo Station on the Ross Sea to the Pole.
translated_text: 남극 트래버스 (또는 고속도로) 는 로스 해에 있는 맥머도 역에서 폴로까지 1600km의 경로이다.

original_text: It's compacted snow with crevasses filled in and marked by flags. It can only be traveled by specialized tractors, hauling sleds with fuel and supplies.
translated_text: 그것은 깃발로 표시된 틈이 가득한 밀집된 눈입니다. 전용 트랙터만 이동할 수 있습니다. 연료와 물품을 가진 슬레드를 운반합니다.

original_text: These aren't very nimble so the trail has to take a long swerve around the Transantarctic Mountains to come onto the plateau.
translated_text: 이들은 매우 민첩하지 않기 때문에 트랜스안타르틱 산맥을 돌아다니는 길이가 길어서 평야에 도달해야 합니다.

original_text: The most common cause for accidents in winter is slippery roads, pavements (sidewalks) and especially steps.
translated_text: 겨울철 사고의 가장 흔한 원인은 미끄러운 도로, 통행 (보행) 그리고 특히 계단이다.

original_text: At a minimum, you need footwear with suitable soles. Summer shoes are usually very slippery on ice and snow, even some winter boots are deficient.
translated_text: 여름 의 신발 은 보통 얼음 과 눈 에 매우 미끄러울 수 있으며, 겨울 의 신발 은 부족 합니다.

original_text: The pattern should be deep enough, 5 mm (1/5 inch) or more, and the material soft enough in cold temperatures.
translated_text: 패턴은 충분히 깊고, 5mm (1/5 인치) 이상이고, 물질은 차가운 온도에서 충분히 부드러워져야 합니다.

original_text: Some boots have studs and there is studded add-on equipment for slippery conditions, suitable for most shoes and boots, for the heels or heels and sole.
translated_text: 일부 부츠에는 톱니가 있고, 대부분의 신발과 부츠, 발꿈치 또는 발꿈치 및 발가락에 적합한 미끄러운 조건에 대한 부착 장비가 있습니다.

original_text: Heels should be low and wide. Sand, gravel or salt (calcium chloride) is often scattered on roads or paths to improve traction.
translated_text: 힐은 낮고 넓어야 합니다. 모래, 자갈 또는 소금 (칼슘 클로라이드) 은 길이나 경로에 흩어져 있어 견인력을 향상시킵니다.

original_text: Avalanches are not an abnormality; steep slopes can hold only so much slow, and the excess volumes will come down as avalanches.
translated_text: 돌풍은 비정상적이지 않습니다. 은 기울기는 너무 느리게 지낼 수 있고, 과잉량은 돌풍으로 떨어질 것입니다.

original_text: The problem is that snow is sticky, so it needs some triggering to come down, and some snow coming down can be the triggering event for the rest.
translated_text: 문제는 눈이 붙기 때문에 떨어지기 위해 약간의 촉매가 필요하고, 어떤 눈이 떨어지는 것은 나머지 사람들에게 촉매가 될 수 있다는 것입니다.

original_text: Sometimes the original trigging event is the sun warming the snow, sometimes some more snowfall, sometimes other natural events, often a human.
translated_text: 때로는 태양이 눈이 따뜻하게 하는 것, 때로는 더 많은 눈이 내리는 것, 때로는 다른 자연적인 사건,

original_text: A tornado is a spinning column of very low-pressure air, which sucks the surrounding air inward and upward.
translated_text: 토네이도는 매우 낮은 압력 공기 중 회전하는 기둥입니다.

original_text: They generate high winds (often 100-200 miles/hour) and can lift heavy objects into the air, carrying them as the tornado moves.
translated_text: 그들은 강한 바람을 일으킨다 (일반적으로 100~200마일/시간) 그리고 토네이도가 움직일 때 무거운 물체를 공중에 들어올릴 수 있습니다.

original_text: They begin as funnels descending from storm clouds, and become "tornadoes" when they touch the ground.
translated_text: 그들은 폭풍 구름에서 내려오는 선로로 시작되고, 땅에 닿을 때 "토르나도"가 됩니다.

original_text: Personal VPN (virtual private network) providers are an excellent way of circumventing both political censorship and commercial IP-geofiltering.
translated_text: 개인 VPN (버추얼 프라이빗 네트워크) 제공자는 정치적 검열과 상업적 IP 지질 필터링을 모두 회피하는 훌륭한 방법입니다.

original_text: They are superior to web proxies for several reasons: They re-route all Internet traffic, not only http.
translated_text: 그들은 여러 가지 이유로 웹 프록시보다 우월합니다. 그들은 http뿐만 아니라 모든 인터넷 트래픽을 다시 라이트합니다.

original_text: They normally offer higher bandwidth and better quality of service. They are encrypted and thus harder to spy on.
translated_text: 일반적으로 더 높은 대역폭과 더 좋은 서비스 품질을 제공합니다. 그들은 암호화되어 있기 때문에 감시하기가 어렵습니다.

original_text: The media companies routinely lie about the purpose of this, claiming that it is to "prevent piracy".
translated_text: 언론 회사들은 이런 행위의 목적에 대해 거짓말을 하며 "해적 행위를 막기 위한 것"이라고 주장합니다.

original_text: In fact, region codes have absolutely no effect on illegal copying; a bit-for-bit copy of a disk will play just fine on any device where the original will.
translated_text: 사실, 지역 코드들은 불법 복제에 전혀 영향을 미치지 않습니다. 디스크의 작은 복사본은 원본이 원하는 모든 장치에서 완벽하게 재생됩니다.

original_text: The actual purpose is to give those companies more control over their markets; it's all about money spinning.
translated_text: 실제 목적은 이 회사들이 시장에 대한 통제력을 더 높이는 것입니다. 모든 것은 돈의 회전입니다.

original_text: Because calls are routed over the Internet, you do not need to use a phone company located where you live or where you travel.
translated_text: 인터넷 을 통해 전화 를 전송 하기 때문 에, 당신 이 사는 곳 이나 여행 하는 곳 에 있는 전화 회사 를 사용 할 필요 가 없습니다.

original_text: There is also no requirement that you obtain a local number from the community in which you live; you can obtain a satellite Internet connection in the wilds of Chicken, Alaska and select a number which claims you're in sunny Arizona.
translated_text: 또한 여러분이 살고 있는 지역사회에서 지역 번호를 얻어야 할 필요도 없습니다. 여러분은 알래스카 치킨의 야생에서 인공위성 인터넷 연결을 얻을 수 있습니다. 그리고 햇볕이 잘 드는 애리조나에 있다고 주장하는 번호를 선택할 수 있습니다.

original_text: Often, you have to buy a global number separately that allows PSTN phones to call you. Where the number is from makes a difference for people calling you.
translated_text: 종종, PSTN 전화가 당신을 호출할 수 있는 글로벌 번호를 따로 구입해야 합니다. 번호가 어디에서 왔는지 전화하는 사람들에게는 큰 차이를 만듭니다.

original_text: Real-time text translator apps – applications that are capable of automatically translating whole segments of text from one language into another.
translated_text: 실시간 텍스트 번역기 응용 프로그램  한 언어에서 다른 언어로 전체 텍스트 세그먼트를 자동으로 번역할 수 있는 응용 프로그램.

original_text: Some of the applications in this category can even translate texts in foreign languages on signs or other objects in the real world when the user points the smartphone towards those objects.
translated_text: 이 카테고리의 일부 응용 프로그램은 심지어 사용자가 스마트폰을 그 물체로 가리키면 실제 세계에서 표지판이나 다른 물체에 외국어 텍스트를 번역할 수 있습니다.

original_text: The translation engines have improved dramatically, and now often give more or less correct translations (and more seldom gibberish), but some care is due, as they still may have gotten it all wrong.
translated_text: 번역 엔진은 급격히 개선되어 왔으며, 현재는 거의 정확한 번역을 (그리고 좀 더 드물게 가설적인 번역을) 하고 있습니다. 하지만 그들은 여전히 모든 것을 잘못 이해했을 수도 있기 때문에 약간의 주의가 필요합니다.

original_text: One of the most prominent apps in this category is Google Translate, which allows offline translation after downloading the desired language data.
translated_text: 이 카테고리에서 가장 주목받는 앱 중 하나는 원하는 언어 데이터를 다운로드한 후 오프라인 번역을 허용하는 Google 번역입니다.

original_text: Using GPS navigation apps on your smartphone can be the easiest and most convenient way to navigate when out of your home country.
translated_text: 스마트폰에서 GPS 내비게이션 앱을 사용하면 고향을 떠날 때 가장 쉽고 편리하게 내비게이션을 할 수 있습니다.

original_text: It can save money over buying new maps for a GPS, or a standalone GPS device or renting one from a car rental company.
translated_text: GPS를 위한 새로운 지도를 구입하거나 자율적인 GPS 장치를 구입하거나 렌터카 회사에서 렌터카를 구입하는 것보다 돈을 절약할 수 있습니다.

original_text: If you don't have a data connection for your phone, or when it is out of range, their performance can be limited or unavailable.
translated_text: 휴대 전화에 데이터 연결이 없다면, 또는 그 범위가 벗어난 경우, 그 성능은 제한되거나 사용할 수 없습니다.

original_text: Every corner store is filled with a confusing array of pre-paid phone cards that can be used from pay phones or ordinary telephones.
translated_text: 각 모퉁이 상점에는 전화기 또는 일반 전화기에서 사용할 수 있는 사전 지불 전화 카드의 혼란스러운 배열이 가득합니다.

original_text: While most cards are good for calling anywhere, some specialise in providing favourable call rates to specific groups of countries.
translated_text: 대부분의 카드는 어디서나 전화를 걸기에 적합하지만, 어떤 카드는 특정 국가 그룹에 유리한 통화율을 제공하는 데 특화되어 있습니다.

original_text: Access to these services is often through a toll-free telephone number that can be called from most phones without charge.
translated_text: 이러한 서비스를 이용하기 위해서는 종종 무상 전화번호를 통해 이용하실 수 있으며, 대부분의 전화기에서 무상 전화를 받을 수 있습니다.

original_text: Rules regarding regular photography also apply to video recording, possibly even more so.
translated_text: 정기적인 사진 촬영에 관한 규칙은 비디오 녹음에도 적용됩니다.

original_text: If just taking a photo of something isn't allowed, then you shouldn't even think of recording a video of it.
translated_text: 만약 그냥 무언가를 사진으로 찍는 것이 허용되지 않는다면, 동영상을 찍는 것도 생각해서는 안 됩니다.

original_text: If using a drone, check well in advance as to what you are allowed to film and what permits or additional licensing are required.
translated_text: 드론을 사용 하는 경우, 어떤 영상을 촬영할 수 있는지, 어떤 허가나 추가적인 라이센스가 필요한지 미리 확인하세요.

original_text: Flying a drone near an airport or over a crowd is almost always a bad idea, even if it's not illegal in your area.
translated_text: 공항 근처에 드론을 비행하거나 군중을 지나가는 것은 거의 항상 나쁜 생각입니다. 심지어는 여러분의 지역에서 불법이 아니더라도 말이죠.

original_text: Nowadays air travel is only rarely booked directly through the airline without first searching and comparing prices.
translated_text: 오늘날 항공 여행은 우선 가격을 검색하고 비교하지 않고 항공사를 통해 직접 예약하는 경우는 거의 없습니다.

original_text: Sometimes the same flight can have vastly differing prices at various agregators and it pays to compare search results and to also look at the website of the airline itself before booking.
translated_text: 때로는 같은 항공편은 다양한 요금에서 매우 다른 가격을 가질 수 있으며 검색 결과를 비교하고 예약하기 전에 항공사의 웹 사이트를 확인하는 것도 가치가 있습니다.

original_text: While you may not need a visa for short visits to certain countries as a tourist or for business, going there as an international student generally requires a longer stay than going there just as a casual tourist.
translated_text: 여행자나 사업자로서 일부 국가를 짧은 시간 동안 방문하기 위해서는 비자가 필요하지 않을 수도 있지만, 국제학생으로서 여행하기 위해서는 일반 여행자보다 더 긴 체류가 필요합니다.

original_text: In general, staying in any foreign country for an extended period of time will require you to obtain a visa in advance.
translated_text: 일반적으로 외국에서 장기간 체류하려면 미리 비자를 받아야 합니다.

original_text: Student visas generally have different requirements and application procedures from normal tourist or business visas.
translated_text: 학생 비자는 일반적으로 일반 관광 비자나 비즈니스 비자와 다른 요구 사항과 신청 절차가 있습니다.

original_text: For most countries, you will need an offer letter from the institution you wish to study at, and also evidence of funds to support yourself for at least the first year of your course.
translated_text: 대부분의 국가에서는 공부하고자 하는 기관의 제안서와 적어도 첫 학기 동안 자신을 지원하기 위한 자금 증명이 필요합니다.

original_text: Check with the institution, as well as the immigration department for the country you wish to study in for detailed requirements.
translated_text: 자세한 요구 사항은 공부하고자 하는 국가의 기관과 이민부에 문의하십시오.

original_text: Unless you are a diplomat, working overseas generally means that you will have to file income tax in the country you are based in.
translated_text: 외교관이 아니라면 해외에서 일하는 것은 일반적으로 본사를 둔 나라에서 소득세를 제출해야 한다는 것을 의미합니다.

original_text: Income tax is structured differently in different countries, and the tax rates and brackets vary widely from one country to another.
translated_text: 소득세의 구조는 각 나라마다 다르며, 세금 요금과 품목은 각 나라마다 크게 다르다.

original_text: In some federal countries, such as the United States and Canada, income tax is levied both at the federal level and at the local level, so the rates and brackets can vary from region to region.
translated_text: 미국이나 캐나다와 같은 일부 연방 국가에서는 연방 차원과 지방 차원에서 소득세가 부과되기 때문에 지역별로 요금과 관점은 다를 수 있습니다.

original_text: While immigration check is usually absent or a formality when you arrive in your homeland, customs control can be a hassle.
translated_text: 이민자 검사는 보통 존재하지 않거나 고향에 도착했을 때 정식적인 절차가 있지만, 관세 검사는 번거로울 수 있습니다.

original_text: Make sure you know what you can and cannot bring in and declare anything over the legal limits.
translated_text: 법적인 한계를 넘어서 어떤 것을 가져오거나 선언할 수 있는지 알고 있는지 확인하십시오.

original_text: The easiest way to get started in the business of travel writing is to hone your skills on an established travel blog website.
translated_text: 여행 글쓰기 사업을 시작하는 가장 쉬운 방법은 기존 여행 블로그 웹 사이트에서 자신의 기술을 향상시키는 것입니다.

original_text: After you become comfortable with formatting and editing on the web, then later, you might create your own website.
translated_text: 웹에서 포맷과 편집에 편안하게 된 후에, 나중에, 당신은 당신의 자신의 웹 사이트를 만들 수 있습니다.

original_text: Volunteering while travelling is a great way to make a difference but it's not just about giving.
translated_text: 여행하는 동안 자원봉사하는 것은 큰 변화를 가져올 수 있는 좋은 방법입니다. 하지만 그것은 단순히 기부하는 것이 아닙니다.

original_text: Living and volunteering in a foreign country is a great way to get to know a different culture, meet new people, learn about yourself, get a sense of perspective and even gain new skills.
translated_text: 외국에서 살고 자원봉사하는 것은 다른 문화를 알게 되고 새로운 사람들을 만나고 자신에 대해 배우고 새로운 관점을 느끼고 심지어 새로운 기술을 습득하는 좋은 방법입니다.

original_text: It can also be a good way to stretch a budget to allow a longer stay somewhere since many volunteer jobs provide room and board and a few pay a small salary.
translated_text: 또한 많은 자원봉사자들이 숙소와 식생활을 제공하고 몇몇은 적은 급여를 지불하기 때문에 더 오래 머물 수 있도록 예산을 늘리는 좋은 방법이 될 수 있습니다.

original_text: Vikings used the Russian waterways to get to the Black Sea and Caspian Sea. Parts of these routes can still be used. Check possible need for special permits, which may be difficult to get.
translated_text: 바이킹 들 은 흑해 와 카스피아 해 로 가는 러시아 수로 를 사용 하였다. 이 경로 들 의 일부 는 아직도 사용 할 수 있다. 특별 허가 를 받을 필요 가 있는 경우 를 확인 해 보십시오.

original_text: The White Sea–Baltic Canal connects the Arctic Ocean to the Baltic Sea, via Lake Onega, Lake Ladoga and Saint Petersburg, mostly by rivers and lakes.
translated_text: 백해 Baltic 운하는 북극해와 발트해를 연결하고 있으며, 오네가 호수, 라도가 호수, 상트페테르부르크 호수를 통해 주로 강과 호수로 연결된다.

original_text: Lake Onega is also connected to Volga, so coming from the Caspian Sea through Russia is still possible.
translated_text: 오네가 호수는 볼거리와도 연결되어 있기 때문에 카스피해에서 러시아를 거쳐 오는 것은 여전히 가능하다.

original_text: Be assured that once you hit the marinas everything will be pretty obvious. You will meet other boat hitchhikers and they will share their information with you.
translated_text: 항구에 도착하면 모든 것이 분명해질 것이고 다른 보트 히치하이커들을 만나게 될 것이고 그들은 그들의 정보를 여러분과 공유할 것입니다.

original_text: Basically you'll be putting up notices offering your help, pacing the docks, approaching people cleaning their yachts, trying to make contact with sailors in the bar, etc.
translated_text: 기본적으로 여러분은 여러분의 도움을 제안하는 통지를 올리고, 항구에 가며, 요트를 청소하는 사람들에게 접근하고, 바에 있는 선원들과 연락을 시도하고 있을 것입니다.

original_text: Try to talk to as many people as possible. After a while everyone will know you and will give you hints as to which boat is looking for someone.
translated_text: 가능한 한 많은 사람들과 이야기하려고 노력하세요. 시간이 지나면 모든 사람들이 당신을 알아보고 어떤 배를 찾고 있는지 알려줄 것입니다.

original_text: You should choose your Frequent Flyer airline in an alliance carefully.
translated_text: 얼라이언스에 있는 Frequent Flyer 항공사를 신중하게 선택해야 합니다.

original_text: Although you may think it is intuitive to join the airline you fly most, you should be aware that privileges offered are often different and frequent flyer points may be more generous under a different airline in the same alliance.
translated_text: 당신이 가장 많이 비행하는 항공사에 가입하는 것이 직관적이라고 생각할 수도 있지만, 종종 제공되는 특권이 다르다는 것을 알고 있어야 하며, 같은 동맹에 속한 다른 항공사에서 자주 비행하는 점들이 더 대대적일 수 있다는 것을 알아야 합니다.

original_text: Airlines such as Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways & Turkish Airlines have greatly expanded their services to Africa, and offer connections to many major African cities at competitive rates than other European airlines.
translated_text: 에미레이츠, 에티하드 에어웨이즈, 카타르 에어웨이즈 및 터키 항공 등 항공사는 아프리카로 서비스를 크게 확장했으며 다른 유럽 항공사보다 경쟁력 있는 요금으로 많은 주요 아프리카 도시로 연결을 제공합니다.

original_text: Turkish Airlines flies to 39 destinations in 30 African countries as of 2014.
translated_text: 터키 항공은 2014년 기준으로 아프리카 30개국 39개 목적지로 운항한다.

original_text: If you have additional travel time, check to see how your total fare quote to Africa compares with a round-the-world fare.
translated_text: 더 많은 여행 시간이 있다면, 아프리카에 대한 전체 요금 요금 요금 요금 요금 요금 요금 요금 요금 요금 요금 요금 요금 요금 요금 요금 요금 요금 요금 요금 요금 요금 요금 요금 요금 요금 요금 요금 요금 요금 요금 요금 요금 요금 요금 요금 요금 요금 요금 요금 요금 요금 요금 요금 요금 요금 요금 요금 요금 요금 요금 요금 요금 요금 요금 요금 요금 요금

original_text: Don't forget to add in the extra costs of additional visas, departure taxes, ground transportation, etc. for all those places outside of Africa.
translated_text: 아프리카 이외의 모든 장소에서 추가적인 비자, 출국 세금, 지상 운송 등에 대한 추가 비용을 추가하는 것을 잊지 마십시오.

original_text: If you want to fly around the world completely in the Southern Hemisphere, the choice of flights and destinations is limited due to the lack of transoceanic routes.
translated_text: 만약 당신이 전 세계를 완전히 남반구에서 비행하고 싶다면, 항공편과 목적지 선택은 바다를 가로지르는 노선의 부족으로 인해 제한됩니다.

original_text: No airline alliance covers all three ocean crossings in the Southern Hemisphere (and SkyTeam covers none of the crossings).
translated_text: 항공 동맹은 남반구에서 모든 3개의 바다를 가로지르는 것을 포함하지 않습니다 (그리고 스카이팀은 그 어느 한 통로를 포함하지 않습니다).

original_text: However, Star Alliance covers everything except the eastern South Pacific from Santiago de Chile to Tahiti, which is a LATAM Oneworld flight.
translated_text: 그러나 스타 얼라이언스는 동쪽 남태평양을 제외한 모든 것을 다루고 있습니다. 산티아고 데 칠레에서 타히티까지, 이는 LATAM 원월드 비행입니다.

original_text: This flight is not the only option if you want to skip the South Pacific and the west coast of South America. (see below)
translated_text: 이 비행은 남태평양과 남미 서부 해안을 건너뛰고 싶다면 유일한 옵션이 아닙니다. (아래를 참조)

original_text: In 1994, the ethnically Armenian Nagorno-Karabakh region of Azerbaijan waged war against the Azeris.
translated_text: 1994년, 아제르바이잔의 아르메니아족 내고르노 카라바흐 지역은 아제르바이잔족과 전쟁을 벌였다.

original_text: With Armenian backing, a new republic was created. However, no established nation - not even Armenia - officially recognizes it.
translated_text: 아르메니아 의 지원 을 받아 새로운 공화국 이 만들어졌다. 하지만, 정식 인정을 받은 나라 는 없다. 아르메니아 도 그렇게 하지 않는다.

original_text: Diplomatic arguments over the region continue to mar relations between Armenia and Azerbaijan.
translated_text: 이 지역에 대한 외교적 논쟁은 아르메니아와 아제르바이잔의 관계를 계속 파괴하고 있습니다.

original_text: The Canal District (Dutch: Grachtengordel) is the famous 17th-century district surrounding the Binnenstad of Amsterdam.
translated_text: 운하 구역 (네덜란드어: Grachtengordel) 은 암스테르담의 Binnenstad을 둘러싸고 있는 유명한 17세기 구역이다.

original_text: The whole district is designated as a UNESCO World Heritage Site for its unique cultural and historical value, and its property values are among the highest of the country.
translated_text: 이 지역 전체가 유네스코 세계 문화유산으로 지정되어 있어 독특한 문화적, 역사적 가치가 있으며, 그 재산 가치는 국내에서 가장 높습니다.

original_text: Cinque Terre, which means Five Lands, comprises the five small coastal villages of Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza and Monterosso located in the Italian region of Liguria.
translated_text: Cinque Terre는 이탈리아 리구리아 지역에 위치한 리오마지오레, 마나롤라, 코니글리아, 베르나자 및 몬테로소라는 다섯 개의 작은 해안 마을을 포함한다.

original_text: They are listed on the UNESCO World Heritage List.
translated_text: 그들은 유네스코 세계 문화 유산 목록에 등록되어 있습니다.

original_text: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
translated_text: 수 세기 동안, 사람 들 은 바다 를 바라볼 수 있는 절벽 에 이르기까지 험난하고 험난 한 풍경 에 세심 히 테라스 를 지었습니다.

original_text: Part of its charm is the lack of visible corporate development. Paths, trains and boats connect the villages, and cars cannot reach them from the outside.
translated_text: 그 매력의 일부분은 눈에 띄는 기업 발전이 없다는 것입니다. 경로, 열차 및 배가 마을을 연결하고 있으며 자동차는 외부에서 도달 할 수 없습니다.

original_text: The varieties of French which are spoken in Belgium and Switzerland differ slightly from the French spoken in France, though they are similar enough to be mutually intelligible.
translated_text: 벨기에와 스위스에서 사용되는 프랑스어 종류는 프랑스에서 사용되는 프랑스어와 약간 다르지만 상호 이해될 만큼 비슷합니다.

original_text: In particular, the numbering system in French-speaking Belgium and Switzerland has some slight peculiarities that are different from the French spoken in France, and the pronunciation of some words is slightly different.
translated_text: 특히 프랑스어를 사용하는 벨기에와 스위스의 번호 체계는 프랑스어로 사용되는 프랑스어와 약간 다른 특성을 가지고 있으며, 일부 단어들의 발음은 약간 다릅니다.

original_text: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
translated_text: 그럼에도 불구하고, 모든 프랑스어를 사용하는 벨기에와 스위스는 학교에서 표준 프랑스어를 배웠을 것입니다. 그래서 그들은 표준 프랑스어 번호 시스템을 사용해도 당신을 이해할 수 있습니다.

original_text: In many parts of the world, waving is a friendly gesture, indicating "hello."
translated_text: 세계 여러 곳 에서 악수 하는 것 은 우호적 인 행동 으로 "안녕하세요"를 나타냅니다.

original_text: However, in Malaysia, at least among the Malays in rural areas, it means "come over," similar to the index finger bent toward the body, a gesture which is used in certain Western countries, and should be used only for that purpose.
translated_text: 하지만 말레이시아에서는 적어도 농촌지역에 사는 말레이족들 사이에서, 그것은 몸으로 기울인 지표 손가락과 비슷하게 "올라"라는 뜻입니다.

original_text: Similarly, a British traveller in Spain may mistake a wave goodbye involving the palm facing the waver (rather than the person being waved at) as a gesture to come back.
translated_text: 이와 같이, 스페인 에 있는 영국 여행자 는 반짝이는 손바닥 이 반짝이는 사람 (반짝 반짝이는 사람 대신) 을 반짝이는 사람 으로서 반짝이는 것 을 다시 돌아오기 위한 행동 으로 생각 할 수 있다.

original_text: Auxiliary languages are artificial or constructed languages created with the intent of facilitating communication between peoples who would otherwise have difficulty communicating.
translated_text: 보조언어는 그렇지 않으면 의사소통에 어려움을 겪는 사람들 사이의 의사소통을 촉진하기위한 목적으로 만들어진 인공 또는 구성된 언어입니다.

original_text: They are separate from lingua francas, which are natural or organic languages that become dominant for one reason or another as means of communication between speakers of other languages.
translated_text: 언어는 자연어 또는 유기어로서 다른 언어 사용자들이 다른 언어를 사용하는 의사소통 수단으로서 어느 이유에서든 지배적인 언어입니다.

original_text: In the heat of the day, travelers can experience mirages that give the illusion of water (or other things).
translated_text: 낮의 열에 여행자들은 물 (또는 다른 것) 의 환상을 주는 미러지들을 경험할 수 있습니다.

original_text: These can be dangerous if the traveler pursue the mirage, wasting precious energy and remaining water.
translated_text: 여행자 가 그 미러지 를 추구하고, 귀중 한 에너지 와 남은 물 을 낭비 한다면 그 들 은 위험 할 수 있습니다.

original_text: Even the hottest of deserts can become extremely cold at night. Hypothermia is a real risk without warm clothing.
translated_text: 심지어 가장 뜨거운 사막 에서도 밤에 극히 추워질 수 있습니다. 따뜻 한 옷 을 입지 않은 상태 에서 히포테르미아는 실제 위험 합니다.

original_text: In summer, especially, you'll need to watch out for mosquitoes if you decide to hike through the rainforest.
translated_text: 특히 여름에는, 비가 내리는 숲을 산책하기로 결정한다면 모기들을 조심해야 합니다.

original_text: Even if you're driving through the subtropical rainforest, a few seconds with the doors open while you get inside the vehicle is enough time for mosquitoes to get in the vehicle with you.
translated_text: 만약 여러분이 열대지방의 열대우림을 지나가는 경우에도, 차량 안으로 들어가면서 문이 열려 있는 몇 초 동안 모기들이 여러분과 함께 차량에 들어갈 수 있는 충분한 시간입니다.

original_text: Bird flu, or more formally avian influenza, can infect both birds and mammals.
translated_text: 새 인플루엔자 (새 인플루엔자) 는 새와 포유류를 모두 감염시킬 수 있습니다.

original_text: Fewer than a thousand cases have ever been reported in humans, but some of them have been fatal.
translated_text: 인간에게서 발생한 사례는 1,000명 미만이지만, 그 중 일부는 치명적이었다.

original_text: Most have involved people who work with poultry, but there is also some risk to birdwatchers.
translated_text: 대부분의 경우 닭고기 관리에 종사하는 사람들이 참여했지만, 조류 관측자들에게도 위험이 있습니다.

original_text: Typical for Norway are steep fjords and valleys that suddenly give way to a high, more or less even plateau.
translated_text: 노르웨이에 대표적인 것은 급격한 피요드와 계곡들이 갑자기 높은 평평한 고원에 자리를 잡습니다.

original_text: These plateaus are often referred to as "vidde" meaning a wide, open treeless space, a boundless expanse.
translated_text: 이 고원지대는 종종 "vidde"라고 불립니다. 이는 넓은, 열린 나무 없는 공간, 무한한 넓이를 의미합니다.

original_text: In Rogaland and Agder they are usually called "hei" meaning a treeless moorland often covered in heather.
translated_text: 로갈랜드와 아그데르에서는 보통 "헤이"라고 불린다.

original_text: The glaciers are not stable, but flow down the mountain. This will cause cracks, crevasses, which may be obscured by snow bridges.
translated_text: 빙하는 안정적이지는 않지만 산 아래로 흐릅니다. 이 때문에 눈의 다리가 덮을 수 있는 균열, 균열이 발생할 수 있습니다.

original_text: The walls and roofs of ice caves can collapse and cracks can get closed.
translated_text: 얼음 동굴의 벽과 지붕이 무너지고 균열이 닫힐 수 있습니다.

original_text: At the edge of glaciers huge blocks break loose, fall down and perhaps jump or roll farther from the edge.
translated_text: 빙하의 가장자리에 거대한 블록이 풀리고 떨어지고 아마도 가장자리로부터 더 멀리 뛰어들거나 굴러갑니다.

original_text: The tourist season for the hill stations generally peaks during the Indian summer.
translated_text: 언덕역의 관광 시즌은 일반적으로 인도 여름에 가장 높습니다.

original_text: However, they have a different kind of beauty and charm during winter, with many hill stations receiving healthy amounts of snow and offering activities such as skiing and snowboarding.
translated_text: 그러나 겨울에는 다른 종류의 아름다움과 매력을 가지고 있으며, 많은 언덕역에서는 많은 양의 눈이 내리고 스키와 스노보드 등의 활동을 제공합니다.

original_text: Only a few airlines still offer bereavement fares, which slightly discount the cost of last-minute funeral travel.
translated_text: 몇 개만 항공사만이 여전히 추모 요금을 제공하고 있으며, 이는 마지막 순간에 장례 여행하는 비용을 약간 할인합니다.

original_text: Airlines that offer these include Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa for flights originating from the U.S. or Canada, and WestJet.
translated_text: 이러한 서비스를 제공하는 항공사는 에어 캐나다, 델타 에어 라인스, 루프탕사, 미국이나 캐나다에서 출발하는 항공편 및 웨스트젯을 포함한다.

original_text: In all cases, you must book by phone directly with the airline.
translated_text: 모든 경우에 전화로 항공사에게 직접 예약해야 합니다.

original_text: On Monday, scientists from the Stanford University School of Medicine announced the invention of a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type: a tiny printable chip that can be manufactured using standard inkjet printers for possibly about one U.S. cent each.
translated_text: सोमवार को स्टैनफोर्ड यूनिवर्सिटी स्कूल ऑफ मेडिसिन के वैज्ञानिकों ने एक नए डायग्नोस्टिक टूल के आविष्कार की घोषणा की जो कोशिकाओं को प्रकार के अनुसार क्रमबद्ध कर सकता हैः एक छोटा प्रिंटेबल चिप जिसे मानक इंकजेट प्रिंटरों का उपयोग करके लगभग एक अमेरिकी सेंट के लिए बनाया जा सकता है।

original_text: Lead researchers say this may bring early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria to patients in low-income countries, where the survival rates for illnesses such as breast cancer can be half those of richer countries.
translated_text: प्रमुख शोधकर्ताओं का कहना है कि इससे कम आय वाले देशों में रोगियों को कैंसर, क्षयरोग, एचआईवी और मलेरिया का प्रारंभिक पता लग सकता है, जहां स्तन कैंसर जैसी बीमारियों के लिए जीवित रहने की दर अमीर देशों की आधी हो सकती है।

original_text: The JAS 39C Gripen crashed onto a runway at around 9:30 am local time (0230 UTC) and exploded, closing the airport to commercial flights.
translated_text: जेएएस 39 सी ग्रिपेन स्थानीय समय (0230 UTC) के अनुसार सुबह 9:30 बजे एक रनवे पर दुर्घटनाग्रस्त हो गया और विस्फोट हो गया, जिससे हवाई अड्डा वाणिज्यिक उड़ानों के लिए बंद हो गया।

original_text: The pilot was identified as Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee.
translated_text: पायलट की पहचान स्क्वाड्रन लीडर Dilokrit Pattavee के रूप में की गई थी।

original_text: Local media reports an airport fire vehicle rolled over while responding.
translated_text: स्थानीय मीडिया की रिपोर्टों के अनुसार, हवाई अड्डे पर एक अग्निशमन वाहन प्रतिक्रिया करते समय पलट गया।

original_text: 28-year-old Vidal had joined Barça three seasons ago, from Sevilla.
translated_text: 28 वर्षीय विडल तीन सीज़न पहले सेविला से बार्सा में शामिल हुए थे।

original_text: Since moving to the Catalan-capital, Vidal had played 49 games for the club.
translated_text: कैटलन-राजधानी में जाने के बाद से, विडल ने क्लब के लिए 49 मैच खेले थे।

original_text: The protest started around 11:00 local time (UTC+1) on Whitehall opposite the police-guarded entrance to Downing Street, the Prime Minister's official residence.
translated_text: विरोध प्रदर्शन स्थानीय समय (यूटीसी+1) पर वाइटहॉल में डाउनिंग स्ट्रीट, प्रधानमंत्री के आधिकारिक निवास के पुलिस-सुरक्षित प्रवेश द्वार के सामने लगभग 11:00 बजे शुरू हुआ।

original_text: Just after 11:00, protesters blocked traffic on the northbound carriage in Whitehall.
translated_text: 11:00 बजे के ठीक बाद, प्रदर्शनकारियों ने व्हाइटहॉल में उत्तर की ओर जाने वाली गाड़ी पर यातायात को अवरुद्ध कर दिया।

original_text: At 11:20, the police asked the protesters to move back on to the pavement, stating that they needed to balance the right to protest with the traffic building up.
translated_text: 11:20 बजे, पुलिस ने प्रदर्शनकारियों से पैदल पर वापस जाने के लिए कहा, यह कहते हुए कि उन्हें विरोध करने के अधिकार को ट्रैफ़िक के बढ़ने के साथ संतुलित करने की आवश्यकता है।

original_text: Around 11:29, the protest moved up Whitehall, past Trafalgar Square, along the Strand, passing by Aldwych and up Kingsway towards Holborn where the Conservative Party were holding their Spring Forum in the Grand Connaught Rooms hotel.
translated_text: लगभग 11:29 बजे, विरोध प्रदर्शन वाइटहॉल, ट्रैफल्गर स्क्वायर के पास, स्ट्रैंड के साथ, ऑल्डविच से होकर और किंग्सवे की ओर होलबर्न की ओर चला गया जहां कंजरवेटिव पार्टी ग्रैंड कॉनॉट रूम्स होटल में अपना स्प्रिंग फोरम आयोजित कर रही थी।

original_text: Nadal's head to head record against the Canadian is 7–2.
translated_text: कनाडाई के खिलाफ नाडाल का रिकॉर्ड 72 है।

original_text: He recently lost against Raonic in the Brisbane Open.
translated_text: वह हाल ही में ब्रिस्बेन ओपन में राओनिक से हार गए।

original_text: Nadal bagged 88% net points in the match winning 76 points in the first serve.
translated_text: नाडाल ने मैच में 88% शुद्ध अंक हासिल किए और पहले सर्व में 76 अंक जीते।

original_text: After the match, King of Clay said, "I am just excited about being back in the final rounds of the most important events. I am here to try to win this."
translated_text: मैच के बाद, किंग ऑफ क्ले ने कहा, "मैं केवल सबसे महत्वपूर्ण घटनाओं के अंतिम दौर में वापस आने के लिए उत्साहित हूं। मैं यहां यह जीतने की कोशिश करने के लिए हूं। "

original_text: "Panama Papers" is an umbrella term for roughly ten million documents from Panamanian law firm Mossack Fonseca, leaked to the press in spring 2016.
translated_text: "पनामा पेपर्स" पनामा की लॉ फर्म मोसाक फोंसेका के लगभग दस मिलियन दस्तावेजों के लिए एक सामान्य शब्द है, जो 2016 के वसंत में प्रेस में लीक हुए थे।

original_text: The documents showed fourteen banks helped wealthy clients hide billions of US dollars of wealth to avoid taxes and other regulations.
translated_text: दस्तावेजों से पता चलता है कि चौदह बैंकों ने करों और अन्य नियमों से बचने के लिए अमीर ग्राहकों को अरबों अमेरिकी डॉलर की संपत्ति छिपाने में मदद की।

original_text: British newspaper The Guardian suggested Deutsche Bank controlled roughly a third of the 1200 shell companies used to accomplish this.
translated_text: ब्रिटिश अखबार द गार्जियन ने सुझाव दिया कि ड्यूश बैंक ने इसे पूरा करने के लिए उपयोग की जाने वाली 1200 शेल कंपनियों में से लगभग एक तिहाई को नियंत्रित किया।

original_text: There were protests worldwide, several criminal prosecutions, and the leaders of the governments of Iceland and Pakistan both resigned.
translated_text: दुनिया भर में विरोध प्रदर्शन हुए, कई आपराधिक मुकदमे चलाए गए, और आइसलैंड और पाकिस्तान दोनों सरकारों के नेताओं ने इस्तीफा दे दिया।

original_text: Born in Hong Kong, Ma studied at New York University and Harvard Law School and once held an American permanent resident "green card".
translated_text: हांगकांग में जन्मे, मा ने न्यूयॉर्क विश्वविद्यालय और हार्वर्ड लॉ स्कूल में अध्ययन किया और एक बार एक अमेरिकी स्थायी निवासी "ग्रीन कार्ड" था।

original_text: Hsieh implied during the election that Ma might flee the country during a time of crisis.
translated_text: हसीह ने चुनाव के दौरान संकेत दिया कि संकट के समय मा देश से भाग सकती हैं।

original_text: Hsieh also argued that the photogenic Ma was more style than substance.
translated_text: हसीह ने यह भी तर्क दिया कि फोटोजेनिक मा पदार्थ की तुलना में अधिक शैली थी।

original_text: Despite these accusations, Ma won handily on a platform advocating closer ties with the Chinese mainland.
translated_text: इन आरोपों के बावजूद, मा ने मुख्य भूमि चीन के साथ घनिष्ठ संबंधों की वकालत करने वाले मंच पर आसानी से जीत हासिल की।

original_text: Today's Player of the Day is Alex Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals.
translated_text: आज का प्लेयर ऑफ द डे वाशिंगटन कैपिटल्स का एलेक्स ओवेचकिन है।

original_text: He had 2 goals and 2 assists in Washington's 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers.
translated_text: उन्होंने अटलांटा थ्रेशर्स पर वाशिंगटन की 5-3 से जीत में 2 गोल और 2 असिस्ट किए।

original_text: Ovechkin's first assist of the night was on the game-winning goal by rookie Nicklas Backstrom;
translated_text: ओवेचकिन की रात की पहली असिस्ट मैच जीतने वाले गोल पर थी, जो कि नौसिखिया निकलास बैकस्ट्रॉम ने की थी।

original_text: his second goal of the night was his 60th of the season, becoming the first player to score 60 or more goals in a season since 1995-96, when Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux each reached that milestone.
translated_text: रात का उनका दूसरा गोल सीज़न का 60 वां था, 1995-96 के बाद से एक सीज़न में 60 या उससे अधिक गोल करने वाला पहला खिलाड़ी बन गया, जब जारोमिर जागर और मारियो लेमियोस प्रत्येक उस मील का पत्थर तक पहुंच गए।

original_text: Batten was ranked 190th on the 2008 400 Richest Americans list with an estimated fortune of $2.3 billion.
translated_text: बैटन को 2008 की 400 सबसे अमीर अमेरिकियों की सूची में 190 वें स्थान पर रखा गया था, जिसमें अनुमानित संपत्ति 2.3 बिलियन डॉलर थी।

original_text: He graduated from the College of Arts & Sciences of the University of Virginia in 1950 and was a significant donor to that institution.
translated_text: उन्होंने 1950 में वर्जीनिया विश्वविद्यालय के कॉलेज ऑफ आर्ट्स एंड साइंसेज से स्नातक किया और उस संस्थान के लिए एक महत्वपूर्ण दाता थे।

original_text: Iraq's Abu Ghraib prison has been set alight during a riot.
translated_text: विद्रोह के दौरान इराक की अबू घ्राइब जेल को आग लगा दी गई है।

original_text: The jail became notorious after prisoner abuse was discovered there after US forces took over.
translated_text: अमेरिकी सेनाओं के कब्जे के बाद वहां कैदियों के साथ दुर्व्यवहार का पता चलने के बाद जेल कुख्यात हो गई।

original_text: Piquet Jr. crashed in the 2008 Singapore Grand Prix just after an early pit stop for Fernando Alonso, bringing out the safety car.
translated_text: पीकेट जूनियर ने 2008 के सिंगापुर ग्रैंड प्रिक्स में फर्नांडो एलोन्सो के लिए शुरुआती पिट स्टॉप के तुरंत बाद दुर्घटनाग्रस्त हो गया, जिसमें सेफ्टी कार को बाहर लाया गया।

original_text: As the cars ahead of Alonso went in for fuel under the safety car, he moved up the pack to take victory.
translated_text: जैसे-जैसे अलोन्सो से पहले की कारें सुरक्षा कार के नीचे ईंधन के लिए चली गईं, उसने जीत हासिल करने के लिए समूह को आगे बढ़ाया।

original_text: Piquet Jr. was sacked after the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.
translated_text: 2009 के हंगेरियन ग्रैंड प्रिक्स के बाद पिकेट जूनियर को बर्खास्त कर दिया गया था।

original_text: At exactly 8:46 a.m. a hush fell across the city, marking the exact moment the first jet struck its target.
translated_text: ठीक सुबह 8 बजकर 46 मिनट पर शहर भर में चुप्पी छा गई, जो पहले जेट ने अपने लक्ष्य को हिट करने के सटीक क्षण को चिह्नित करती है।

original_text: Two beams of light have been rigged up to point skywards overnight.
translated_text: रात भर आकाश की ओर इशारा करने के लिए दो प्रकाश किरणों को तैयार किया गया है।

original_text: Construction is ongoing for five new skyscrapers at the site, with a transportation center and memorial park in the middle.
translated_text: साइट पर पांच नए गगनचुंबी इमारतों का निर्माण चल रहा है, जिसके बीच में एक परिवहन केंद्र और स्मारक पार्क है।

original_text: The PBS show has more than two-dozen Emmy awards, and its run is shorter only than Sesame Street and Mister Rogers' Neighborhood.
translated_text: पीबीएस शो में दो दर्जन से अधिक एमी पुरस्कार हैं, और इसका रन केवल सेसम स्ट्रीट और मिस्टर रोजर्स के पड़ोस से छोटा है।

original_text: Each episode of the show would focus on a theme in a specific book and then explore that theme through multiple stories.
translated_text: शो के प्रत्येक एपिसोड में एक विशिष्ट पुस्तक में एक विषय पर ध्यान केंद्रित किया जाएगा और फिर कई कहानियों के माध्यम से उस विषय की खोज की जाएगी।

original_text: Each show would also provide recommendations for books that children should look for when they went to their library.
translated_text: प्रत्येक शो में उन पुस्तकों के लिए भी सिफारिशें दी जाती हैं जिन्हें बच्चों को अपनी लाइब्रेरी में जाने पर देखना चाहिए।

original_text: John Grant, from WNED Buffalo (Reading Rainbow's home station) said "Reading Rainbow taught kids why to read,... the love of reading — [the show] encouraged kids to pick up a book and to read."
translated_text: डब्ल्यूएनईडी बफलो (रीडिंग रेनबॉउ के गृह स्टेशन) के जॉन ग्रांट ने कहा कि "रीडिंग रेनबॉउ ने बच्चों को पढ़ाया कि क्यों पढ़ना है,... पढ़ने का प्यार  [शो] ने बच्चों को किताब लेने और पढ़ने के लिए प्रोत्साहित किया।"

original_text: It is believed by some, including John Grant, that both the funding crunch and a shift in the philosophy of educational television programming contributed to ending the series.
translated_text: जॉन ग्रांट सहित कुछ लोगों का मानना है कि वित्तीय संकट और शैक्षिक टेलीविजन प्रोग्रामिंग के दर्शन में बदलाव दोनों ने श्रृंखला को समाप्त करने में योगदान दिया।

original_text: The storm, situated about 645 miles (1040 km) west of the Cape Verde islands, is likely to dissipate before threatening any land areas, forecasters say.
translated_text: पूर्वानुमानकर्ताओं का कहना है कि केप वर्डे द्वीप समूह के पश्चिम में लगभग 1040 किलोमीटर की दूरी पर स्थित इस तूफान को किसी भी भूमि क्षेत्र को खतरे में डालने से पहले खत्म होने की संभावना है।

original_text: Fred currently has winds of 105 miles per hour (165 km/h) and is moving towards the northwest.
translated_text: फ्रेड वर्तमान में 105 मील प्रति घंटे (165 किमी/घंटा) की गति से हवाएं बह रही हैं और वह उत्तर-पश्चिम की ओर बढ़ रही हैं।

original_text: Fred is the strongest tropical cyclone ever recorded so far south and east in the Atlantic since the advent of satellite imagery, and only the third major hurricane on record east of 35°W.
translated_text: सैटेलाइट छवियों के आगमन के बाद से अटलांटिक महासागर में दक्षिण और पूर्व में अब तक का सबसे मजबूत उष्णकटिबंधीय चक्रवात फ्रेड है, और केवल 35°W के पूर्व में रिकॉर्ड किया गया तीसरा बड़ा तूफान है।

original_text: On September 24, 1759, Arthur Guinness signed a 9,000 year lease for the St James' Gate Brewery in Dublin, Ireland.
translated_text: 24 सितंबर, 1759 को, आर्थर गिनीज ने आयरलैंड के डबलिन में सेंट जेम्स गेट ब्रुअरी के लिए 9,000 साल के पट्टे पर हस्ताक्षर किए।

original_text: 250 years later, Guinness has grown to a global business that turns over 10 billion euros (US$14.7 billion) every year.
translated_text: 250 साल बाद, गिनीज एक वैश्विक व्यवसाय बन गया है जो हर साल 10 बिलियन यूरो (14.7 बिलियन अमेरिकी डॉलर) से अधिक का कारोबार करता है।

original_text: Jonny Reid, co-driver for the A1GP New Zealand team, today made history by driving the fastest over the 48-year-old Auckland Harbour Bridge, New Zealand, legally.
translated_text: ए1जीपी न्यूजीलैंड टीम के सह-चालक जोनी रीड ने आज न्यूजीलैंड के 48 वर्षीय ऑकलैंड हार्बर ब्रिज पर सबसे तेज ड्राइव करके इतिहास रचा है।

original_text: Mr Reid managed to drive the New Zealand's A1GP car, Black Beauty at speeds over 160km/h seven times over the bridge.
translated_text: श्री रीड ने न्यूजीलैंड की A1GP कार, ब्लैक ब्यूटी को 160 किमी/घंटे से अधिक की गति से पुल से सात बार पार करने में कामयाब रहा।

original_text: The New Zealand police had trouble using their speed radar guns to see how fast Mr Reid was going because of how low Black Beauty is, and the only time the police managed to clock Mr Reid was when he slowed down to 160km/h.
translated_text: न्यूजीलैंड पुलिस को यह देखने के लिए अपनी स्पीड रडार बंदूकों का उपयोग करने में कठिनाई हुई कि श्री रीड कितनी तेजी से जा रहा था क्योंकि ब्लैक ब्यूटी कितनी कम है, और एकमात्र बार पुलिस श्री रीड को घड़ी करने में कामयाब रही जब वह 160 किमी / घंटा तक धीमा हो गया।

original_text: In the last 3 months, over 80 arrestees were released from the Central Booking facility without being formally charged.
translated_text: पिछले 3 महीनों में, 80 से अधिक गिरफ्तारियों को बिना किसी औपचारिक आरोप के सेंट्रल बुकिंग सुविधा से रिहा कर दिया गया है।

original_text: In April this year, a temporary restaining order was issued by Judge Glynn against the facility to enforce the release of those held more than 24 hours after their intake who did not receive a hearing by a court commissioner.
translated_text: इस वर्ष अप्रैल में, न्यायाधीश ग्लीन ने उन लोगों को रिहा करने के लिए एक अस्थायी पुनर्वास आदेश जारी किया, जिन्हें 24 घंटे से अधिक समय के बाद रिहा किया गया था, जिन्हें अदालत के आयुक्त द्वारा सुनवाई नहीं मिली थी।

original_text: The commissioner sets bail, if granted, and formalizes the charges filed by the arresting officer. The charges are then entered into the state's computer system where the case is tracked.
translated_text: आयुक्त जमानत तय करता है, यदि दी जाती है, और गिरफ्तार करने वाले अधिकारी द्वारा दायर आरोपों को औपचारिक रूप देता है। फिर आरोपों को राज्य की कंप्यूटर प्रणाली में दर्ज किया जाता है जहां मामले को ट्रैक किया जाता है।

original_text: The hearing also marks the date for the suspect’s right to a speedy trial.
translated_text: सुनवाई संदिग्ध के शीघ्र सुनवाई के अधिकार की तारीख को भी चिह्नित करती है।

original_text: Peter Costello, Australian treasurer and the man most likely to succeed Prime Minister John Howard as Liberal party leader has thrown his support behind a nuclear power industry in Australia.
translated_text: ऑस्ट्रेलिया के खजानेदार और प्रधानमंत्री जॉन हॉवर्ड के बाद लिबरल पार्टी के नेता के रूप में सबसे अधिक संभावना रखने वाले व्यक्ति पीटर कॉस्टेलो ने ऑस्ट्रेलिया में परमाणु ऊर्जा उद्योग के पीछे अपना समर्थन फेंक दिया है।

original_text: Mr Costello said that when nuclear power generation becomes economically viable, Australia should pursue its use.
translated_text: श्री कॉस्टेलो ने कहा कि जब परमाणु ऊर्जा उत्पादन आर्थिक रूप से व्यवहार्य हो जाएगा, तो ऑस्ट्रेलिया को इसका उपयोग करना चाहिए।

original_text: "If it becomes commercial, we should have it. That is, there's no in-principle objection to nuclear energy" Mr Costello said.
translated_text: श्री कोस्टेलो ने कहा, "यदि यह वाणिज्यिक हो जाता है, तो हमें इसे प्राप्त करना चाहिए। यही है, परमाणु ऊर्जा के प्रति सिद्धांत रूप में कोई आपत्ति नहीं है।

original_text: According to Ansa, "police were concerned by a couple of top-level hits they feared might spark a full-blown war of succession.
translated_text: अंसा के अनुसार, "पुलिस को कुछ शीर्ष स्तर की हिटों से चिंता थी, जिससे उन्हें डर था कि यह उत्तराधिकार के पूर्ण युद्ध की शुरुआत कर सकता है।

original_text: Police said Lo Piccolo had the upper hand because he had been Provenzano's right-hand man in Palermo and his greater experience won him the respect of the older generation of bosses as they pursued Provenzano's policy of keeping as low as possible while strengthening their power network.
translated_text: पुलिस ने कहा कि लो पिक्कोलो के पास ऊपर का हाथ था क्योंकि वह पलेर्मो में प्रोवेंज़ानो के दाहिने हाथ थे और उनके बड़े अनुभव ने उन्हें बुजुर्ग पीढ़ी के मालिकों का सम्मान दिलाया क्योंकि उन्होंने प्रोवेंज़ानो की नीति का पालन किया कि वे अपने बिजली नेटवर्क को मजबूत करते हुए जितना संभव हो उतना कम रखें।

original_text: These bosses had been reined in by Provenzano when he put an end to the Riina-driven war against the state that claimed the lives of Mafia crusaders Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino in 1992."
translated_text: इन बॉस को प्रोवेंज़ानो द्वारा नियंत्रित किया गया था जब उन्होंने 1992 में माफिया क्रूसेडर्स जियोवानी फाल्कोने और पाउलो बोर्सेलिनो की जान लेने वाले राज्य के खिलाफ रीना-चालित युद्ध को समाप्त कर दिया था। "

original_text: Apple CEO Steve Jobs unveiled the device by walking onto the stage and taking the iPhone out of his jeans pocket.
translated_text: एप्पल के सीईओ स्टीव जॉब्स ने मंच पर चलकर अपने जींस जेब से आईफोन निकालकर डिवाइस का अनावरण किया।

original_text: During his 2 hour speech he stated that "Today Apple is going to reinvent the phone, We are going to make history today".
translated_text: अपने 2 घंटे के भाषण के दौरान उन्होंने कहा कि "आज Apple फोन को फिर से आविष्कार करने जा रहा है, हम आज इतिहास बनाने जा रहे हैं। "

original_text: Brazil is the largest Roman Catholic country on Earth, and the Roman Catholic Church has consistently opposed the legalization of same-sex marriage in the country.
translated_text: ब्राजील पृथ्वी पर सबसे बड़ा रोमन कैथोलिक देश है, और रोमन कैथोलिक चर्च ने लगातार देश में समलैंगिक विवाह को वैध बनाने का विरोध किया है।

original_text: The National Congress of Brazil has debated legalization for 10 years, and such civil marriages are currently only legal in Rio Grande do Sul.
translated_text: ब्राजील की राष्ट्रीय कांग्रेस ने 10 वर्षों से वैधता पर बहस की है, और इस प्रकार की नागरिक विवाह वर्तमान में केवल रियो ग्रांडे डू साउल में वैध हैं।

original_text: The original bill was drafted by former mayor of São Paulo, Marta Suplicy. The proposed legislation, after being amended, is now in the hands of Roberto Jefferson.
translated_text: मूल विधेयक साओ पाउलो के पूर्व मेयर मार्टा सुप्लिसी द्वारा तैयार किया गया था। प्रस्तावित कानून, संशोधित होने के बाद, अब रॉबर्टो जेफरसन के हाथों में है।

original_text: Protesters hope to collect a petition of 1.2 million signatures to present to the National Congress in November.
translated_text: प्रदर्शनकारियों को उम्मीद है कि नवंबर में राष्ट्रीय कांग्रेस में पेश करने के लिए 1.2 मिलियन हस्ताक्षरों की एक याचिका एकत्र की जाएगी।

original_text: After it became apparent that many families were seeking legal help to fight the evictions, a meeting was held on March 20 at the East Bay Community Law Center for the victims of the housing scam.
translated_text: यह स्पष्ट होने के बाद कि कई परिवारों ने निकासी से लड़ने के लिए कानूनी मदद मांगी थी, 20 मार्च को ईस्ट बे कम्युनिटी लॉ सेंटर में आवास घोटाले के पीड़ितों के लिए एक बैठक आयोजित की गई।

original_text: When the tenants started sharing what had occurred to them, most of the families involved suddenly realized that Carolyn Wilson of the OHA had stolen their security deposits, and skipped out of town.
translated_text: जब किरायेदारों ने उनके साथ जो हुआ था उसे साझा करना शुरू कर दिया, तो इसमें शामिल अधिकांश परिवारों को अचानक एहसास हुआ कि ओएचए की कैरोलीन विल्सन ने उनकी सुरक्षा डिपॉजिट चुरा ली थी, और शहर से भाग गई थी।

original_text: Tenants at Lockwood Gardens believe that there may be another 40 families or more to face eviction, since they learned that OHA police are also investigating other public housing properties in Oakland that may be caught up in the housing scam.
translated_text: लॉकवुड गार्डन के किरायेदारों का मानना है कि 40 या उससे अधिक परिवारों को निकासी का सामना करना पड़ सकता है, क्योंकि उन्हें पता चला कि ओएचए पुलिस ओकलैंड में अन्य सार्वजनिक आवास संपत्तियों की भी जांच कर रही है जो आवास घोटाले में फंस सकती हैं।

original_text: The band canceled the show at Maui's War Memorial Stadium, which was set to be attended by 9,000 people, and apologized to fans.
translated_text: बैंड ने माऊई के वॉर मेमोरियल स्टेडियम में शो को रद्द कर दिया, जिसमें 9,000 लोगों की उपस्थिति होनी थी, और प्रशंसकों से माफी मांगी।

original_text: The band's management company, HK Management Inc., gave no initial reason when they canceled on September 20, but blamed logistical reasons by the next day.
translated_text: बैंड की प्रबंधन कंपनी, एचके मैनेजमेंट इंक, ने 20 सितंबर को रद्द करने का कोई प्रारंभिक कारण नहीं दिया, लेकिन अगले दिन तक रसद कारणों का आरोप लगाया।

original_text: The famous Greek lawyers, Sakis Kechagioglou and George Nikolakopoulos have been imprisoned in the Athens' jail of Korydallus, as they were found guilty of graft and corruption.
translated_text: मशहूर यूनानी वकीलों साकीस केचागियोग्लू और जॉर्ज निकोलाकोपुलस को एथेंस की जेल कोरिडालस में कैद कर दिया गया है, क्योंकि उन्हें भ्रष्टाचार और भ्रष्टाचार का दोषी पाया गया है।

original_text: As a result of this, a big scandal within the Greek legal community has been raised through the exposure of illegal actions that judges, lawyers, solicitors and attorneys have done during the previous years.
translated_text: इसके परिणामस्वरूप, पिछले वर्षों में न्यायाधीशों, वकीलों, अधिवक्ताओं और वकीलों द्वारा किए गए अवैध कार्यों के उजागर के माध्यम से ग्रीक कानूनी समुदाय के भीतर एक बड़ा घोटाला उठाया गया है।

original_text: A few weeks ago, after the information published by the journalist Makis Triantafylopoulos in his popular Television show "Zoungla" in Alpha TV, the member of Parliament and lawyer, Petros Mantouvalos was abdicated as members of his office had been involved in illegal graft and corruption.
translated_text: कुछ हफ़्ते पहले, अल्फा टीवी पर अपने लोकप्रिय टेलीविजन शो "ज़ोंगला" में पत्रकार मकीस ट्रायंटाफिलोपोलोस द्वारा प्रकाशित जानकारी के बाद, संसद सदस्य और वकील, पेट्रोस मंटुवलोस को पद छोड़ दिया गया था क्योंकि उनके कार्यालय के सदस्यों को अवैध भ्रष्टाचार और भ्रष्टाचार में शामिल किया गया था।

original_text: Moreover, top judge Evangelos Kalousis is imprisoned as he found guilty of corruption and degenerate behaviour.
translated_text: इसके अलावा, सर्वोच्च न्यायाधीश ईवांगेलोस कैलोसिस को भ्रष्टाचार और विकृत व्यवहार के लिए दोषी पाया गया है।

original_text: Roberts flatly refused to say about when he believes life begins, an important question when considering the ethics of abortion, saying that it would be unethical to comment on the specifics of likely cases.
translated_text: रॉबर्ट्स ने दृढ़ता से यह बताने से इनकार कर दिया कि उनका मानना है कि जीवन कब शुरू होता है, गर्भपात के नैतिकता पर विचार करते समय एक महत्वपूर्ण प्रश्न, यह कहते हुए कि संभावित मामलों के विवरण पर टिप्पणी करना अनैतिक होगा।

original_text: He did, however, reiterate his earlier statement that Roe v. Wade was the "settled law of the land", emphasizing the importance of consistent Supreme Court rulings.
translated_text: उन्होंने, हालांकि, अपने पहले के बयान को दोहराया कि रू बनाम वेड "देश का स्थिर कानून" था, सर्वोच्च न्यायालय के लगातार फैसलों के महत्व पर जोर देते हुए।

original_text: He also confirmed that he believed in the implied right to privacy which the Roe decision depended upon.
translated_text: उन्होंने यह भी पुष्टि की कि वह गोपनीयता के अंतर्निहित अधिकार में विश्वास करते हैं, जिस पर रो निर्णय निर्भर करता है।

original_text: Maroochydore had finished on top of the ladder, six points clear of Noosa in second.
translated_text: मारोचिडोर सीढ़ी के शीर्ष पर समाप्त हो गया था, दूसरा नोसा से छह अंक दूर था।

original_text: The two sides would meet in the major semi final where Noosa ran out winners by 11 points.
translated_text: दोनों पक्ष प्रमुख सेमीफाइनल में मिलेंगे जहां नोसा ने विजेताओं को 11 अंकों से बाहर कर दिया।

original_text: Maroochydore then defeated Caboolture in the Preliminary Final.
translated_text: मारोचिडोर ने इसके बाद प्रारंभिक फाइनल में कैबोल्टूर को हराया।

original_text: Hesperonychus elizabethae is a species of the family Dromaeosauridae and is a cousin of Velociraptor .
translated_text: Hesperonychus elizabethae Dromaeosauridae परिवार की एक प्रजाति है और Velociraptor का एक चचेरा भाई है .

original_text: This fully feathered, warm blooded bird of prey was believed to have walked upright on two legs with claws like the Velociraptor.
translated_text: माना जाता था कि यह पूरी तरह से पंखों वाला, गर्म खून वाला शिकार पक्षी वेलोसिराप्टर की तरह पंजे के साथ दो पैरों पर सीधा चल रहा था।

original_text: Its second claw was larger, giving rise to the name Hesperonychus which means "western claw."
translated_text: इसका दूसरा घूँघट बड़ा था, जिससे नाम हेस्पेरोनिकस पैदा हुआ जिसका अर्थ है "पश्चिमी घूँघट"।

original_text: In addition to the crushing ice, extreme weather conditions have been hampering rescue efforts.
translated_text: क्रशिंग बर्फ के अलावा, चरम मौसम की स्थिति बचाव प्रयासों को बाधित कर रही है।

original_text: Pittman suggested that conditions wouldn't improve until sometime next week.
translated_text: पिटमैन ने सुझाव दिया कि अगले सप्ताह तक स्थिति में सुधार नहीं होगा।

original_text: The amount and thickness of the pack ice, according to Pittman, is the worst it has been for sealers in the past 15 years.
translated_text: पिटमैन के अनुसार, पैक आइस की मात्रा और मोटाई पिछले 15 वर्षों में सीलर्स के लिए सबसे खराब है।

original_text: News spread in the Red Lake community today as funerals for Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims were held that another student was arrested in connection with the school shootings of March 21.
translated_text: रेड लेक समुदाय में आज खबर फैल गई जब जेफ वेइस और नौ पीड़ितों में से तीन के लिए अंतिम संस्कार आयोजित किए गए थे कि 21 मार्च को स्कूल में गोलीबारी के संबंध में एक और छात्र को गिरफ्तार किया गया था।

original_text: Authorities said little officially beyond confirming today's arrest.
translated_text: अधिकारियों ने आज की गिरफ्तारी की पुष्टि करने के अलावा आधिकारिक तौर पर कुछ नहीं कहा।

original_text: However, a source with knowledge of the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that it was Louis Jourdain, 16-year old son of Red Lake Tribal Chairman Floyd Jourdain.
translated_text: हालांकि, जांच के बारे में जानकारी रखने वाले एक सूत्र ने मिनेपोलिस स्टार-ट्रिब्यून को बताया कि यह रेड लेक ट्राइबल के अध्यक्ष फ्लॉयड जॉर्डन के 16 वर्षीय बेटे लुई जॉर्डन थे।

original_text: It is not known at this time what charges will be laid or what led authorities to the boy but juvenile proceedings have begun in federal court.
translated_text: इस समय यह ज्ञात नहीं है कि कौन से आरोप लगाए जाएंगे या अधिकारियों ने लड़के के लिए क्या नेतृत्व किया है लेकिन संघीय अदालत में नाबालिगों की कार्यवाही शुरू हो गई है।

original_text: Lodin also said officials decided to cancel the runoff in order to save Afghans the expense and security risk of another election.
translated_text: लोडिन ने यह भी कहा कि अधिकारियों ने अफगानों को एक और चुनाव के खर्च और सुरक्षा जोखिम से बचाने के लिए चुनाव रद्द करने का फैसला किया।

original_text: Diplomats said that they had found enough ambiguity in the Afghan constitution to determine the runoff as unnecessary.
translated_text: राजनयिकों ने कहा कि उन्होंने अफगानिस्तान के संविधान में पर्याप्त अस्पष्टता पाई है ताकि यह निष्कर्ष निकाला जा सके कि यह आवश्यक नहीं है।

original_text: This contradicts earlier reports, which said that cancelling the runoff would have been against the constitution.
translated_text: यह पिछली रिपोर्टों के विपरीत है, जिसमें कहा गया था कि चुनाव रद्द करना संविधान के खिलाफ होगा।

original_text: The aircraft had been headed to Irkutsk and was being operated by interior troops.
translated_text: विमान इरकुत्स्क की ओर जा रहा था और इसे आंतरिक सैनिकों द्वारा संचालित किया जा रहा था।

original_text: An inquiry was established to investigate.
translated_text: जांच के लिए एक जांच स्थापित की गई थी।

original_text: The Il-76 has been a major component of both the Russian and Soviet military since the 1970s, and had already seen a serious accident in Russia last month.
translated_text: इल-76 1970 के दशक से रूसी और सोवियत सेना दोनों का एक प्रमुख घटक रहा है, और पिछले महीने रूस में पहले ही एक गंभीर दुर्घटना देखी गई थी।

original_text: On October 7 an engine separated on takeoff, without injuries. Russia briefly grounded Il-76s after that accident.
translated_text: 7 अक्टूबर को उड़ान भरने के दौरान एक इंजन अलग हो गया, कोई चोट नहीं आई। इस दुर्घटना के बाद रूस ने इल-76 को संक्षिप्त रूप से स्थगित कर दिया।

original_text: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
translated_text: फेयरबैंक्स, अलास्का के दक्षिण में हजारों बैरल कच्चे तेल के बहाव के बाद ट्रांस-अलास्का पाइपलाइन सिस्टम की 800 मील बंद कर दी गई थी।

original_text: A power failure following a routine fire-command system test caused relief valves to open and crude oil overflowed near the Fort Greely pump station 9.
translated_text: नियमित अग्निशमन नियंत्रण प्रणाली परीक्षण के बाद बिजली की विफलता के कारण राहत वाल्व खोले गए और फोर्ट ग्रेली पंप स्टेशन 9 के पास कच्चे तेल बह गया।

original_text: The valves opening allowed a pressure release for the system and oil flowed on a pad to a tank that can hold 55,000 barrels (2.3 million gallons).
translated_text: वाल्व खोलने से सिस्टम के लिए दबाव मुक्त हो गया और तेल एक पैड पर एक टैंक में बह गया जो 55,000 बैरल (2,3 मिलियन गैलन) रख सकता है।

original_text: As of Wednesday afternoon, the tank vents were still leaking probably from thermal expansion inside the tank.
translated_text: बुधवार दोपहर तक, टैंक के वेंटिलेटर अभी भी टैंक के अंदर गर्मी विस्तार से लीक हो रहे थे।

original_text: Another secondary containment area below the tanks capable of holding 104,500 barrels was not yet filled to capacity.
translated_text: 104,500 बैरल रखने में सक्षम टैंकों के नीचे एक और माध्यमिक प्रतिधारण क्षेत्र अभी तक क्षमता तक नहीं भरा गया है।

original_text: The comments, live on television, were the first time that senior Iranian sources have admitted that the sanctions are having any effect.
translated_text: टेलीविजन पर लाइव टिप्पणियों में पहली बार ईरानी वरिष्ठ सूत्रों ने स्वीकार किया है कि प्रतिबंधों का कोई प्रभाव है।

original_text: They include financial restrictions and a ban by the European Union on the export of crude oil, from which the Iranian economy receives 80% of its foreign income.
translated_text: इनमें वित्तीय प्रतिबंध और यूरोपीय संघ द्वारा कच्चे तेल के निर्यात पर प्रतिबंध शामिल है, जिससे ईरान की अर्थव्यवस्था अपनी विदेशी आय का 80% प्राप्त करती है।

original_text: In its most recent monthly report, OPEC said exports of crude had fallen to their lowest level for two decades at 2.8 million barrels per day.
translated_text: अपनी नवीनतम मासिक रिपोर्ट में, ओपेक ने कहा कि कच्चे तेल का निर्यात दो दशकों में अपने सबसे निचले स्तर पर गिर गया है, प्रति दिन 2.8 मिलियन बैरल।

original_text: The country's supreme leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, has described the dependency on oil as "a trap" dating from before Iran's Islamic revolution in 1979 and from which the country should free itself.
translated_text: देश के सर्वोच्च नेता, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei ने तेल पर निर्भरता को 1979 में ईरान की इस्लामी क्रांति से पहले का "एक जाल" बताया है और इससे देश को खुद को मुक्त करना चाहिए।

original_text: When the capsule gets to Earth and enters the atmosphere, at about 5am (eastern time), it is expected to put on quite a light show for folks in Northern California, Oregon, Nevada, and Utah.
translated_text: जब कैप्सूल पृथ्वी पर पहुंचता है और वायुमंडल में प्रवेश करता है, लगभग 5 बजे (पूर्वी समय) में, यह उत्तरी कैलिफोर्निया, ओरेगन, नेवादा और यूटा के लोगों के लिए काफी प्रकाश शो बनाने की उम्मीद है।

original_text: The capsule will look much like a shooting star going across the sky.
translated_text: कैप्सूल आकाश से होकर गुजरने वाले एक उड़ने वाले सितारे की तरह दिखाई देगा।

original_text: The capsule will be traveling at about 12.8 km or 8 miles per second, fast enough to go from San Francisco to Los Angeles in one minute.
translated_text: कैप्सूल लगभग 12.8 किमी या 8 मील प्रति सेकंड की गति से यात्रा करेगी, एक मिनट में सैन फ्रांसिस्को से लॉस एंजिल्स तक जाने के लिए पर्याप्त तेज।

original_text: Stardust will set a new all-time record for being the fastest spacecraft to return to Earth, breaking the previous record set in May of 1969 during the return of the Apollo X command module.
translated_text: स्टारडस्ट पृथ्वी पर लौटने वाला सबसे तेज अंतरिक्ष यान होने के लिए एक नया सर्वकालिक रिकॉर्ड स्थापित करेगा, जो अपोलो एक्स कमांड मॉड्यूल की वापसी के दौरान मई 1969 में स्थापित पिछले रिकॉर्ड को तोड़ देगा।

original_text: “It will move over the west coast of northern California and will light the sky from California through central Oregon and on through Nevada and Idaho and into Utah,” Tom Duxbury, Stardust's project manager said.
translated_text: यह उत्तरी कैलिफोर्निया के पश्चिमी तट से आगे बढ़ेगा और कैलिफोर्निया से मध्य ओरेगन के माध्यम से और नेवादा और आइडाहो के माध्यम से और यूटा तक आकाश को उजागर करेगा, स्टारडस्ट के परियोजना प्रबंधक टॉम डक्सबरी ने कहा।

original_text: Mr. Rudd's decision to sign the Kyoto climate accord isolates the United States, which will now be the only developed nation not to ratify the agreement.
translated_text: क्योटो जलवायु समझौते पर हस्ताक्षर करने के लिए श्री रुड का निर्णय संयुक्त राज्य अमेरिका को अलग करता है, जो अब समझौते को अनुमोदित नहीं करने वाला एकमात्र विकसित राष्ट्र होगा।

original_text: Australia's former conservative government refused to ratify Kyoto, saying it would damage the economy with its heavy reliance on coal exports, while countries like India and China were not bound by emissions targets.
translated_text: ऑस्ट्रेलिया की पूर्व रूढ़िवादी सरकार ने क्योटो को मान्यता देने से इनकार कर दिया, यह कहते हुए कि यह कोयले के निर्यात पर भारी निर्भरता से अर्थव्यवस्था को नुकसान पहुंचाएगा, जबकि भारत और चीन जैसे देशों को उत्सर्जन लक्ष्यों से बंधा नहीं था।

original_text: It is the biggest acquisition in eBay's history.
translated_text: ईबे के इतिहास में यह सबसे बड़ा अधिग्रहण है।

original_text: The company hopes to diversify its profit sources and gain popularity in areas where Skype holds a strong position, such as China, Eastern Europe, and Brazil.
translated_text: कंपनी को उम्मीद है कि वह अपने मुनाफे के स्रोतों में विविधता लाएगी और उन क्षेत्रों में लोकप्रियता हासिल करेगी जहां स्काइप की मजबूत स्थिति है, जैसे चीन, पूर्वी यूरोप और ब्राजील।

original_text: Scientists have suspected Enceladus as geologically active and a possible source of Saturn's icy E ring.
translated_text: वैज्ञानिकों का संदेह है कि एन्सेलाडस भूगर्भीय रूप से सक्रिय है और शनि की ठंडी ई अंगूठी का संभावित स्रोत है।

original_text: Enceladus is the most reflective object in the solar system, reflecting about 90 percent of the sunlight that hits it.
translated_text: एनसेलाडस सौर मंडल में सबसे अधिक प्रतिबिंबित वस्तु है, जो सूर्य के प्रकाश का लगभग 90 प्रतिशत प्रतिबिंबित करती है जो इसे मारती है।

original_text: The game publisher Konami stated today in a Japanese newspaper that they will not be releasing the game Six Days in Fallujah.
translated_text: खेल प्रकाशक कोनामी ने आज एक जापानी अखबार में कहा कि वे खेल छह दिन फ़ललूजा में जारी नहीं करेंगे।

original_text: The game is based on the Second Battle of Fallujah, a vicious battle between American and Iraqi forces.
translated_text: खेल फ़लूजा की दूसरी लड़ाई पर आधारित है, अमेरिकी और इराकी सेनाओं के बीच एक दुष्ट लड़ाई।

original_text: The ACMA also found that despite the video being streamed on the Internet, Big Brother had not breached online content censorship laws as the media had not been stored on Big Brother's website.
translated_text: एसीएमए ने यह भी पाया कि इंटरनेट पर वीडियो स्ट्रीम किए जाने के बावजूद, बिग ब्रदर ने ऑनलाइन सामग्री सेंसरशिप कानूनों का उल्लंघन नहीं किया था क्योंकि मीडिया को बिग ब्रदर की वेबसाइट पर संग्रहीत नहीं किया गया था।

original_text: The Broadcasting Services Act provides for the regulation of Internet content, however to be considered Internet content, it must physically reside on a server.
translated_text: प्रसारण सेवा अधिनियम में इंटरनेट सामग्री के विनियमन के लिए प्रावधान है, हालांकि इंटरनेट सामग्री के रूप में माना जाने के लिए, यह भौतिक रूप से सर्वर पर स्थित होना चाहिए।

original_text: The United States embassy located in Nairobi, Kenya has issued a warning that "extremists from Somalia" are planning to launch suicide bomb attacks in Kenya and Ethiopia.
translated_text: केन्या के नैरोबी में स्थित संयुक्त राज्य अमेरिका दूतावास ने चेतावनी जारी की है कि "सोमालिया के चरमपंथी" केन्या और इथियोपिया में आत्मघाती बम हमले शुरू करने की योजना बना रहे हैं।

original_text: The U.S. says it has received information from an undisclosed source that specifically mentions the use of suicide bombers to will blow up "prominent landmarks" in Ethiopia and Kenya.
translated_text: संयुक्त राज्य अमेरिका का कहना है कि उसे एक अज्ञात स्रोत से जानकारी मिली है जिसमें विशेष रूप से आत्मघाती हमलावरों के इस्तेमाल का उल्लेख किया गया है ताकि इथियोपिया और केन्या में "प्रसिद्ध स्थलों" को उड़ाया जा सके।

original_text: Long before The Daily Show and The Colbert Report, Heck and Johnson envisioned a publication that would parody the news—and news reporting—when they were students at UW in 1988.
translated_text: द डेली शो और द कोलबर्ट रिपोर्ट से बहुत पहले, हेक और जॉनसन ने 1988 में यूडब्ल्यू में छात्रों के रूप में समाचार और समाचार रिपोर्टिंग का उपहास करने वाले एक प्रकाशन की कल्पना की थी।

original_text: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
translated_text: अपनी स्थापना के बाद से, लहसुन एक वास्तविक समाचार पैरोडी साम्राज्य बन गया है, एक मुद्रित संस्करण के साथ, एक वेबसाइट जिसने अक्टूबर के महीने में 5,000,000 अद्वितीय आगंतुकों को आकर्षित किया, व्यक्तिगत विज्ञापन, एक 24-घंटे का समाचार नेटवर्क, पॉडकास्ट, और हाल ही में लॉन्च किया गया एक विश्व एटलस Our Dumb World.
