original_text: Maroochydore had finished on top of the ladder, six points clear of Noosa in second.
translated_text: Maroochydore var færdig på toppen af stigen, seks point væk fra Noosa på andenpladsen.

original_text: The two sides would meet in the major semi final where Noosa ran out winners by 11 points.
translated_text: De to sider skulle mødes i den store semifinal, hvor Noosa løb ud over vinderne med 11 point.

original_text: Maroochydore then defeated Caboolture in the Preliminary Final.
translated_text: Maroochydore besejrede derefter Caboolture i den foreløbige finale.

original_text: Hesperonychus elizabethae is a species of the family Dromaeosauridae and is a cousin of Velociraptor .
translated_text: Hesperonychus elizabethae er en art af familien Dromaeosauridae og er en kusine af Velociraptor .

original_text: This fully feathered, warm blooded bird of prey was believed to have walked upright on two legs with claws like the Velociraptor.
translated_text: Man troede at denne fugl med fuld fjer og varmt blod var gået opad på to ben med kløer som Velociraptor.

original_text: Its second claw was larger, giving rise to the name Hesperonychus which means "western claw."
translated_text: Den anden klaver var større, hvilket gav anledning til navnet Hesperonychus, som betyder "vestlige klaver".

original_text: In addition to the crushing ice, extreme weather conditions have been hampering rescue efforts.
translated_text: Udover den knusende is har ekstreme vejrforhold forhindret redningsindsatserne.

original_text: Pittman suggested that conditions wouldn't improve until sometime next week.
translated_text: Pittman foreslog, at forholdene ikke ville blive bedre før i næste uge.

original_text: The amount and thickness of the pack ice, according to Pittman, is the worst it has been for sealers in the past 15 years.
translated_text: Ifølge Pittman er mængden og tykkelsen af pakkeis den værste, som det har været for sealere i de sidste 15 år.

original_text: News spread in the Red Lake community today as funerals for Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims were held that another student was arrested in connection with the school shootings of March 21.
translated_text: Nyheden spredte sig i Red Lake-samfundet i dag, da begravelsen af Jeff Weise og tre af de ni ofre blev afholdt, at en anden elev blev anholdt i forbindelse med skyderiet i skolen den 21. marts.

original_text: Authorities said little officially beyond confirming today's arrest.
translated_text: Myndighederne har kun bekræftet arrestationen.

original_text: However, a source with knowledge of the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that it was Louis Jourdain, 16-year old son of Red Lake Tribal Chairman Floyd Jourdain.
translated_text: Men en kilde med kendskab til efterforskningen fortalte Minneapolis Star-Tribune, at det var Louis Jourdain, 16-årig søn af Red Lake Tribal Chairman Floyd Jourdain.

original_text: It is not known at this time what charges will be laid or what led authorities to the boy but juvenile proceedings have begun in federal court.
translated_text: Det er endnu ikke kendt, hvilke anklager der vil blive stillet, eller hvad der har ført myndighederne til drengen, men en ungdomsforhandling er påbegyndt i en føderal domstol.

original_text: Lodin also said officials decided to cancel the runoff in order to save Afghans the expense and security risk of another election.
translated_text: Lodin sagde også, at embedsmændene besluttede at aflyse rundanten for at spare afghanerne udgifterne og sikkerhedsrisikoen ved et andet valg.

original_text: Diplomats said that they had found enough ambiguity in the Afghan constitution to determine the runoff as unnecessary.
translated_text: Diplomater sagde, at de havde fundet nok tvetydighed i den afghanske forfatning til at afgøre, at rundownen var unødvendig.

original_text: This contradicts earlier reports, which said that cancelling the runoff would have been against the constitution.
translated_text: Dette er i modstrid med tidligere rapporter, der sagde, at afbestilling af runoff ville have været i strid med forfatningen.

original_text: The aircraft had been headed to Irkutsk and was being operated by interior troops.
translated_text: Flyet var på vej til Irkutsk og blev styret af indvendige tropper.

original_text: An inquiry was established to investigate.
translated_text: Der blev indledt en undersøgelse.

original_text: The Il-76 has been a major component of both the Russian and Soviet military since the 1970s, and had already seen a serious accident in Russia last month.
translated_text: Il-76 har været en vigtig del af både den russiske og sovjetiske militær siden 1970'erne, og havde allerede oplevet en alvorlig ulykke i Rusland sidste måned.

original_text: On October 7 an engine separated on takeoff, without injuries. Russia briefly grounded Il-76s after that accident.
translated_text: Den 7. oktober skød en motor uden skader, og Rusland stoppede Il-76'erne kort tid efter ulykken.

original_text: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
translated_text: 800 miles af Trans-Alaska Pipeline System blev lukket ned efter et udløb af tusindvis af fat råolie syd for Fairbanks, Alaska.

original_text: A power failure following a routine fire-command system test caused relief valves to open and crude oil overflowed near the Fort Greely pump station 9.
translated_text: Et strømsvigt efter en rutinemæssig brandstyringssystemprøve forårsagede, at hjælpeventiler åbnede, og råolie overflød i nærheden af Fort Greely pumpestation 9.

original_text: The valves opening allowed a pressure release for the system and oil flowed on a pad to a tank that can hold 55,000 barrels (2.3 million gallons).
translated_text: Ventilerne åbnede, så der kunne frigives tryk for systemet, og olien strømmede på en pad til en tank der kan indeholde 55.000 tønder.

original_text: As of Wednesday afternoon, the tank vents were still leaking probably from thermal expansion inside the tank.
translated_text: Ved onsdag eftermiddag var tankens ventilationsventiler stadig løst, sandsynligvis på grund af termisk udvidelse inde i tanken.

original_text: Another secondary containment area below the tanks capable of holding 104,500 barrels was not yet filled to capacity.
translated_text: Et andet sekundært tilbageholdelsesområde under tanken med kapacitet på 104.500 tønder er endnu ikke fyldt til kapacitet.

original_text: The comments, live on television, were the first time that senior Iranian sources have admitted that the sanctions are having any effect.
translated_text: Det er første gang, at højtstående iranske kilder indrømmer, at sanktionerne har nogen virkning.

original_text: They include financial restrictions and a ban by the European Union on the export of crude oil, from which the Iranian economy receives 80% of its foreign income.
translated_text: De omfatter finansielle restriktioner og et forbud fra Den Europæiske Union mod eksport af råolie, hvorfra den iranske økonomi modtager 80% af sin udenlandske indkomst.

original_text: In its most recent monthly report, OPEC said exports of crude had fallen to their lowest level for two decades at 2.8 million barrels per day.
translated_text: I sin seneste månedlige rapport sagde OPEC, at eksport af råolie var faldet til deres laveste niveau i to årtier på 2,8 millioner tønder om dagen.

original_text: The country's supreme leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, has described the dependency on oil as "a trap" dating from before Iran's Islamic revolution in 1979 and from which the country should free itself.
translated_text: Landets øverste leder, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, har beskrevet afhængigheden af olie som en "fælde" fra før Irans islamiske revolution i 1979 og fra hvilken landet bør befri sig.

original_text: When the capsule gets to Earth and enters the atmosphere, at about 5am (eastern time), it is expected to put on quite a light show for folks in Northern California, Oregon, Nevada, and Utah.
translated_text: Når kapsellet kommer til Jorden og går ind i atmosfæren, omkring kl. 5 (østlig tid), forventes det at sætte en ganske lys show for folk i det nordlige Californien, Oregon, Nevada og Utah.

original_text: The capsule will look much like a shooting star going across the sky.
translated_text: Kapslen vil se meget ud som en skyggende stjerne.

original_text: The capsule will be traveling at about 12.8 km or 8 miles per second, fast enough to go from San Francisco to Los Angeles in one minute.
translated_text: Kapslen rejser med 12,8 km/s, hurtigt nok til at gå fra San Francisco til Los Angeles på et minut.

original_text: Stardust will set a new all-time record for being the fastest spacecraft to return to Earth, breaking the previous record set in May of 1969 during the return of the Apollo X command module.
translated_text: Stardust vil sætte en ny rekord for at være det hurtigste rumfartøj til at vende tilbage til Jorden, at bryde den tidligere rekord, der blev fastsat i maj 1969 under tilbagevenden af Apollo X kommando modul.

original_text: “It will move over the west coast of northern California and will light the sky from California through central Oregon and on through Nevada and Idaho and into Utah,” Tom Duxbury, Stardust's project manager said.
translated_text: Det vil bevæge sig over den vestlige kyst i det nordlige Californien og lyse himlen fra Californien gennem det centrale Oregon og videre gennem Nevada og Idaho og ind i Utah,  Tom Duxbury, Stardust projektleder sagde.

original_text: Mr. Rudd's decision to sign the Kyoto climate accord isolates the United States, which will now be the only developed nation not to ratify the agreement.
translated_text: Rudd's beslutning om at underskrive Kyoto-klimaaftalen isolerer USA, som nu bliver den eneste udviklede nation, der ikke ratificerer aftalen.

original_text: Australia's former conservative government refused to ratify Kyoto, saying it would damage the economy with its heavy reliance on coal exports, while countries like India and China were not bound by emissions targets.
translated_text: Australiens tidligere konservative regering nægtede at ratificere Kyoto og sagde, at det ville skade økonomien med dens store afhængighed af kuleksport, mens lande som Indien og Kina ikke var bundet af emissionsmål.

original_text: It is the biggest acquisition in eBay's history.
translated_text: Det er den største overtagelse i Ebays historie.

original_text: The company hopes to diversify its profit sources and gain popularity in areas where Skype holds a strong position, such as China, Eastern Europe, and Brazil.
translated_text: Virksomheden håber at diversificere sine overskud og få popularitet i områder, hvor Skype har en stærk position, såsom Kina, Østeuropa og Brasilien.

original_text: Scientists have suspected Enceladus as geologically active and a possible source of Saturn's icy E ring.
translated_text: Forskere har mistænkt Enceladus for at være geologisk aktiv og en mulig kilde til Saturns isede E-ring.

original_text: Enceladus is the most reflective object in the solar system, reflecting about 90 percent of the sunlight that hits it.
translated_text: Enceladus er det mest reflekterende objekt i solsystemet og reflekterer omkring 90 procent af det sollys der rammer det.

original_text: The game publisher Konami stated today in a Japanese newspaper that they will not be releasing the game Six Days in Fallujah.
translated_text: Spilleudgiveren Konami oplyste i dag i en japansk avis, at de ikke vil udgive spillet Six Days in Fallujah.

original_text: The game is based on the Second Battle of Fallujah, a vicious battle between American and Iraqi forces.
translated_text: Spillet er baseret på det andet slag ved Fallujah, en ondskabsfuld kamp mellem amerikanske og irakiske styrker.

original_text: The ACMA also found that despite the video being streamed on the Internet, Big Brother had not breached online content censorship laws as the media had not been stored on Big Brother's website.
translated_text: ACMA fandt også, at selv om videoen blev streamed på internettet, havde Big Brother ikke overtrådt onlineindholdscensurloven, da medierne ikke var blevet gemt på Big Brother's hjemmeside.

original_text: The Broadcasting Services Act provides for the regulation of Internet content, however to be considered Internet content, it must physically reside on a server.
translated_text: I Broadcasting Services Act er der fastsat regler for internetindhold, men for at det skal betragtes som internetindhold, skal det fysisk være placeret på en server.

original_text: The United States embassy located in Nairobi, Kenya has issued a warning that "extremists from Somalia" are planning to launch suicide bomb attacks in Kenya and Ethiopia.
translated_text: Den amerikanske ambassade i Nairobi i Kenya har udstedt en advarsel om, at "ekstremister fra Somalia" planlægger at lancere selvmordsbombangreb i Kenya og Etiopien.

original_text: The U.S. says it has received information from an undisclosed source that specifically mentions the use of suicide bombers to will blow up "prominent landmarks" in Ethiopia and Kenya.
translated_text: USA siger, at de har modtaget oplysninger fra en ukendt kilde, der specifikt nævner brugen af selvmordsbombere til at sprænge "prominente landemærker" i Etiopien og Kenya.

original_text: Long before The Daily Show and The Colbert Report, Heck and Johnson envisioned a publication that would parody the news—and news reporting—when they were students at UW in 1988.
translated_text: Længe før The Daily Show og The Colbert Report, Heck og Johnson forestillede sig en publikation, der ville parodiere nyheder og nyhedsrapportering, da de var studerende på UW i 1988.

original_text: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
translated_text: Siden starten er The Onion blevet et ægte nyhedsparodi-imperium, med en trykt udgave, et websted, der tiltrådte 5.000.000 unikke besøgende i oktober, personlige annoncer, et 24-timers nyhedsnetværk, podcasts og en nylig lanceret verdensatlass kaldet Our Dumb World.

original_text: Al Gore and General Tommy Franks casually rattle off their favorite headlines (Gore's was when The Onion reported he and Tipper were having the best sex of their lives after his 2000 Electoral College defeat).
translated_text: Al Gore og general Tommy Franks rattede casually af deres yndlings overskrifter (Gores var, da The Onion rapporterede han og Tipper havde den bedste sex i deres liv efter hans 2000 valg college nederlag).

original_text: Many of their writers have gone on to wield great influence on Jon Stewart and Stephen Colbert's news parody shows.
translated_text: Mange af deres forfattere har haft stor indflydelse på Jon Stewarts og Stephen Colberts nyhedsparodier.

original_text: The artistic event is also part of a campaign by the Bucharest City Hall that seeks to relaunch the image of the Romanian capital as a creative and colourful metropolis.
translated_text: Den kunstneriske begivenhed er også en del af en kampagne fra Bukarest Rådhuset, der søger at genoplive billedet af den rumænske hovedstad som en kreativ og farverig metropol.

original_text: The city will be the first in southeastern Europe to host CowParade, the world's largest public art event, between June and August this year.
translated_text: Byen vil være den første i det sydøstlige Europa at være vært for CowParade, verdens største offentlige kunstarrangement, mellem juni og august i år.

original_text: Today's announcement also extended the government's commitment made in March of this year to fund extra carriages.
translated_text: Dagens bekendtgørelse udvidede også regeringens forpligtelse i marts i år til at finansiere ekstra vogne.

original_text: An additional 300 brings the total to 1,300 carriages to be acquired to relieve overcrowding.
translated_text: Yderligere 300 fører til 1.300 vogne, der skal købes for at lindre overbefolkningen.

original_text: Christopher Garcia, a spokesperson of the Los Angeles Police Department, said the suspected male offender is being investigated for trespassing rather than vandalism.
translated_text: Christopher Garcia, en talsmand for Los Angeles Police Department, sagde, at den mistænkte mandlig gerningsmand efterforskes for indbrud snarere end vandalisme.

original_text: The sign was not physically damaged; the modification was done using black tarpaulins decorated with signs of peace and heart to alter the "O" to read lowercase "e".

original_text: Red tide is caused by a higher than normal concentration of Karenia brevis, a naturally-occurring single-celled marine organism.
translated_text: Røde tidevand forårsages af en højere end normal koncentration af Karenia brevis, en naturligt forekommende encellig havlivsorganisme.

original_text: Natural factors can intersect to produce ideal conditions, allowing this algae to increase in number dramatically.
translated_text: Naturlige faktorer kan krydse sig for at skabe ideelle forhold, hvilket giver denne alge mulighed for at øge antallet dramatisk.

original_text: The algae produces a neurotoxin that can disable nerves in both humans and fish.
translated_text: Algene producerer et neurotoxin, der kan slukke nerverne i både mennesker og fisk.

original_text: Fish often die because of the high concentrations of the toxin in the waters.
translated_text: Fisk dør ofte på grund af de høje koncentrationer af giftstoffer i vandet.

original_text: Humans can be affected by breathing affected water taken into the air by wind and waves.
translated_text: Mennesker kan blive ramt af at indånde vand der er ramt af vind og bølger.

original_text: At its peak, Tropical Cyclone Gonu, named for a bag of palm leaves in the language of the Maldives, reached sustained winds of 240 kilometers an hour (149 miles per hour) .

original_text: By early today, winds were around 83 km/h, and it was expect to keep weakening.

original_text: This is believed to be the fifth time in history that people have observed what turned out to be chemically confirmed martian material falling to Earth.
translated_text: Det antages at være den femte gang i historien, at mennesker har observeret det, der viste sig at være kemisk bekræftet marsiansk materiale, der falder til Jorden.

translated_text: "Nogle er måske uenige, men jeg er ligeglad.

original_text: I am happy that there are people willing to support me.
translated_text: Jeg er glad for at der er folk der er villige til at støtte mig.

original_text: Since Pakistani independence from British rule in 1947, the Pakistani President has appointed "Political Agents" to govern FATA, who exercise near-complete autonomous control over the areas.
translated_text: Siden Pakistans uafhængighed fra det britiske styre i 1947 har den pakistanske præsident udpeget "politiske agenter" til at styre FATA, som udøver næsten fuldstændig selvstændig kontrol over de områder.

original_text: These agents are responsible for providing government and judicial services under Article 247 of the Pakistani Constitution.
translated_text: Disse agenter er ansvarlige for at levere offentlige og retslige tjenester i henhold til artikel 247 i den pakistanske forfatning.

original_text: A hostel collapsed in Mecca, the holy city of Islam at about 10 o'clock this morning local time.
translated_text: Et hostel faldt sammen i Mekka, islams hellige by omkring kl. 10 i morges.

original_text: The building housed a number of pilgrims who came to visit the holy city at the eve of hajj pilgrimage.
translated_text: Bygningen husede en række pilgrimer, der kom for at besøge den hellige by på aftenen for pilgrimstogten.

original_text: The hostel's guests were mostly citizens of the United Arab Emirates.
translated_text: Gæsterne på vandrerhjemmet var for det meste statsborgere i De Forenede Arabiske Emirater.

original_text: The death toll is at least 15, a figure which is expected to rise.
translated_text: Antallet af døde er mindst 15, et tal, der forventes at stige.

original_text: Leonov, also known as "cosmonaut No. 11", was part of the Soviet Union's original team of cosmonauts.
translated_text: Leonov, også kendt som "kosmonaut nr. 11", var en del af Sovjetunionens oprindelige hold af kosmonauter.

original_text: On March 18, 1965, he performed the first manned extravehicular activity (EVA), or "spacewalk", remaining alone outside the spacecraft for just over twelve minutes.
translated_text: Den 18. marts 1965 udførte han den første bemandede ekstravehicular aktivitet (EVA), eller "spacewalk", og blev alene uden for rumfartøjet i lidt over tolv minutter.

original_text: He received the "Hero of the Soviet Union", the Soviet Union's highest honor, for his work.
translated_text: Han modtog "Sovjetunionens Helte", Sovjetunionens højeste ære, for sit arbejde.

original_text: Ten years later, he led the Soviet part of the Apollo–Soyuz mission symbolizing that the Space Race was over.
translated_text: Ti år senere ledet han den sovjetiske del af Apollo Soyuz-missionen, der symboliserede, at rumløbet var forbi.

original_text: She said, "There is no intelligence to suggest that an attack is expected imminently.
translated_text: Hun sagde: "Der er ingen efterretninger, der tyder på, at et angreb forventes imminent.

original_text: However, the reduction of the threat level to severe does not mean the overall threat has gone away."
translated_text: Men en reduktion af truslen til alvorlig betyder ikke, at den samlede trussel er forsvundet".

original_text: While authorities are unsure of the credibility of the threat, the Maryland Transportaion Authority made the closure with the urging of the FBI.
translated_text: Selv om myndighederne ikke er sikre på troverdigheden af truslen, gjorde Maryland Transportation Authority lukningen med opfordring fra FBI.

original_text: Dump trucks were used to block tube entrances and assistance of 80 police were on hand to direct motorists to detours.
translated_text: Der blev brugt dumpvogne til at blokere indgangen til rørene, og der var 80 politimænd til rådighed for at lede bilisterne til omdrejninger.

original_text: There were no heavy traffic delays reported on the beltway, the city's alternate route.
translated_text: Der blev ikke rapporteret store trafikforsinkelser på bæltevejen, byens alternative rute.

original_text: Nigeria previously announced it planned to join the AfCFTA in the week leading up to the summit.
translated_text: Nigeria meddelte tidligere, at det planlagde at slutte sig til AfCFTA i ugen før topmødet.

original_text: AU trade and industry commissioner Albert Muchanga announced Benin was to join.
translated_text: AU-kommissær for handel og industri Albert Muchanga meddelte, at Benin ville blive medlem.

original_text: The commissioner said, "We haven't yet agreed on rules of origin and tariff con[c]essions, but the framework we have is enough to start trading on July 1, 2020".
translated_text: Kommissæren sagde: "Vi har endnu ikke aftalt regler om oprindelse og toldtilladelser, men det rammer, vi har, er tilstrækkeligt til at begynde at handle den 1. juli 2020".

original_text: The station maintained its attitude, despite the loss of a gyroscope earlier in the space station mission, until the end of the spacewalk.
translated_text: Stationen bevarede sin holdning til trods for tab af et gyroskop tidligere i rumstationsmissionen, indtil slutningen af rumvandringen.

original_text: Chiao and Sharipov reported being a safe distance from the attitude adjustment thrusters.
translated_text: Chiao og Sharipov rapporterede at være en sikker afstand fra holdningsjusteringspropulserne.

original_text: Russian ground control activated the jets and normal attitude of the station was regained.
translated_text: Russisk jordkontrol aktiverede flyene og stationsens normale holdning blev genoprettet.

original_text: The case was prosecuted in Virginia because it is the home to the leading internet service provider AOL, the company who instigated the charges.
translated_text: Sagen blev retsforfulgt i Virginia, fordi det er hjemsted for den førende internetudbyder AOL, det selskab, der har indledt anklagerne.

original_text: This is the first time a conviction has been gained using the legislation enacted in 2003 to curb bulk e-mail, aka spam, from unsolicited distribution into users mailboxes.
translated_text: Det er første gang, at der er opnået en dom ved hjælp af den lovgivning, der blev vedtaget i 2003 for at begrænse massiv e-mail, også kendt som spam, fra uønsket distribution i brugernes postkasser.

original_text: 21-year-old Jesus joined Manchester City last year in January 2017 from Brazilian club Palmeiras for a reported fee of £27 million.
translated_text: Den 21-årige Jesus sluttede sig til Manchester City sidste år i januar 2017 fra den brasilianske klub Palmeiras for et rapporteret gebyr på 27 millioner pund.

original_text: Since then, the Brazilian has featured in 53 matches for the club in all competitions and has scored 24 goals.
translated_text: Siden da har brazileren spillet 53 kampe for klubben i alle konkurrencer og scoret 24 mål.

original_text: Dr. Lee also expressed his concern about reports that children in Turkey have now become infected with the A(H5N1) avian influenza virus without becoming ill.
translated_text: Dr. Lee udtrykte også sin bekymring over rapporter om, at børn i Tyrkiet nu er blevet smittet med A(H5N1) fugleinfluenzavirus uden at blive syge.

original_text: Some studies suggest that the disease must become less lethal before it can cause a global epidemic, he noted.
translated_text: Nogle undersøgelser tyder på at sygdommen skal blive mindre dødelig før den kan forårsage en global epidemi, bemærkede han.

original_text: There is concern that patients may continue to infect more people by going through their daily routines if the flu symptoms remain mild.
translated_text: Der er bekymring for, at patienter kan fortsætte med at smitte flere mennesker ved at gennemgå deres daglige rutiner, hvis influenzapsymptomerne forbliver milde.

original_text: Leslie Aun, a spokesperson for the Komen Foundation, said the organization adopted a new rule that does not allow grants or funding to be awarded to organizations that are under legal investigation.
translated_text: Leslie Aun, en talsmand for Komen Foundation, sagde, at organisationen vedtog en ny regel, der ikke tillader, at der gives tilskud eller finansiering til organisationer, der er under juridisk undersøgelse.

original_text: Komen's policy disqualified Planned Parenthood due to a pending investigation on how Planned Parenthood spends and reports its money that is being conducted by Representative Cliff Stearns.
translated_text: Komens politik diskvalificerede Planned Parenthood på grund af en pågående undersøgelse af, hvordan Planned Parenthood bruger og rapporterer sine penge, der udføres af repræsentant Cliff Stearns.

original_text: Stearns is investigating whether taxes are used to fund abortions through Planned Parenthood in his role as chairman of the Oversight and Investigations Subcommittee, which is under the umbrella of the House Energy and Commerce Committee.
translated_text: Stearns undersøger, om skatter bruges til at finansiere abort gennem Planned Parenthood i sin rolle som formand for Oversight and Investigations Subcommittee, som er under paraplyet af House Energy and Commerce Committee.

original_text: Former Massachusetts governor Mitt Romney won the Florida Republican Party presidential primary election on Tuesday with over 46 percent of the vote.
translated_text: Den tidligere guvernør i Massachusetts, Mitt Romney, vandt præsidentvalget for det republikanske parti i Florida tirsdag med over 46 procent af stemmerne.

original_text: Former U.S. Speaker of the House Newt Gingrich came in second with 32 percent.
translated_text: Tidligere præsident Newt Gingrich kom på andenpladsen med 32 procent.

original_text: As a winner-takes-all state, Florida awarded all fifty of its delegates to Romney, pushing him ahead as the front-runner for the Republican Party nomination.
translated_text: Som en vinder-tager-alle delstat, Florida tildelte alle 50 af sine delegater til Romney, skubber ham frem som den førende kandidat for det republikanske parti nominering.

original_text: Organisers of the protest said about 100,000 people turned up in German cities such as Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg, and Hanover.
translated_text: Organisatorerne af protesten sagde at omkring 100.000 mennesker var til stede i tyske byer som Berlin, Köln, Hamburg og Hannover.

original_text: In Berlin, police estimated 6,500 protestors.
translated_text: I Berlin anslog politiet til 6.500 demonstranter.

original_text: Protests also took place in Paris, Sofia in Bulgaria, Vilnius in Lithuania, Valetta in Malta, Tallinn in Estonia, and Edinburgh and Glasgow in Scotland.
translated_text: Demonstrationer fandt også sted i Paris, Sofia i Bulgarien, Vilnius i Litauen, Valletta i Malta, Tallinn i Estland og Edinburgh og Glasgow i Skotland.

original_text: In London, about 200 people protested outside some major copyright holders' offices.
translated_text: I London protesterede omkring 200 mennesker uden for nogle af de store ophavsretsholders kontorer.

original_text: Last month, there were major protests in Poland when that country signed ACTA, which has led to the Polish government deciding not to ratify the agreement, for now.
translated_text: I sidste måned var der store protester i Polen, da det land underskrev ACTA, hvilket har ført til, at den polske regering har besluttet ikke at ratificere aftalen for øjeblikket.

original_text: Latvia and Slovakia have both delayed the process of joining ACTA.
translated_text: Letland og Slovakiet har begge forsinket tiltrædelsen af ACTA.

original_text: Animal Liberation and the Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) are again calling for the mandatory installation of CCTV cameras in all Australian abattoirs.
translated_text: Animal Liberation og Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) opfordrer igen til obligatorisk installation af CCTV-kameraer i alle australske slagterier.

original_text: RSPCA New South Wales chief inspector David O'Shannessy told the ABC that surveillance and inspections of abattoirs should be commonplace in Australia.
translated_text: Den øverste inspektør for RSPCA i New South Wales, David O'Shannessy, fortalte ABC, at overvågning og inspektion af slagterier bør være almindeligt i Australien.

original_text: "The CCTV would certainly send a strong signal to those people working with animals that their welfare is of the highest priority."
translated_text: "Det ville sikkert sende et stærkt signal til de mennesker der arbejder med dyr at deres velfærd er den højeste prioritet".

original_text: The United States Geological Survey international earthquake map showed no earthquakes in Iceland in the week prior.
translated_text: Det internationale jordskælvkort fra United States Geological Survey viste ingen jordskælv i Island i den foregående uge.

original_text: The Icelandic Meteorological Office also reported no earthquake activity in the Hekla area in the past 48 hours.
translated_text: Det islandske meteorologiske kontor rapporterede også, at der ikke har været jordskælv i Hekla-området i de sidste 48 timer.

original_text: The significant earthquake activity resulting in the phase change had took place on March 10 on the northeast side of the volcano's summit caldera.
translated_text: Den betydelige jordskælvsaktivitet som resulterede i faseændringen havde fundet sted den 10. marts på den nordøstlige side af vulkanens topkaldera.

original_text: Dark clouds unrelated to any volcanic activity were reported at the base of the mountain.
translated_text: Der blev rapporteret mørke skyer uden tilknytning til vulkansk aktivitet ved bjergets fods.

original_text: The clouds presented the potential for confusion as to whether an actual eruption had taken place.
translated_text: Skyerne gav mulighed for forvirring i forhold til, om der var sket et reelt udbrud.

original_text: The Luno had 120–160 cubic metres of fuel aboard when it broke down and high winds and waves pushed it into the breakwater.
translated_text: Luno havde 120 160 kubikmeter brændstof ombord, da den brød ned, og stærke vinder og bølger skubbede den ind i brudvandet.

original_text: Helicopters rescued the twelve crewmembers and the only injury was a broken nose.
translated_text: Helikoptere reddede de tolv besætningsmedlemmer og den eneste skade var en brudt næse.

original_text: The 100-metre ship was en route to pick up its usual fertiliser cargo and initially officials feared the vessel could spill a load.
translated_text: Skibet på 100 meter var på vej til at hente sin sædvanlige gødningslast, og i begyndelsen frygtede embedsmændene, at skibet kunne spilde en last.

original_text: The proposed amendment already passed both houses in 2011.
translated_text: Det foreslåede ændringsforslag blev allerede vedtaget i begge huse i 2011.

original_text: A change was made this legislative session when the second sentence was deleted first by the House of Representatives and then was passed in a similar form by the Senate Monday.
translated_text: En ændring blev foretaget i denne lovgivende session, da den anden sætning først blev slettet af Repræsentanternes Hus og derefter blev vedtaget i en lignende form af Senatet mandag.

original_text: The failure of the second sentence, which proposes to ban same-sex civil unions, could possibly open the door for civil unions in the future.
translated_text: Hvis den anden sætning, der foreslår at forbyde homoseksuelle civilforeninger, mislykkes, kan det muligvis åbne døren for civilforeninger i fremtiden.

original_text: Following the process, HJR-3 will be reviewed again by the next elected legislature in either 2015 or 2016 to remain in process.
translated_text: Efter processen vil HJR-3 blive gennemgået igen af det næste valgte lovgivende organ enten i 2015 eller 2016 for at forblive i proces.

original_text: Vautier's achievements outside of directing include a hunger strike in 1973 against what he viewed as political censorship.
translated_text: Vautiers resultater uden for regissering omfatter en sultestrejke i 1973 mod hvad han betragtede som politisk censur.

original_text: French law was changed. His activism went back to age 15 when he joined the French Resistance during World War II.
translated_text: Hans aktivisme går tilbage til 15 år, da han sluttede sig til det franske modstand under Anden Verdenskrig.

original_text: He documented himself in a 1998 book.
translated_text: Han dokumenterede sig selv i en bog fra 1998.

original_text: In the 1960s he headed back to newly-independent Algeria to teach film directing.
translated_text: I 1960'erne vendte han tilbage til det nyligt uafhængige Algeriet for at undervise i filmregie.

original_text: Japanese judoka Hitoshi Saito, winner of two Olympic gold medals, has died at the age of 54.
translated_text: Den japanske judoka Hitoshi Saito, som vandt to olympiske guldmedaljer, er død i en alder af 54.

original_text: The cause of death was announced as intrahepatic bile duct cancer.
translated_text: Dødsorsaken blev annonceret som kræft i gallekanalen.

original_text: He died in Osaka on Tuesday.
translated_text: Han døde i Osaka tirsdag.

original_text: As well as a former Olympic and World champion, Saito was the All Japan Judo Federation training committee chairman at the time of his death.
translated_text: Som tidligere olympisk og verdensmester var Saito også formand for All Japan Judo Federation træningsudvalget på tidspunktet for sin død.

original_text: At least 100 people had attended the party, in order to celebrate the first anniversary of a couple whose wedding was held last year.
translated_text: Mindst 100 mennesker var til stede på festen for at fejre det første års jubilæum af et par, hvis bryllup blev afholdt sidste år.

original_text: A formal anniversary event was scheduled for a later date, officials said.
translated_text: Et officielt jubilæumsarrangement var planlagt til et senere tidspunkt, sagde embedsmændene.

original_text: The couple had married in Texas one year ago and came to Buffalo to celebrate with friends and relatives.
translated_text: Parret havde giftet sig i Texas for et år siden og kom til Buffalo for at fejre med venner og slægtninge.

original_text: The 30-year-old husband, who was born in Buffalo, was one of the four killed in the shooting, but his wife was not hurt.
translated_text: Den 30-årige mand, der blev født i Buffalo, var en af de fire dræbte i skyderiet, men hans kone blev ikke såret.

original_text: Karno is a well-known but controversial English tutor who taught under Modern Education and King's Glory who claimed to have 9,000 students at the peak of his career.
translated_text: Karno er en kendt, men kontroversiel engelskunderviser, der underviste under Modern Education og King's Glory, som hævdede at have 9.000 studerende på toppen af sin karriere.

original_text: In his notes he used words which some parents considered coarse, and he reportedly used profanity in class.
translated_text: I sine notater brugte han ord, som nogle forældre betragtede som grove, og han angiveligt brugte profani i klassen.

original_text: Modern Education accused him of printing large advertisements on buses without authorisation and lying by saying that he was the chief English tutor.
translated_text: Modern Education anklagede ham for at have trykt store reklamer på busser uden tilladelse og for at have løjet ved at sige at han var engelsklæreren.

original_text: He has also been accused previously of copyright infringement, but was not charged.
translated_text: Han er også tidligere blevet anklaget for overtrædelse af ophavsretten, men blev ikke anklaget.

original_text: A former student said that he 'used slang in class, taught dating skills in notes, and was just like the students' friend.'
translated_text: En tidligere elev sagde at han 'brugte slang i klassen, lærte dating færdigheder i notater og var ligesom elevernes ven'.

original_text: During the last three decades, despite officially remaining a communist state, China has developed a market economy.
translated_text: I løbet af de sidste tre årtier har Kina, på trods af at den stadig er en kommunistisk stat, udviklet en markedsøkonomi.

original_text: The first economic reforms were made under the leadership of Deng Xiaoping.
translated_text: De første økonomiske reformer blev foretaget under ledelse af Deng Xiaoping.

original_text: Since then, China's economic size has grown by 90 times.
translated_text: Siden da er Kinas økonomiske størrelse vokset 90 gange.

original_text: For the first time, last year China exported more cars than Germany and surpassed the United States as the biggest market for this industry.
translated_text: For første gang eksporterede Kina sidste år flere biler end Tyskland og overgik USA som det største marked for denne industri.

original_text: China's GDP could be larger than the United States within two decades.
translated_text: Kinas BNP kan være større end USA inden for to årtier.

original_text: Tropical Storm Danielle, fourth named storm of the 2010 Atlantic hurricane season, has formed in the eastern Atlantic Ocean.
translated_text: Tropisk storm Danielle, den fjerde navngivede storm i den atlantiske orkan sæson 2010, har dannet sig i det østlige Atlanterhavet.

original_text: The storm, located approximately 3,000 miles from Miami, Florida, has maximum sustained winds of 40 mph (64 kph).
translated_text: Stormen, der ligger ca. 3.000 miles fra Miami, Florida, har maksimal vedvarende vinde på 40 mph (64 km/t).

original_text: Scientists at the National Hurricane Center predict that Danielle will strengthen to a hurricane by Wednesday.
translated_text: Forskere ved National Hurricane Center forudser, at Danielle vil styrke sig til en orkan ved onsdag.

original_text: As the storm is far from landfall, it remains difficult to assess potential impact to the United States or Caribbean.
translated_text: Da stormen er langt fra land, er det stadig vanskeligt at vurdere den potentielle indvirkning på USA eller Caribien.

original_text: Born in the Croatian capital, Zagreb, Bobek gained fame while playing for Partizan Belgrade.
translated_text: Bobek blev født i den kroatiske hovedstad Zagreb, og fik berømmelse, mens han spillede for Partizan Belgrad.

original_text: He joined them in 1945 and stayed until 1958.
translated_text: Han sluttede sig til dem i 1945 og blev der indtil 1958.

original_text: During his time with the team, he scored 403 goals in 468 appearances.
translated_text: I løbet af sin tid med holdet scorede han 403 mål i 468 optrædener.

original_text: No one else has ever made more appearances or scored more goals for the club than Bobek.
translated_text: Ingen andre har nogensinde gjort flere optrædener eller scoret flere mål for klubben end Bobek.

original_text: In 1995 he was voted the best player in Partizan's history.
translated_text: I 1995 blev han valgt til den bedste spiller i Partizan historie.

original_text: The celebrations started with a special show by the world-renowned group Cirque du Soleil.
translated_text: Festen begyndte med et særligt show af den verdensberømte gruppe Cirque du Soleil.

original_text: It was followed by the Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra, a Janissary band, and the singers Fatih Erkoç and Müslüm Gürses.
translated_text: Det blev fulgt af Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra, et Janissary band, og sangerne Fatih Erkoç og Müslüm Gürses.

original_text: Then Whirling Dervishes took to the stage.
translated_text: Så tog Whirling Dervishes op på scenen.

original_text: Turkish diva Sezen Aksu performed with the Italian tenor Alessandro Safina and Greek singer Haris Alexiou.
translated_text: Den tyrkiske diva Sezen Aksu optrådte med den italienske tenor Alessandro Safina og den græske sanger Haris Alexiou.

original_text: To finish, Turkish dance group Fire of Anatolia performed the show "Troy".
translated_text: Til slut udførte den tyrkiske dansgruppe Fire of Anatolia showet "Troy".

original_text: Peter Lenz, a 13-year-old motorcycle racer, has died after being involved in a crash at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway.
translated_text: Peter Lenz, en 13-årig motorcykelridder, er død efter at have været involveret i en ulykke på Indianapolis Motor Speedway.

original_text: While on his warm-up lap, Lenz fell off his bike, and was then struck by fellow racer Xavier Zayat.
translated_text: Mens han var på sin opvarmningsrunde faldt Lenz fra sin cykel, og blev derefter ramt af kollega Xavier Zayat.

original_text: He was immediately attended to by the on-track medical staff and transported to a local hospital where he later died.
translated_text: Han blev straks behandlet af det medicinske personale på banen og transporteret til et lokalt hospital, hvor han senere døde.

original_text: Zayat was unhurt in the accident.
translated_text: Zayat var uskadt i ulykken.

original_text: Regarding the global financial situation, Zapatero continued by saying that "the financial system is a part of the economy, a crucial part.
translated_text: Med hensyn til den globale finansielle situation fortsatte Zapatero med at sige, at "det finansielle system er en del af økonomien, en afgørende del.

original_text: We have a year-long financial crisis, which has had its most acute moment in the past two months, and I think now the financial markets are beginning to recover."
translated_text: Vi har haft en års lang finanskris, som har haft sit mest akutte øjeblik i de sidste to måneder, og jeg tror nu, at finansmarkederne begynder at genoprette sig".

original_text: Last week, Naked News announced that it would dramatically increase its international language mandate to news reporting, with three new broadcasts.
translated_text: Sidste uge annoncerede Naked News, at den drastisk ville øge sit internationale sprogmandat til nyhedsrapportering, med tre nye udsendelser.

original_text: Already reporting in English and Japanese, the global organization is launching Spanish, Italian, and Korean-language programs, for television, the web, and mobile devices.
translated_text: Den globale organisation sender allerede rapporter på engelsk og japansk og lancerer programmer på spansk, italiensk og koreansk til fjernsyn, internettet og mobile enheder.

original_text: "Luckily nothing happened to me, but I saw a macabre scene, as people tried to break windows in order to get out.
translated_text: Heldigvis skete der ikke noget med mig, men jeg så et grusomt syn, hvor folk prøvede at bryde vinduer for at komme ud.

original_text: People were hitting the panes with chairs, but the windows were unbreakable.
translated_text: Folk ramte panele med stoler, men vinduerne var ubrydelige.

original_text: One of the panes finally broke, and they started to get out by the window," said survivor Franciszek Kowal.
translated_text: En af panerne brød til sidst, og de begyndte at komme ud ved vinduet, "sagde overlevende Franciszek Kowal.

original_text: Stars give off light and heat because of the energy made when hydrogen atoms are merged (or fused) together to form heavier elements.
translated_text: Stjerner udsender lys og varme på grund af den energi, der opstår, når hydrogenatomer føjes (eller smeltet) sammen til at danne tungere elementer.

original_text: Scientists are working to create a reactor that can make energy in the same way.
translated_text: Forskere arbejder på at skabe en reaktor der kan producere energi på samme måde.

original_text: This, however, is a very hard problem to solve and will take many years before we see useful fusion reactors built.
translated_text: Dette er imidlertid et meget vanskeligt problem at løse, og det vil tage mange år, før vi ser nyttige fusionsreaktorer bygget.

original_text: The steel needle floats on top of the water because of surface tension.
translated_text: Stålnålen flyver over vandet på grund af overfladenspænding.

original_text: Surface tension happens because the water molecules at the surface of the water are strongly attracted to each other more than they are to the air molecules above them.
translated_text: Overfladenspænding opstår fordi vandmolekylerne på vandets overflade er stærkt tiltrukket af hinanden mere end de er til luftmolekylerne over dem.

original_text: The water molecules make an invisible skin on the water’s surface that allows things like the needle to float on top of the water.
translated_text: Vandmolekylerne skaber en usynlig hud på vandets overflade, som gør det muligt for ting som nålen at flyde over vandet.

original_text: The blade on a modern ice skate has a double edge with a concave hollow between them. The two edges allow for a better grasp of the ice, even when tilted.
translated_text: Bladeet på et moderne isskate har en dobbelt kant med en konkav hul mellem dem. De to kanter giver en bedre greb af isen, selv når den er henhøjlet.

original_text: Because the bottom of the blade is slightly curved, as the blade tilts to one side or the other, the edge which is in contact with the ice also curves.
translated_text: Fordi bladesinden er lidt kurvet, når bladesiden hældes til den ene side eller den anden, er kanten, der er i kontakt med isen, også kurvet.

original_text: This causes the skater to turn. If the skates tilt to the right, the skater turns right, if the skates tilt to the left, the skater turns left.
translated_text: Hvis skaterne hænger til højre, hænger skaterne til højre, hvis skaterne hænger til venstre, hænger skaterne til venstre.

original_text: To return to their previous energy level, they must get rid of the extra energy they got from the light.
translated_text: For at vende tilbage til deres tidligere energiniveau, må de slippe af med den ekstra energi de fik fra lyset.

original_text: They do this by emitting a tiny particle of light called a "photon".
translated_text: De gør dette ved at udsende en lille lyspartikel kaldet et "foton".

original_text: Scientists call this process "stimulated emission of radiation" because the atoms are stimulated by the bright light, causing the emission of a photon of light, and light is a type of radiation.
translated_text: Forskere kalder denne proces "stimuleret udsendelse af stråling" fordi atomerne stimuleres af det skarpe lys, hvilket forårsager udsendelse af et lysfoton, og lys er en form for stråling.

original_text: The next picture shows the atoms emitting photons. Of course, in reality photons are a lot smaller than those in the picture.
translated_text: Det næste billede viser atomer, der udsender fotoner. I virkeligheden er fotoner selvfølgelig meget mindre end dem i billedet.

original_text: Photons are even smaller than the stuff that makes up atoms!
translated_text: Fotoner er endnu mindre end det stof der udgør atomer!

original_text: After hundreds of hours of operation the filament in the bulb eventually burns out and the light bulb no longer works.
translated_text: Efter hundredvis af timers drift brænder ledningen i pæren til sidst ud, og pæren virker ikke længere.

original_text: The light bulb then needs replacing. It is necessary to be careful in replacing the light bulb.
translated_text: Det er derfor nødvendigt at være forsigtig med at udskifte glødelampen.

original_text: First, the switch for the light fixture needs to be turned off or the cable disconnected.
translated_text: For det første er det nødvendigt at slukke for lyset eller afbryde kablen.

original_text: This is because electricity flowing into the socket where the metallic part of bulb sits can give you a severe electric shock if you touch the inside of the socket or the metal base of the bulb while it is still partly in the socket.
translated_text: Dette skyldes, at elektricitet, der strømmer ind i socketet, hvor den metalliske del af pærer sidder, kan give dig et alvorligt elektrisk chok, hvis du rører indvendigt i socketet eller metalbasen af pæren, mens den stadig er delvis i socketet.

original_text: The major organ of the circulatory system is the heart, which pumps the blood.
translated_text: Det vigtigste organ i blodcirkulationen er hjertet, som pumper blodet.

original_text: Blood goes away from the heart in tubes called arteries and comes back to the heart in tubes called veins. The smallest tubes are called capillaries.
translated_text: Blodet forsvinder fra hjertet i rør kaldet arterier og kommer tilbage til hjertet i rør kaldet vener.

original_text: A triceratops' teeth would have been able to crush not only leaves but even very tough branches and roots.
translated_text: En triceratops tænder ville have været i stand til at knuse ikke kun blade, men også meget hårde grene og rødder.

original_text: Some scientists think Triceratops ate cycads, which are a type of plant that was common in the Cretaceous.
translated_text: Nogle forskere tror Triceratops spiste cykader, som er en type plante der var almindelig i kredstiden.

original_text: These plants look like a small palm tree with a crown of sharp, spiky leaves.
translated_text: Disse planter ligner et lille palmbræ med en krone af skarpe, pikke blade.

original_text: A Triceratops could have used its strong beak to strip off the leaves before eating the trunk.
translated_text: En Triceratops kunne have brugt sin stærke pik til at fjerne bladene før de spiste stammen.

original_text: Other scientists argue that these plants are very poisonous so it is unlikely that any dinosaur ate them, even though today the sloth and other animals like the parrot (a descendant of the dinosaurs) can eat poisonous leaves or fruit.
translated_text: Andre forskere hævder, at disse planter er meget giftige, så det er usandsynligt, at nogen dinosaurer spiste dem, selv om sløv og andre dyr som papegiggen (en efterkommer af dinosaurerne) i dag kan spise giftige blade eller frugt.

original_text: How would Io's gravity pull on me? If you stood on the surface of Io, you would weigh less than you do on Earth.
translated_text: Hvis du stod på Io's overflade, ville du veje mindre end på Jorden.

original_text: A person who weighs 200 pounds (90kg) on Earth would weigh about 36 pounds (16kg) on Io. So the gravity, of course, pulls less on you.
translated_text: En person, der vejer 90 kg på Jorden, ville veje omkring 16 kg på Io. Så tyngdekraften trækker naturligvis mindre på dig.

original_text: The Sun doesn't have a crust like the Earth that you can stand on. The whole Sun is made out of gases, fire, and plasma.
translated_text: Solen har ikke en jordskorpe, som man kan stå på. Hele solen er lavet af gasser, ild og plasma.

original_text: The gas becomes thinner as you go farther from the center of the Sun.
translated_text: Gassen bliver tyndere efterhånden som man går længere væk fra solens centrum.

original_text: The outer-part we see when we look at the Sun is called the photosphere, which means "ball of light".
translated_text: Den ydre del vi ser når vi kigger på solen kaldes fotosfæren, hvilket betyder "lyskugle".

original_text: About three thousand years later, in 1610, Italian astronomer Galileo Galilei used a telescope to observe that Venus has phases, just as the moon does.
translated_text: Omkring tre tusind år senere, i 1610, brugte den italienske astronom Galileo Galilei et teleskop til at observere at Venus har faser ligesom månen.

original_text: Phases happen because only the side of Venus (or of the Moon) facing the Sun is lighted. The phases of Venus supported the theory of Copernicus that the planets go around the Sun.
translated_text: Venus' faser understøttede Copernicus' teori om at planeterne går rundt om solen.

original_text: Then, a few years later in 1639, an English astronomer named Jeremiah Horrocks observed a transit of Venus.
translated_text: Nogle år senere, i 1639, observerede en engelsk astronom ved navn Jeremiah Horrocks en transit af Venus.

original_text: England had experienced a long period of peace after the reconquest of the Danelaw.
translated_text: England havde oplevet en lang periode med fred efter at have generobret Danelaw.

original_text: However in 991 Ethelred was faced with a Viking fleet larger than any since Guthrum's a century earlier.
translated_text: Men i 991 blev Ethelred konfronteret med en vikingflåde større end nogen siden Guthrums et århundrede tidligere.

original_text: This fleet was led by Olaf Trygvasson, a Norwegian with ambitions to reclaim his country from Danish domination.
translated_text: Denne flåde blev ledet af Olaf Trygvasson, en norsk med ambitioner om at genvinde sit land fra dansk dominans.

original_text: After initial military setbacks, Ethelred was able to agree to terms with Olaf, who returned to Norway to try to gain his kingdom with mixed success.
translated_text: Efter de første militære nederlag, Ethelred var i stand til at acceptere aftaler med Olaf, som vendte tilbage til Norge for at forsøge at få sit kongerige med blandet succes.

original_text: Hangeul is the only purposely invented alphabet in popular daily use. The alphabet was invented in 1444 during the reign of King Sejong (1418 – 1450).
translated_text: Hangeul er det eneste bevidst opfundede alfabet i almindelig daglig brug. alfabetet blev opfundet i 1444 under kong Sejongs regeringstid (1418  1450).

original_text: King Sejong was the fourth king of the Joseon Dynasty and is one of the most highly regarded.
translated_text: Kong Sejong var den fjerde konge i Joseon-dynastiet og er en af de mest højt respekterede.

original_text: He originally named the Hangeul alphabet Hunmin Jeongeum, which means "the correct sounds for the instruction of the people".
translated_text: Han kaldte oprindeligt Hangeul-alfabetet Hunmin Jeongeum, hvilket betyder "de korrekte lyde til at undervise folket".

original_text: There are many theories to how Sanskrit came into existence. One of them is about an Aryan migration from the west into India who brought their language with them.
translated_text: Der er mange teorier om, hvordan sanskrit kom til eksistens. En af dem handler om en ariansk migration fra vesten til Indien, der bragte deres sprog med sig.

original_text: Sanskrit is an ancient language and is comparable to the Latin language spoken in Europe.
translated_text: Sanskrit er et gammelt sprog og kan sammenlignes med det latinske sprog der tales i Europa.

original_text: The earliest known book in the world was written in Sanskrit. After the compilation of Upanishads, Sanskrit just faded due to hierarchy.
translated_text: Den tidligste kendte bog i verden blev skrevet på sanskrit.

original_text: Sanskrit is a very complex and rich language, which has served to be the source for many modern Indian languages, just like Latin is the source for European languages like French and Spanish.
translated_text: Sanskrit er et meget komplekst og rigt sprog, som har været kilden til mange moderne indiske sprog, ligesom latin er kilden til europæiske sprog som fransk og spansk.

original_text: With the battle for France over, Germany began to get ready to invade the island of Britain.
translated_text: Da kampen for Frankrig var overstået, begyndte Tyskland at forberede sig på at invadere øen Storbritannien.

original_text: Germany code-named the attack “Operation Sealion”. Most of the British Army's heavy weapons and supplies had been lost when it evacuated from Dunkirk, so the army was fairly weak.
translated_text: Tyskland kaldte angrebet "Operation Sealion". De fleste af den britiske hærs tunge våben og forsyninger var gået tabt, da den evakuerede fra Dunkirk, så hæren var ret svag.

original_text: But the Royal Navy was still much stronger than the German Navy (“Kriegsmarine”) and could have destroyed any invasion fleet sent across the English Channel.
translated_text: Men Royal Navy var stadig meget stærkere end den tyske flåde (Kriegsmarine) og kunne have ødelagt enhver invasion flåde sendt over den engelske kanal.

original_text: However, very few Royal Navy ships were based near the likely invasion routes as the admirals were afraid they would be sunk by German air attack.
translated_text: Men meget få Royal Navy skibe var baseret nær de sandsynlige invasionsruter, da admiralerne var bange for at de ville blive synket af tysk luftangreb.

original_text: Let's start with an explanation about Italy's plans. Italy was mainly the "little brother" of Germany and Japan.
translated_text: Lad os begynde med en forklaring på Italiens planer. Italien var hovedsageligt Tysklands og Japans "småbror".

original_text: It had a weaker army and a weaker navy, although they had just built four new ships right before the beginning of the war.
translated_text: Den havde en svagere hær og en svagere flåde, selv om de lige havde bygget fire nye skibe lige før krigen begyndte.

original_text: Italy's main goals were African countries. To capture those countries, they would need to have a troop launching pad, so as troops could sail across the Mediterranean Sea and invade Africa.
translated_text: For at besejre disse lande skulle Italien have brug for en troppeafladning, så tropperne kunne sejle over Middelhavet og invadere Afrika.

original_text: For that, they had to get rid of British bases and ships in Egypt. Besides those actions, Italy's battleships were not supposed to do anything else.
translated_text: For at opnå dette var de nødt til at slippe af med de britiske baser og skibe i Egypten.

original_text: Now for Japan. Japan was an island country, just like Britain.
translated_text: Japan var et øland, ligesom Storbritannien.

original_text: Submarines are ships designed to travel underwater, and remain there for an extended amount of time.
translated_text: U-både er skibe designet til at rejse under vandet, og forbliver der i en længere periode.

original_text: Submarines were used in World War I and World War II. Back then they were very slow and had a very limited shooting range.
translated_text: U-både blev brugt i Første og Anden Verdenskrig.

original_text: In the beginning of the war they mostly travelled on top of the sea, but as radar began developing and becoming more accurate the submarines were forced to go under water to avoid being seen.
translated_text: I begyndelsen af krigen rejste de for det meste over havet, men da radarerne begyndte at udvikle sig og blive mere præcise, blev ubåderne tvunget til at gå under vandet for at undgå at blive set.

original_text: German submarines were called U-Boats. The Germans were very good at navigating and operating their submarines.
translated_text: Tyske ubåde blev kaldt U-både. Tyskerne var meget gode til at navigere og betjene deres ubåde.

original_text: Because of their success with submarines, after the war Germans aren't trusted to have many of them.
translated_text: På grund af deres succes med ubåde efter krigen har tyskerne ikke tillid til at have mange af dem.

original_text: Yes! King Tutankhamun, sometimes referred to as "King Tut" or "The Boy King", is one of the most well known ancient Egyptian kings in modern times.
translated_text: Kong Tutankhamon, som nogle gange kaldes "kong Tut" eller "den unge konge", er en af de mest kendte gamle egyptiske konger i moderne tid.

original_text: Interestingly, he was not considered to be very important in ancient times and was not recorded on most ancient king lists.
translated_text: Interessant nok blev han ikke betragtet som meget vigtig i antikken og blev ikke opført på de fleste gamle kongeliste.

original_text: However, the discovery of his tomb in 1922 made him a celebrity. While many tombs of the past were robbed, this tomb was left virtually undisturbed.
translated_text: Men efter at hans grav blev opdaget i 1922 blev han en berømt person.

original_text: Most of the items buried with Tutankhamun have been well preserved, including thousands of artefacts made from precious metals and rare stones.
translated_text: De fleste af de ting der er begravet sammen med Tutankhamun er bevaret godt, herunder tusindvis af artefakter lavet af ædelmetaller og sjældne sten.

original_text: The invention of spoke wheels made Assyrian chariots lighter, faster, and better prepared to outrun soldiers and other chariots.
translated_text: Ved opfindelsen af hjul gjorde de assyriske vogne lettere, hurtigere og bedre forberedt på at løbe foran soldater og andre vogne.

original_text: Arrows from their deadly crossbows could penetrate the armor of rival soldiers. About 1000 B.C., the Assyrians introduced the first cavalry.
translated_text: Pilen fra deres dødelige båge kunne trænge ind i rivaliserende soldaters rustning.

original_text: A cavalry is an army that fights on horseback. The saddle had not yet been invented, so the Assyrian cavalry fought on the bare backs of their horses.
translated_text: En hestevogn er en hær der kæmper på heste. Sædet var endnu ikke opfundet, så den assyriske hestevogn kæmpede bare på deres heste.

original_text: We know many Greek politicians, scientists, and artists. Possibly the most known person of this culture is Homer, the legendary blind poet, who composed two masterpieces of Greek literature: the poems Iliad and Odyssey.
translated_text: Vi kender mange græske politikere, videnskabsmænd og kunstnere, og måske den mest kendte person i denne kultur er Homer, den legendariske blinde digter, der komponerede to mesterværker i græsk litteratur: digterne Iliad og Odyssey.

original_text: Sophocles and Aristophanes are still popular playwrights and their plays are considered to be among the greatest works of world literature.
translated_text: Sophocles og Aristophanes er stadig populære dramatikere, og deres skuespil anses for at være blandt verdens største værker.

original_text: Another famous Greek is a mathematician Pythagoras, mostly known for his famous theorem about relations of the sides of right triangles.
translated_text: En anden berømt græker er en matematiker Pythagoras, mest kendt for sit berømte teoreme om forholdet mellem siderne af retre trekanter.

original_text: There are varying estimates for how many people speak Hindi. It is estimated to be between the second and fourth most commonly spoken language in the world.
translated_text: Der er forskellige skøn for hvor mange mennesker der taler hindi. Det anslås at være mellem det andet og fjerde mest talte sprog i verden.

original_text: The number of native speakers varies depending on whether or not very closely related dialects are counted.
translated_text: Antallet af indfødte talere varierer afhængigt af, om der tælles meget nært beslægtede dialekter.

original_text: Estimates range from 340 million to 500 million speakers, and as many as 800 million people can understand the language.
translated_text: Man anslår at der er mellem 340 millioner og 500 millioner talere, og at op til 800 millioner mennesker kan forstå sproget.

original_text: Hindi and Urdu are similar in vocabulary but different in script; in everyday conversations, speakers of both languages can usually understand each other.
translated_text: Hindi og Urdu er ligegyldige i ordforråd, men forskellige i skrift; i daglig samtale, kan talere af begge sprog normalt forstå hinanden.

original_text: Around the 15th century, northern Estonia was under great cultural influence of Germany.
translated_text: Omkring det 15. århundrede var det nordlige Estland under stor kulturel indflydelse fra Tyskland.

original_text: Some German monks wanted to bring God closer to the native people, so they invented the Estonian literal language.
translated_text: Nogle tyske munke ønskede at bringe Gud tættere på de indfødte, så de opfandt det estiske bogstavelige sprog.

original_text: It was based on the German alphabet and one character "Õ/õ" was added.
translated_text: Det var baseret på det tyske alfabet og ét tegn "Õ/õ" blev tilføjet.

original_text: As time passed, many words that were borrowed from German coalesced. This was the beginning of enlightenment.
translated_text: Efterhånden som tiden gik, blev mange ord, der låntes fra tysk, sammensat.

original_text: Traditionally, the heir to the throne would go straight into the military after finishing school.
translated_text: Traditionelt gik tronsæden direkte ind i militæret efter at have afsluttet skolen.

original_text: However, Charles went to university at Trinity College, Cambridge where he studied Anthropology and Archaeology, and later History, earning a 2:2 (a lower second class degree).
translated_text: Men Charles gik på universitetet på Trinity College i Cambridge, hvor han studerede antropologi og arkæologi, og senere historie, og tjente en 2: 2 (en lavere anden klasse grad).

original_text: Charles was the first member of the British Royal Family to be awarded a degree.
translated_text: Charles var det første medlem af den britiske kongelige familie til at blive tildelt en grad.

original_text: European Turkey (eastern Thrace or Rumelia in the Balkan peninsula) includes 3% of the country.
translated_text: Den europæiske Tyrkiet (østlige Thrakien eller Rumelia på Balkanhalvøen) omfatter 3% af landet.

original_text: The territory of Turkey is more than 1,600 kilometres (1,000 mi) long and 800 km (500 mi) wide, with a roughly rectangular shape.
translated_text: Tyrkiets territorium er mere end 1.600 kilometer lang og 800 km bred, med en omtrent rektangulær form.

original_text: Turkey's area, including lakes, occupies 783,562 square kilometres (300,948 sq mi), of which 755,688 square kilometres (291,773 sq mi) are in south west Asia and 23,764 square kilometres (9,174 sq mi) in Europe.
translated_text: Tyrkiets areal, herunder søer, besætter 783.562 kvadratkilometer (300.948 kvadrat miles), hvoraf 755.688 kvadratkilometer (291.773 kvadrat miles) er i sydvestlige Asien og 23.764 kvadratkilometer (9.174 kvadrat miles) i Europa.

original_text: Turkey's area makes it the world's 37th-largest country, and is about the size of Metropolitan France and the United Kingdom combined.
translated_text: Tyrkiets areal gør det til verdens 37. største land, og er omkring størrelsen på Metropolitan Frankrig og Det Forenede Kongerige tilsammen.

original_text: Turkey is encircled by seas on three sides: the Aegean Sea to the west, the Black Sea to the north and the Mediterranean Sea to the south.
translated_text: Tyrkiet er omringet af hav på tre sider: Ægeiske Hav i vest, Sorte Hav i nord og Middelhavet i syd.

original_text: Luxembourg has a long history but its independence dates from 1839.
translated_text: Luxembourg har en lang historie, men dets uafhængighed stammer fra 1839.

original_text: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
translated_text: De nuværende dele af Belgien var tidligere en del af Luxembourg, men blev belgiske efter den belgiske revolution i 1830'erne.

original_text: Luxembourg has always tried to remain a neutral country but it was occupied in both World War I and World War II by Germany.
translated_text: Luxembourg har altid forsøgt at forblive et neutralt land, men det blev besat i både Første og Anden Verdenskrig af Tyskland.

original_text: In 1957 Luxembourg became a founding member of the organization which is today known as the European Union.
translated_text: I 1957 blev Luxembourg grundlægger af den organisation, der i dag er kendt som Den Europæiske Union.

original_text: The Drukgyal Dzong is a ruined fortress and Buddhist monastery in the upper part of the Paro District (in Phondey Village).
translated_text: Drukgyal Dzong er en ruineret fæstning og buddhistisk kloster i den øvre del af Paro District (i Phondey Village).

original_text: It is said that in 1649, Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyel created the fortress to commemorate his victory against the Tibetan-Mongol forces.
translated_text: Det siges, at Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyel i 1649 oprettede fæstningen til at mindes sin sejr mod de tibetansk-mongole styrker.

original_text: In 1951, a fire caused for only some of the relics of the Drukgyal Dzong to remain, such as the image of Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyal.
translated_text: I 1951 forårsagede en brand at kun nogle af relikvierne af Drukgyal Dzong blev tilbage, såsom billedet af Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyal.

original_text: After the fire, the fortress was preserved and protected, remaining to be one of Bhutan's most sensational attractions.
translated_text: Efter branden blev fæstningen bevaret og beskyttet og blev en af Bhutans mest sensationelle attraktioner.

original_text: During the 18th century Cambodia found itself squeezed between two powerful neighbors, Thailand and Vietnam.
translated_text: I det 18. århundrede var Kambodsja klemt mellem to magtfulde naboer, Thailand og Vietnam.

original_text: The Thais invaded Cambodia several times in the 18th century and in 1772 they destroyed Phnom Phen.
translated_text: Thailænderne invaderede Kambodsja flere gange i det 18. århundrede, og i 1772 ødelagde de Phnom Phen.

original_text: In the last years of the 18th century the Vietnamese also invaded Cambodia.
translated_text: I de sidste år af det 18. århundrede invaderede vietnameserne også Kambodsja.

original_text: Eighteen percent of Venezuelans are unemployed, and most of those who are employed work in the informal economy.
translated_text: 18 procent af venezuelerne er arbejdsløse, og de fleste af dem der er beskæftiget arbejder i den uformelle økonomi.

original_text: Two thirds of Venezuelans who work do so in the service sector, nearly a quarter work in industry and a fifth work in agriculture.
translated_text: To tredjedele af de venezuelanere, der arbejder, arbejder i tjenesteydelsessektoren, næsten en fjerdedel arbejder i industrien og en femtedel i landbruget.

original_text: An important industry for Venezuelans is oil, where the country is a net exporter, even though only one percent work in the oil industry.
translated_text: En vigtig branche for venezuelanerne er olie, hvor landet er en nettoeksporter, selvom kun én procent arbejder i olieindustrien.

original_text: Early in the nation's independence, Singapore Botanic Gardens' expertise helped to transform the island into a tropical Garden City.
translated_text: I begyndelsen af landets uafhængighed hjalp Singapore Botanic Gardens ekspertise til at forvandle øen til en tropisk Garden City.

original_text: In 1981, Vanda Miss Joaquim, an orchid hybrid, was chosen as the nation's national flower.
translated_text: I 1981 blev Vanda Miss Joaquim, en orkidehybrid, valgt som landets nationale blomst.

original_text: Every year around October nearly 1.5 million herbivores travel towards the southern plains, crossing the Mara River, from the northern hills for the rains.
translated_text: Hvert år omkring oktober rejser næsten 1,5 millioner planteædende til de sydlige sletter, krydser Marafloden, fra de nordlige bakker for regnen.

original_text: And then back to the north through the west, once again crossing the Mara river, after the rains in around April.
translated_text: Og så tilbage mod nord gennem vest, igen krydser Marafloden, efter regnen i omkring april.

original_text: The Serengeti region contains the Serengeti National Park, the Ngorongoro Conservation Area and Maswa Game Reserve in Tanzania and the Maasai Mara National Reserve in Kenya.
translated_text: Serengeti-regionen indeholder Serengeti National Park, Ngorongoro Conservation Area og Maswa Game Reserve i Tanzania og Maasai Mara National Reserve i Kenya.

original_text: Learning to create interactive media requires conventional and traditional skills, as well as tools mastered in interactive classes (storyboarding, audio and video editing, story telling, etc.)
translated_text: At lære at skabe interaktive medier kræver konventionelle og traditionelle færdigheder samt værktøjer, der er dygtige i interaktive klasser (storyboarding, lyd- og videoredigering, fortælling osv.).

original_text: Interactive design requires that you re-assess your assumptions about media production and learn to think in a non-linear ways.
translated_text: Interaktivt design kræver, at du revurderer dine antagelser om medieproduktion og lærer at tænke på en ikke-lineær måde.

original_text: Interactive design requires that components of a project connect to each other, but also make sense as a separate entity.
translated_text: Interaktiv design kræver, at komponenterne i et projekt forbinder hinanden, men også giver mening som en separat enhed.

original_text: The disadvantage of zoom lenses is that the focal complexity and number of lens elements required to achieve a range of focal lengths is much greater than for prime lenses.
translated_text: Fordelen ved zoomlinser er, at fokuskompleksiteten og antallet af objektivelementer, der kræves for at opnå en række fokuslængder, er meget større end for hovedlinser.

original_text: This is becoming less of an issue as lens manufacturers achieve higher standards in lens production.
translated_text: Dette bliver mindre af et problem, da linsfabrikanterne når højere standarder i linsproduktionen.

original_text: This has allowed zoom lenses to produce pictures of a quality comparable to that achieved by lenses with fixed focal length.
translated_text: Dette har gjort det muligt for zoomlinser at producere billeder af en kvalitet sammenlignelig med den opnået ved linser med fast fokusvidde.

original_text: Another disadvantage of zoom lenses is that the maximum aperture (the speed) of the lens is usually lower.
translated_text: En anden ulempe ved zoomlinser er, at den maksimale åbning (hastigheden) af linsen normalt er lavere.

original_text: This makes inexpensive zoom lenses hard to use in low-light conditions without a flash.
translated_text: Dette gør billige zoomlinser vanskelige at bruge under lave lysforhold uden en blink.

original_text: One of the most common problems when trying to convert a movie to DVD format is the overscan.
translated_text: Et af de mest almindelige problemer, når man forsøger at konvertere en film til DVD-format, er overskanningen.

original_text: Most televisions are made in a way to please the general public.
translated_text: De fleste fjernsyn er lavet på en måde, der glæder offentligheden.

original_text: For that reason, everything you see on the TV had the borders cut, top, bottom and sides.
translated_text: Af den grund har alt, hvad du ser på tv, haft grænserne skåret, øverst, nederst og siderne.

original_text: This is made to ensure that the image covers the whole screen. That is called overscan.
translated_text: Dette gøres for at sikre, at billedet dækker hele skærmen.

original_text: Unfortunately, when you make a DVD, it's borders will most likely be cut too, and if the video had subtitles too close to the bottom, they won't be fully shown.
translated_text: Desværre, når du laver en DVD, vil dens grænser sandsynligvis også blive skåret, og hvis videoen havde undertekster for tæt på bunden, vil de ikke blive vist fuldt ud.

original_text: The traditional medieval castle has long inspired the imagination, conjuring up images of jousts, banquets and Arthurian chivalry.
translated_text: Det traditionelle middelaldersk slott har længe inspireret fantasien, idet det fremkalder billeder af jousts, banketter og arthurisk ridderlighed.

original_text: Even standing amidst thousand year-old ruins it is easy to bring to mind the sounds and smells of battles long gone, to almost hear the clatter of hooves on the cobbles and to smell the fear rising from the dungeon pits.
translated_text: Selv når man står midt i et tusind år gamle ruiner, kan man let huske lyden og lugten af slag, der er gået længe siden, næsten høre klumringen af hofter på stenstenene og lugte frygten fra dungeongrøderne.

original_text: But is our imagination based on reality? Why were castles built in the first place? How were they designed and built?
translated_text: Men er vores fantasi baseret på virkeligheden? Hvorfor blev slotte bygget i første omgang? Hvordan blev de designet og bygget?

original_text: Typical for the period, Kirby Muxloe Castle is more of a fortified house than a true castle.
translated_text: Typisk for perioden er Kirby Muxloe Castle mere et befæstet hus end et rigtigt slot.

original_text: Its large glazed windows and thin walls would not have been able to resist a determined attack for long.
translated_text: Dens store glasrede vinduer og tynde vægge ville ikke have været i stand til at modstå et bestemt angreb i lang tid.

original_text: In the 1480s, when its construction was begun by Lord Hastings, the country was relatively peaceful and defense was only required against small bands of roving marauders.
translated_text: I 1480'erne, da bygningen blev påbegyndt af Lord Hastings, var landet relativt fredeligt, og forsvaret var kun nødvendigt mod små bander vandrende røvere.

original_text: The balance of power was a system in which European nations sought to maintain the national sovereignty of all European states.
translated_text: Magtsbalancen var et system, hvor de europæiske nationer søgte at opretholde alle europæiske staters nationale suverænitet.

original_text: The concept was that all European nations had to seek to prevent one nation from becoming powerful, and thus national governments often changed their alliances in order to maintain the balance.
