original_text: Car camping is possible if you have a large minivan, SUV, Sedan or Station Wagon with seats that lay down.
translated_text: Bilcamping er muligt, hvis du har en stor minivan, SUV, Sedan eller Station Wagon med sæder, der ligger ned.

original_text: Some hotels have a heritage from the golden age of steam railways and ocean liners; before the Second World War, in the 19th or early 20th centuries.
translated_text: Nogle hoteller har en arv fra den gyldne tidsalder af dampjernbaner og havfartøjer; før Anden Verdenskrig, i det 19. eller begyndelsen af det 20. århundrede.

original_text: These hotels were where the rich and the famous of the day would stay, and often had fine dining and nightlife.
translated_text: Disse hoteller var steder hvor de rige og berømte på den tid boede, og de havde ofte smukke restauranter og et godt natligt liv.

original_text: The old fashioned fittings, the lack of the latest amenities, and a certain graceful agedness are also part of their character.
translated_text: De gammeldags anlæg, manglen på de nyeste bekvemmeligheder og en vis elegant alderdom er også en del af deres karakter.

original_text: While they are usually privately owned, they sometimes accommodate visiting heads of state and other dignitaries.
translated_text: De er som regel privat ejendom, men nogle gange kan de rumme statsoverhoveder og andre højtstående personer.

original_text: A traveller with piles of money might consider a round the world flight, broken up with stays in many of these hotels.
translated_text: En rejsende med masser af penge kan overveje at flyve rundt om i verden, hvis man ikke længere skal bo på mange af disse hoteller.

original_text: A hospitality exchange network is the organization that connects travelers with locals in the cities they are going to visit.
translated_text: Et gæstfrihedsudvekslingsnetværk er den organisation, der forbinder rejsende med lokalbefolkningen i de byer, de skal besøge.

original_text: Joining such a network usually just requires filling out an online form; although some networks offer or require additional verification.
translated_text: For at deltage i et sådant netværk kræves normalt blot at udfylde en online formular; selv om nogle netværk tilbyder eller kræver yderligere verifikation.

original_text: A listing of available hosts is then provided either in print and/or online, sometimes with references and reviews by other travelers.
translated_text: En liste over tilgængelige værter gives derefter enten i trykt og/eller online, nogle gange med referencer og anmeldelser fra andre rejsende.

original_text: Couchsurfing was founded in January 2004 after computer programmer Casey Fenton found a cheap flight to Iceland but did not have a place to stay.
translated_text: Couchsurfing blev grundlagt i januar 2004 efter at computerprogrammerende Casey Fenton fandt en billig flyvning til Island, men havde ikke et sted at bo.

original_text: He emailed students at the local university and received an overwhelming number of offers for free accommodation.
translated_text: Han sendte e-mails til studerende på det lokale universitet og modtog et overvældende antal tilbud om gratis ophold.

original_text: Hostels cater primarily to young people – a typical guest is in their twenties – but you can often find older travellers there too.
translated_text: Hostellerne er primært for unge  en typisk gæst er i deres tyve år  men du kan ofte finde ældre rejsende der også.

original_text: Families with children are a rare sight, but some hostels do allow them in private rooms.
translated_text: Familier med børn er sjældne at se, men nogle vandrerhuse tillader dem i private værelser.

original_text: The city of Beijing in China will be the host city of the Olympic Winter Games in 2022, which will make it the first city to have hosted both the summer and winter Olympics.
translated_text: Byen Beijing i Kina vil være værtsby for de Olympiske Vinterspil i 2022, hvilket vil gøre den til den første by at have vært for både sommer- og vinter-OL.

original_text: Beijing will host the opening and closing ceremonies and the indoor ice events.
translated_text: Beijing vil være vært for åbnings- og afslutningsceremonierne og de indendørs isbegivenheder.

original_text: Other skiing events will be at the Taizicheng ski area in Zhangjiakou, about 220 km (140 miles) from Beijing.
translated_text: Andre skidehistorier finder sted på Taizicheng-skiområdet i Zhangjiakou, ca. 220 km fra Beijing.

original_text: Most of the temples do have an Annual festival starting from November end to Mid of May, which varies according to each temple's annual calendar.
translated_text: De fleste templer har en årlig festival, der begynder i slutningen af november til midten af maj, hvilket varierer afhængigt af hvert temples årlige kalender.

original_text: Most of the temple festivals is celebrated as part of temple's anniversary or presiding deity's birthday or any other major event associated with the temple.
translated_text: De fleste tempelfestivaler fejres som en del af templets jubilæum eller guddommens fødselsdag eller enhver anden større begivenhed i forbindelse med templet.

original_text: Kerala's temple festivals are very interesting to see, with regular procession of decorated elephants, temple orchestra and other festivities.
translated_text: Keralas tempelfestivaler er meget interessante at se, med en regelmæssig procession af dekorerede elefanter, tempelorkester og andre festligheder.

original_text: A World's Fair (commonly called World Exposition, or simply Expo) is large international festival of arts and sciences.
translated_text: En World's Fair (commonly kaldet World Exposition, eller blot Expo) er en stor international kunst- og videnskabsfestival.

original_text: Participating countries present artistic and educational displays in national pavilions to showcase world issues or their country's culture and history.
translated_text: De deltagende lande præsenterer kunstneriske og uddannelsesmæssige udstillinger i nationale paviljonger for at vise verdensspørgsmål eller deres lands kultur og historie.

original_text: International Horticultural Expositions are specialised events which showcase floral displays, botanical gardens and anything else to do with plants.
translated_text: Internationale gartneriudstillinger er specialiserede arrangementer, der viser blomsterudstillinger, botaniske haver og alt andet, der har med planter at gøre.

original_text: Although in theory they can take place annually (so long as they are in different countries), in practice they are not.
translated_text: Selv om de i teorien kan finde sted årligt (så længe de er i forskellige lande), er de i praksis ikke.

original_text: These events normally last anywhere between three and six months, and are held on sites no smaller than 50 hectares.
translated_text: Disse arrangementer varer normalt mellem tre og seks måneder og finder sted på en areal på mindst 50 hektar.

original_text: There are many different film formats that have been used over the years. Standard 35 mm film (36 by 24 mm negative) is much the commonest.
translated_text: Der er mange forskellige filmformater, der er blevet brugt gennem årene. Standard 35 mm film (36 x 24 mm negativ) er meget den mest almindelige.

original_text: It can usually be replenished fairly easily if you run out, and gives resolution roughly comparable to a current DSLR.
translated_text: Det kan normalt genopfyldes temmelig let, hvis du løber ud, og giver en opløsning, der er omtrent sammenlignelig med et nuværende DSLR.

original_text: Some medium-format film cameras use a 6 by 6 cm format, more precisely a 56 by 56 mm negative.
translated_text: Nogle mediumformatfilmkameraer bruger et 6 x 6 cm format, mere præcist et 56 x 56 mm negativ.

original_text: This gives resolution almost four times that of a 35 mm negative (3136 mm2 versus 864).
translated_text: Dette giver en opløsning, der er næsten fire gange den af en 35 mm minus (3136 mm2 versus 864).

original_text: Wildlife is among the most challenging motifs for a photographer, and needs a combination of good luck, patience, experience and good equipment.
translated_text: Wildlife er et af de mest udfordrende motiver for en fotograf, og det kræver en kombination af held, tålmodighed, erfaring og godt udstyr.

original_text: Wildlife photography is often taken for granted, but like photography in general, a picture is worth a thousand words.
translated_text: Naturfotografering tages ofte for givet, men som fotografi generelt er et billede værd tusind ord.

original_text: Wildlife photography often requires a long telephoto lens, though things like a flock of birds or a tiny creature need other lenses.
translated_text: For at fotografere vildtlevende dyr er det ofte nødvendigt med et langt teleobjektiv, selv om ting som en flok fugle eller et lille væsen har brug for andre linser.

original_text: Many exotic animals are hard to find, and parks sometimes have rules about taking photographs for commercial purposes.
translated_text: Mange eksotiske dyr er svære at finde, og parker har nogle gange regler om at tage billeder til kommercielle formål.

original_text: Wild animals might either be shy or aggressive. The environment might be cold, hot, or otherwise hostile.
translated_text: De vilde dyr kan være flinke eller aggressive, men miljøet kan være koldt, varmt eller fjendtligt.

original_text: The world has over 5,000 different languages, including more than twenty with 50 million or more speakers.
translated_text: Verden har over 5.000 forskellige sprog, herunder mere end tyve med 50 millioner eller flere talere.

original_text: Written words are often easier to understand than spoken words, also. This is especially true of addresses, which are often difficult to pronounce intelligibly.
translated_text: Skrevne ord er ofte nemmere at forstå end talte ord, og det gælder især adresser, som ofte er vanskelige at udtale forståeligt.

original_text: Many entire nations are completely fluent in English, and in even more you can expect a limited knowledge - especially among younger people.
translated_text: Mange hele nationer taler helt flydende engelsk, og i endnu mere kan man forvente en begrænset viden - især blandt de yngre.

original_text: Imagine, if you will, a Mancunian, Bostonian, Jamaican and Sydneysider sitting around a table having dinner at a restaurant in Toronto.
translated_text: Forestil dig, hvis du vil, en Mancunian, Bostonian, Jamaican og Sydneysider sidder omkring et bord og spiser middag på en restaurant i Toronto.

original_text: They're regaling each other with stories from their hometowns, told in their distinct accents and local argot.
translated_text: De giver hinanden historier fra deres hjemby, fortalt i deres forskellige accenter og lokale argot.

original_text: Buying food in supermarkets is usually the cheapest way to get fed. Without cooking opportunities, choices are however limited to ready-made food.
translated_text: At købe mad i supermarkeder er normalt den billigste måde at få mad på.

original_text: Increasingly supermarkets are getting a more varied section of ready-made food. Some even provide a microwave oven or other means to heat food.
translated_text: I flere og flere supermarkeder er der flere og flere færdige madvarer, og nogle tilbyder endda en mikrobølgeovn eller andre midler til opvarmning af mad.

original_text: In some countries or types of stores there is at least one on-site restaurant, often a rather informal one with affordable prices.
translated_text: I nogle lande eller typer af butikker findes der mindst én restaurant på stedet, ofte en temmelig uformel restaurant med overkommelige priser.

original_text: Make and carry copies of your policy and your insurer's contact details with you.
translated_text: Tag kopier af forsikringen og forsikringsselskabets kontaktoplysninger med dig.

original_text: They need to show the insurer's e-mail address and international phone numbers for advice/authorizations and making claims.
translated_text: De skal vise forsikringsselskabets e-mailadresse og internationale telefonnumre til rådgivning/tilladelse og krav.

original_text: Have another copy in your luggage and online (e-mail to yourself with attachment, or stored in the "cloud").
translated_text: Hav en anden kopi i bagagen og på nettet (e-mail til dig selv med vedhæftet eller opbevar i "cloud").

original_text: If traveling with a laptop or tablet, store a copy in its memory or disc (accessible without the internet).
translated_text: Hvis du rejser med en bærbar computer eller tablet, skal du gemme en kopi på dennes hukommelse eller diske (tilgængelig uden internet).

original_text: Also give policy/contact copies to traveling companions and relatives or friends back home willing to help.
translated_text: Giv også politik/kontaktkopier til rejsende venner og slægtninge eller venner der er villige til at hjælpe.

original_text: Moose (also known as elk) aren't inherently aggressive, but will defend themselves if they perceive a threat.
translated_text: Moose (også kendt som elk) er ikke i sig selv aggressive, men vil forsvare sig selv, hvis de opfatter en trussel.

original_text: When people don't see moose as potentially dangerous, they may approach too closely and put themselves at risk.
translated_text: Når folk ikke ser alge som potentielt farligt, kan de komme for tæt på og sætte sig selv i fare.

original_text: Drink alcoholic drinks with moderation. Alcohol affects everyone differently, and knowing your limit is very important.
translated_text: Alcohol påvirker alle forskelligt, og det er meget vigtigt at man kender sin grænse.

original_text: Possible long term health events from excessive drinking can include liver damage and even blindness and death. The potential danger is increased when consuming illegally produced alcohol.
translated_text: De langvarige sundhedsmæssige hændelser som følge af overdreven drikke kan omfatte leverbeskadigelse og endda blindhed og død.

original_text: Illegal spirits can contain various dangerous impurities including methanol, which can cause blindness or death even in small doses.
translated_text: Illegal spiritus kan indeholde forskellige farlige urenheder, herunder methanol, som kan forårsage blindhed eller død selv i små doser.

original_text: Eyeglasses can be cheaper in a foreign country, especially in low-income countries where labour costs are lower.
translated_text: Briller kan være billigere i et fremmedland, især i lavindkomstlande, hvor arbejdskraftomkostningerne er lavere.

original_text: Consider getting an eye exam at home, especially if insurance covers it, and bringing the prescription along to be filed elsewhere.
translated_text: Tænk på at tage en øjenundersøgelse derhjemme, især hvis forsikringen dækker den, og tage receptet med til at arkivere et andet sted.

original_text: High-end brand-name frames available in such areas may have two problems; some may be knock-offs, and the real imported ones may be more expensive than at home.
translated_text: Der kan være to problemer med high-end-mærker, der findes på sådanne områder: nogle kan være overskydende, og de rigtige importprodukter kan være dyrere end hjemme.

original_text: Coffee is one of the world's most traded commodities, and you can probably find many types in your home region.
translated_text: Kaffe er en af verdens mest handlede varer, og du kan sandsynligvis finde mange typer i din hjemland.

original_text: Nevertheless, there are many distinctive ways of drinking coffee around the world that are worth experiencing.
translated_text: Men der er mange forskellige måder at drikke kaffe på i hele verden, som er værd at opleve.

original_text: Canyoning (or: canyoneering) is about going in a bottom of a canyon, which is either dry or full of water.
translated_text: Canyoning (eller: canyoneering) handler om at gå i bunden af en canyon, som enten er tør eller fuld af vand.

original_text: Canyoning combines elements from swimming, climbing and jumping--but requires relatively little training or physical shape to get started (compared to rock climbing, scuba diving or alpine skiing, for example).
translated_text: Canyoning kombinerer elementer fra svømning, klatring og hoppe - men kræver relativt lidt træning eller fysisk form for at komme i gang (i forhold til klippeklatring, dykning eller alpine ski, for eksempel).

original_text: Hiking is an outdoor activity which consists of walking in natural environments, often on hiking trails.
translated_text: Vandretur er en udendørs aktivitet, der består af at gå i naturlige omgivelser, ofte på vandreturer.

original_text: Day hiking involves distances of less than a mile up to longer distances that can be covered in a single day.
translated_text: Dagevandring indebærer afstande på mindre end en kilometer, men også længere afstande, der kan løbes på en enkelt dag.

original_text: For a day hike along an easy trail little preparations are needed, and any moderately fit person can enjoy them.
translated_text: For en dagstur langs en nem sti er der brug for små forberedelser, og enhver i moderat form kan nyde dem.

original_text: Families with small children may need more preparations, but a day outdoors is easily possible even with babies and pre-school children.
translated_text: Familier med små børn har måske brug for flere forberedelser, men en dag udendørs er let mulig selv med spædbørn og børn før skoletid.

original_text: Internationally, there are nearly 200 running tour organizations. Most of them operate independently.
translated_text: Internationalt er der næsten 200 turorganisationer, hvoraf de fleste er uafhængige.

original_text: The Global Running Tours successor, Go Running Tours networks dozens of sightrunning providers on four continents.
translated_text: Global Running Tours' efterfølger, Go Running Tours, har netværk af dusinvis af udbydere på fire kontinenter.

original_text: With roots in Barcelona's Running Tours Barcelona and Copenhagen's Running Copenhagen, it was quickly joined by Running Tours Prague based in Prague and others.
translated_text: Med rødder i Barcelonas Running Tours Barcelona og Københavns Running Copenhagen, blev det hurtigt tilsluttet af Running Tours Prague baseret i Prag og andre.

original_text: There are many things you have to take into consideration before and when you travel somewhere.
translated_text: Der er mange ting man skal overveje før og når man rejser et sted.

original_text: When you travel, expect things not to be like they are "back home". Manners, laws, food, traffic, lodging, standards, language and so on will to some extent differ from where you live.
translated_text: Når du rejser, skal du forvente at tingene ikke bliver som "hjemmefra". Adfærd, love, mad, trafik, opholdssted, standarder, sprog osv. vil til en vis grad være anderledes end hvor du bor.

original_text: This is something you always need to keep in mind, to avoid disappointment or perhaps even distaste over local ways to do things.
translated_text: Det er noget man altid skal huske på for at undgå skuffelse eller måske endda afsky for de lokale måder at gøre ting på.

original_text: Travel agencies have been around since the 19th century. A travel agent is usually a good option for a journey which extends beyond a traveller's previous experience of nature, culture, language or low-income countries.
translated_text: Reisebyråer har eksisteret siden det 19. århundrede. En rejsebyrå er normalt en god mulighed for en rejse, der strækker sig ud over en rejsendes tidligere erfaring med natur, kultur, sprog eller lavindkomstlande.

original_text: Although most agencies are willing to take on most regular bookings, many agents specialise in particular types of travel, budget ranges or destinations.
translated_text: Selv om de fleste agenturer er villige til at foretage de fleste regelmæssige reservationer, er mange agenter specialiseret i bestemte typer rejser, budgetområder eller destinationer.

original_text: It can be better to use an agent who frequently books similar trips to yours.
translated_text: Det kan være bedre at bruge en agent, der ofte bestiller lignende rejser som dine.

original_text: Take a look at what trips the agent is promoting, whether on a website or in a shop window.
translated_text: Se på, hvilke ture agenten markedsfører, enten på et websted eller i et vindue.

original_text: If you want to see the world on the cheap, for necessity, lifestyle or challenge, there are some ways to do that.
translated_text: Hvis du vil se verden billig, for nødvendighed, livsstil eller udfordring, er der nogle måder at gøre det på.

original_text: Basically, they fall into two categories: Either work while you travel or try and limit your expenses. This article is focused on the latter.
translated_text: De er i grunden inddelt i to kategorier: Enten arbejde mens du rejser eller forsøge at begrænse dine udgifter.

original_text: For those willing to sacrifice comfort, time and predictability to push expenses down close to zero, see minimum budget travel.
translated_text: For dem, der er villige til at ofre komfort, tid og forudsigelighed for at skubbe udgifterne ned til næsten nul, se minimumsbudgetrejs.

original_text: The advice assumes that travellers do not steal, trespass, participate in the illegal market, beg, or otherwise exploit other people for their own gain.
translated_text: I denne vejledning antages det at rejsende ikke stjæler, overtræder, deltager i ulovlige markeder, tigger eller på anden måde udnytter andre til egen gavn.

original_text: An immigration checkpoint is usually the first stop when disembarking from a plane, a ship, or another vehicle.
translated_text: Et indvandrerkontrolsted er normalt det første stoppested, når man stiger fra et fly, et skib eller et andet køretøj.

original_text: In some cross-border trains inspections are done on the running train and you should have valid ID with you when boarding one of those trains.
translated_text: I nogle grænseoverskridende tog foretages inspektioner på det løbende tog, og du skal have gyldig ID med dig, når du går ombord på et af disse tog.

original_text: On night sleeper trains, passports may be collected by the conductor so that you do not have your sleep interrupted.
translated_text: På natstogene kan passet blive indhentet af dirigenten, så du ikke bliver afbrudt af søvn.

original_text: Registration is an additional requirement for the visa process. In some countries, you must register your presence and address where you are staying with the local authorities.
translated_text: I nogle lande skal du registrere din tilstedeværelse og din adresse hos de lokale myndigheder.

original_text: This might require filling out a form with the local police or a visit to the immigration offices.
translated_text: Det kan kræve at du udfylder en formular hos den lokale politi eller besøger indvandringskontoret.

original_text: In many countries with such a law, local hotels will handle the registration (make sure to ask).
translated_text: I mange lande med en sådan lov håndterer lokale hoteller registreringen (gør dig sikker på at spørge).

original_text: In other cases, only those staying outside of tourist accommodations need to register.  However, this makes the law much more obscure, so find out beforehand.
translated_text: I andre tilfælde er det kun dem, der bor uden for turistboliger, der skal registrere sig.

original_text: Architecture is concerned with the design and construction of buildings. The architecture of a place is often a tourist attraction in its own right.
translated_text: Arkitektur beskæftiger sig med design og konstruktion af bygninger. Arkitektur af et sted er ofte en turistattraktion i sig selv.

original_text: Many buildings are quite beautiful to look at and the view from a tall building or from a cleverly-positioned window can be a beauty to behold.
translated_text: Mange bygninger er ganske smukke at se på, og udsigten fra en høj bygning eller fra et klogt placeret vindue kan være smukt at se på.

original_text: Architecture overlaps considerably with other fields including urban planning, civil engineering, decorative arts, interior design and landscape design.
translated_text: Arkitekturen overlapper betydeligt med andre områder, herunder byplanlægning, civilteknik, dekorative kunst, interiørdesign og landskabsdesign.

original_text: Given how remote many of the pueblos are, you won't be able to find a significant amount of nightlife without traveling to Albuquerque or Santa Fe.
translated_text: I betragtning af hvor fjernt de fleste pueblos er, vil du ikke være i stand til at finde en betydelig mængde af natlivet uden at rejse til Albuquerque eller Santa Fe.

original_text: However, nearly all of the casinos listed above serve drinks, and several of them bring in name-brand entertainment (primarily the large ones immediately surrounding Albuquerque and Santa Fe).
translated_text: Men næsten alle de casinoer, der er opført ovenfor, serverer drikkevarer, og flere af dem bringer navnebrand underholdning (primært de store, der umiddelbart omgiver Albuquerque og Santa Fe).

original_text: Beware: small-town bars here are not always good places for the out-of-state visitor to hang out.
translated_text: Pas på: Barer i småbyer her er ikke altid gode steder for en udenlandsk gæst at henge ud.

original_text: For one thing, northern New Mexico has significant problems with drunk driving, and the concentration of intoxicated drivers is high close to small-town bars.
translated_text: For det første har det nordlige New Mexico betydelige problemer med at køre beruset, og koncentrationen af berusede chauffører er høj i nærheden af småbybarer.

original_text: Unwanted murals or scribble is known as graffiti.
translated_text: Uønskede vægmalerier er kendt som graffiti.

original_text: While it's far from a modern phenomenon, most people probably associate it with youth vandalizing public and private property using spray paint.
translated_text: Selv om det er langt fra et moderne fænomen, forbinder de fleste det sandsynligvis med unge der vandaliserer offentlig og privat ejendom ved hjælp af sprayfarve.

original_text: However, nowadays there are established graffiti artists, graffiti events and "legal" walls. Graffiti paintings in this context often resemble artworks rather than illegible tags.
translated_text: I dag er der dog etablerede graffiti kunstnere, graffiti arrangementer og "legale" vægge.

original_text: Boomerang throwing is a popular skill that many tourists want to acquire.
translated_text: Boomerangkast er en populær færdighed, som mange turister ønsker at erhverve.

original_text: If you want to learn throwing a boomerang that comes back to your hand, make sure you have a suitable boomerang for returning.
translated_text: Hvis du vil lære at kaste en boomerang, der kommer tilbage til din hånd, sørg for at du har en passende boomerang til at vende tilbage.

original_text: Most boomerangs available in Australia are in fact non-returning. It is best for beginners to not try throwing in windy
translated_text: De fleste boomeranger, der findes i Australien, er faktisk ikke tilbagevendende.

original_text: A Hangi Meal is cooked in a hot pit in the ground.
translated_text: Et Hangi-måltid er tilberedt i en varm hul i jorden.

original_text: The pit is either heated with hot stones from a fire, or in some places geothermal heat makes areas of ground naturally hot.
translated_text: Gruden opvarmes enten med varme sten fra en brand, eller på nogle steder gør geotermisk varme områder af jorden naturligt varme.

original_text: The hangi is often used to cook a traditional roast style dinner.
translated_text: Hongien bruges ofte til at lave en traditionel stegt middag.

original_text: Several places in Rotorua offer geothermal hangi, while other hangi can be sampled in Christchurch, Wellington and elsewhere.
translated_text: Flere steder i Rotorua tilbyder geotermiske hangi, mens andre hangi kan prøves i Christchurch, Wellington og andre steder.

original_text: MetroRail has two classes on commuter trains in and around Cape Town: MetroPlus (also called First Class) and Metro (called Third Class).
translated_text: MetroRail har to klasser på pendeltog i og omkring Cape Town: MetroPlus (også kaldet Første Klasse) og Metro (kaldt Tredje Klasse).

original_text: MetroPlus is more comfortable and less crowded but slightly more expensive, though still cheaper than normal metro tickets in Europe.
translated_text: MetroPlus er mere behageligt og mindre overfyldt, men lidt dyrere, men stadig billigere end normale metrobilletter i Europa.

original_text: Every train has both MetroPlus and Metro coaches; the MetroPlus coaches are always on the end of the train nearest Cape Town.
translated_text: Hvert tog har både MetroPlus og Metro-busser; MetroPlus-busserne er altid på ende af toget nærmest Cape Town.

original_text: Carrying for others - Never let your bags out of your sight, especially when you are crossing international borders.
translated_text: At bære for andre - Lad aldrig dine tasker gå ud af synet, især når du krydser internationale grænser.

original_text: You could find yourself being used as a drug carrier without your knowledge, which will land you in a great deal of trouble.
translated_text: Du kan blive brugt til at transportere stoffer uden din viden, hvilket vil bringe dig i store problemer.

original_text: This includes waiting in line, as drug-sniffing dogs could be used at any time without notice.
translated_text: Dette omfatter at vente i kø, da hunder, der sniffer stoffer, kunne blive brugt til enhver tid uden varsel.

original_text: Some countries have exceedingly draconian punishments even for first time offenses; these can include prison sentences of over 10 years or death.
translated_text: Nogle lande har yderst strenge straffe, selv for første gang begået overtrædelser; disse kan omfatte fængselsstraffer på over 10 år eller dødsstraf.

original_text: Unattended bags are a target for theft and can also attract attention from authorities wary of bomb threats.
translated_text: Unattended tasker er et mål for tyveri og kan også tiltrække opmærksomheden fra myndigheder som er bange for bomber truer.

original_text: At home, due to this constant exposure to the local germs, odds are very high that you're already immune to them.
translated_text: Hjemme, på grund af denne konstante eksponering for de lokale bakterier, er chancerne meget høje for at du allerede er immun mod dem.

original_text: But in other parts of the world, where the bacteriological fauna are new to you, you're far more likely to run into problems.
translated_text: Men i andre dele af verden, hvor bakteriologiske dyr er nye for dig, er du meget mere tilbøjelig til at komme i problemer.

original_text: Also, in warmer climates bacteria both grow more quickly and survive longer outside the body.
translated_text: I varmere klimaer vokser bakterierne også hurtigere og lever længere uden for kroppen.

original_text: Thus the scourges of Delhi Belly, the Pharaoh's Curse, Montezuma's Revenge, and their many friends.
translated_text: Således de plager af Delhi Belly, Faraos forbandelse, Montezumas hævn og deres mange venner.

original_text: As with respiratory problems in colder climates, intestinal problems in hot climates are fairly common and in most cases are distinctly annoying but not really dangerous.
translated_text: Ligesom respiratoriske problemer i kaldere klimaer er tarmproblemer i varme klimaer ganske almindelige og i de fleste tilfælde tydeligt irriterende, men ikke særlig farlige.

original_text: If traveling in a developing country for the first time – or in a new part of the world – don't underestimate the potential culture shock.
translated_text: Hvis du rejser til et udviklingsland for første gang  eller til en ny del af verden  undervurder ikke det potentielle kulturchock.

original_text: Many a stable, capable traveler has been overcome by the newness of developing world travel, where many little cultural adjustments can add up quickly.
translated_text: Mange af de stabile, dygtige rejsende er blevet overvundet af den nye udvikling af verdensrejser, hvor mange små kulturelle tilpasninger hurtigt kan tilføjes.

original_text: Especially in your initial days, consider splurging on Western-style and -quality hotels, food, and services to help acclimatize.
translated_text: Især i de første dage kan du overveje at bruge penge på hoteller, mad og tjenester i vestlig stil.

original_text: Do not sleep on a mattress or pad on the ground in areas where you do not know the local fauna.
translated_text: Sov ikke på en madrasse eller på en pad på jorden i områder hvor du ikke kender den lokale fauna.

original_text: If you are going to camp out, bring a camp cot or hammock to keep you away from snakes, scorpions and such.
translated_text: Hvis du skal campere, skal du tage med en campingkæde eller en hængekæde for at holde dig væk fra slanger, skorpioner og lignende.

original_text: Fill your home with a rich coffee in the morning and some relaxing chamomile tea at night.
translated_text: Fyll dit hjem med en rig kaffe om morgenen og en afslappende kamillete om aftenen.

original_text: When you're on a staycation, you have the time to treat yourself and take a few extra minutes to brew up something special.
translated_text: Når du er på ferie, har du tid til at passe dig selv og tage et par ekstra minutter til at lave noget særligt.

original_text: If you're feeling more adventurous, take the opportunity to juice or blend up some smoothies:
translated_text: Hvis du føler dig mere eventyrlig, kan du bruge lejligheden til juice eller bland nogle smoothies:

original_text: maybe you'll discover a simple beverage that you can make for breakfast when you're back to your daily routine.
translated_text: Måske vil du opdage en simpel drink, som du kan lave til morgenmad, når du er tilbage til din daglige rutine.

original_text: If you live in a city with a varied drinking culture, go to bars or pubs in neighborhoods you don't frequent.
translated_text: Hvis du bor i en by med en varieret drikkekultur, skal du gå til barer eller pubs i nabolag du ikke ofte besøger.

original_text: For those unfamiliar with medical jargon, the words infectious and contagious have distinct meanings.
translated_text: For dem der ikke kender medicinsk jargon, har ordene smitsomme og smitsomme forskellige betydninger.

original_text: An infectious disease is one that is caused by a pathogen, such as a virus, bacterium, fungus or other parasites.
translated_text: En smitsom sygdom er en sygdom forårsaget af et patogen, f.eks. et virus, bakterier, svampe eller andre parasitter.

original_text: A contagious disease is a disease which is easily transmitted by being in the vicinity of an infected person.
translated_text: En smitsom sygdom er en sygdom, der let overføres ved at være i nærheden af en inficeret person.

original_text: Many governments require visitors entering, or residents leaving, their countries to be vaccinated for a range of diseases.
translated_text: Mange regeringer kræver, at besøgende, der kommer ind eller rejser fra deres land, skal vaccineres mod en række sygdomme.

original_text: These requirements may often depend on what countries a traveller has visited or intends to visit.
translated_text: Disse krav afhænger ofte af, hvilke lande en rejsende har besøgt eller har til hensigt at besøge.

original_text: One of strong points of Charlotte, North Carolina, is that it has an abundance of high-quality options for families.
translated_text: Et af de stærke punkter ved Charlotte i North Carolina er at der er masser af gode muligheder for familier.

original_text: Residents from other areas often cite family-friendliness as a primary reason for moving there, and visitors often find the city easy to enjoy with children around.
translated_text: Beboere fra andre områder nævner ofte familievenlighed som hovedårsagen til at flytte derhen, og besøgende finder det ofte nemt at nyde byen med børn omkring.

original_text: In the past 20 years, the amount of child-friendly options in Uptown Charlotte has grown exponentially.
translated_text: I de sidste 20 år er antallet af børnevenlige muligheder i Uptown Charlotte vokset eksponentielt.

original_text: Taxis are not generally used by families in Charlotte, though they can be of some use in certain circumstances.
translated_text: Taxier bruges generelt ikke af familier i Charlotte, selv om de kan være til nogen nytte under visse omstændigheder.

original_text: There is a surcharge for having more than 2 passengers, so this option might be more expensive than necessary.
translated_text: Der er et tillægsgebyr for mere end to passagerer, så denne mulighed kan være dyrere end nødvendigt.

original_text: Antarctica is the coldest place on Earth, and surrounds the South Pole.
translated_text: Antarktis er det koldeste sted på Jorden og omgiver Sydpolen.

original_text: Tourist visits are costly, demand physical fitness, can only take place in summer Nov-Feb, and are largely limited to the Peninsula, Islands and Ross Sea.
translated_text: Turisternes besøg er dyre, kræver fysisk fitness, kan kun finde sted om sommeren november-februar, og er i høj grad begrænset til halvøen, øerne og Rosshavet.

original_text: A couple of thousand staff live here in summer in some four dozen bases mostly in those areas; a small number stay over winter.
translated_text: Et par tusind ansatte bor her om sommeren i ca. fire dusin baser hovedsageligt i disse områder; et lille antal bliver over vinteren.

original_text: Inland Antarctica is a desolate plateau covered by 2-3 km of ice.
translated_text: Inland Antarktis er et øde plateau dækket af 2-3 km is.

original_text: Occasional specialist air tours go inland, for mountaineering or to reach the Pole, which has a large base.
translated_text: Af og til går specialiserede flyturer ind i landet, til bjergbestigning eller til at nå Polen, som har en stor base.

original_text: The South Pole Traverse (or Highway) is a 1600 km trail from McMurdo Station on the Ross Sea to the Pole.
translated_text: South Pole Traverse (eller Highway) er en 1600 km vej fra McMurdo Station på Rosshavet til Pole.

original_text: It's compacted snow with crevasses filled in and marked by flags. It can only be traveled by specialized tractors, hauling sleds with fuel and supplies.
translated_text: Det er trykt sne med sprækker fyldt og markeret med flag. Det kan kun transporteres af specialiserede traktorer, der slæber med brændstof og forsyninger.

original_text: These aren't very nimble so the trail has to take a long swerve around the Transantarctic Mountains to come onto the plateau.
translated_text: De er ikke meget fleksible, så sporet skal gå langt rundt i Transantarktiske bjerge for at komme op på plateauet.

original_text: The most common cause for accidents in winter is slippery roads, pavements (sidewalks) and especially steps.
translated_text: Den mest almindelige årsag til ulykker om vinteren er glatte veje, gangbaner og især trapper.

original_text: At a minimum, you need footwear with suitable soles. Summer shoes are usually very slippery on ice and snow, even some winter boots are deficient.
translated_text: Sommerskoene er som regel meget glatte på is og sne, selv nogle vinterstøvler mangler.

original_text: The pattern should be deep enough, 5 mm (1/5 inch) or more, and the material soft enough in cold temperatures.
translated_text: Mønstret skal være dybt nok, 5 mm eller mere, og materialet skal være blødt nok ved kolde temperaturer.

original_text: Some boots have studs and there is studded add-on equipment for slippery conditions, suitable for most shoes and boots, for the heels or heels and sole.
translated_text: Nogle støvler har støvler, og der er supplerende udstyr til glatte forhold, der passer til de fleste sko og støvler, til hælen eller hælen og solen.

original_text: Heels should be low and wide. Sand, gravel or salt (calcium chloride) is often scattered on roads or paths to improve traction.
translated_text: Sand, grus eller salt (kalciumklorid) spredes ofte på veje eller stier for at forbedre trækningen.

original_text: Avalanches are not an abnormality; steep slopes can hold only so much slow, and the excess volumes will come down as avalanches.
translated_text: Avalancher er ikke noget ualmindeligt; stejle skråninger kan kun holde meget langsomt, og de overskydende mængder vil falde ned som laviner.

original_text: The problem is that snow is sticky, so it needs some triggering to come down, and some snow coming down can be the triggering event for the rest.
translated_text: Problemet er, at sne er klæbisk, så det har brug for noget udløser for at komme ned, og en smule sne, der kommer ned, kan være udløser begivenheden for resten.

original_text: Sometimes the original trigging event is the sun warming the snow, sometimes some more snowfall, sometimes other natural events, often a human.
translated_text: Nogle gange er den oprindelige udløser begivenhed solen opvarmer sneen, nogle gange nogle flere snefald, nogle gange andre naturlige begivenheder, ofte et menneske.

original_text: A tornado is a spinning column of very low-pressure air, which sucks the surrounding air inward and upward.
translated_text: En tornado er en spinnende kolonne med meget lavt tryk luft, som suger den omgivende luft indad og opad.

original_text: They generate high winds (often 100-200 miles/hour) and can lift heavy objects into the air, carrying them as the tornado moves.
translated_text: De producerer stærke vinder (ofte 100-200 miles / time) og kan løfte tunge genstande op i luften og bære dem som tornaden bevæger sig.

original_text: They begin as funnels descending from storm clouds, and become "tornadoes" when they touch the ground.
translated_text: De begynder som tråde ned fra stormskyer og bliver til "tornadoer", når de rører jorden.

original_text: Personal VPN (virtual private network) providers are an excellent way of circumventing both political censorship and commercial IP-geofiltering.
translated_text: Personlige VPN-udbydere (virtuelt privat netværk) er en fremragende måde at omgå både politisk censur og kommerciel IP-geofiltering på.

original_text: They are superior to web proxies for several reasons: They re-route all Internet traffic, not only http.
translated_text: De er bedre end web proxies af flere grunde: De omdirigerer al internettrafik, ikke kun http.

original_text: They normally offer higher bandwidth and better quality of service. They are encrypted and thus harder to spy on.
translated_text: De tilbyder normalt større båndbredde og bedre servicekvalitet. De er krypteret og er derfor sværere at spionere på.

original_text: The media companies routinely lie about the purpose of this, claiming that it is to "prevent piracy".
translated_text: Mediavirksomhederne lyver rutinemæssigt om formålet med dette, idet de hævder at det er "at forhindre piratkopiering".

original_text: In fact, region codes have absolutely no effect on illegal copying; a bit-for-bit copy of a disk will play just fine on any device where the original will.
translated_text: Faktisk har regionkoder absolut ingen virkning på ulovlig kopiering; en bit for bit kopi af en disk vil spille helt fint på enhver enhed hvor den oprindelige vil.

original_text: The actual purpose is to give those companies more control over their markets; it's all about money spinning.
translated_text: Det virkelige formål er at give disse virksomheder mere kontrol over deres markeder; det handler om at spinde penge.

original_text: Because calls are routed over the Internet, you do not need to use a phone company located where you live or where you travel.
translated_text: Fordi man sender opkald via internettet, behøver man ikke at bruge et telefonfirma der bor i din bydel eller hvor man rejser.

original_text: There is also no requirement that you obtain a local number from the community in which you live; you can obtain a satellite Internet connection in the wilds of Chicken, Alaska and select a number which claims you're in sunny Arizona.
translated_text: Der er heller ikke krav om, at du får et lokalt nummer fra det samfund, hvor du bor; du kan få en satellit-internetforbindelse i vildmarken i Chicken, Alaska og vælge et nummer, der hævder, at du er i solrigt Arizona.

original_text: Often, you have to buy a global number separately that allows PSTN phones to call you. Where the number is from makes a difference for people calling you.
translated_text: Ofte skal du købe et globalt nummer separat, som giver PSTN-telefoner mulighed for at ringe til dig. Hvor nummeret kommer fra, gør en forskel for folk, der ringer til dig.

original_text: Real-time text translator apps – applications that are capable of automatically translating whole segments of text from one language into another.
translated_text: Real-time tekstoversætter apps  applikationer, der er i stand til automatisk at oversætte hele tekstsegmenter fra et sprog til et andet.

original_text: Some of the applications in this category can even translate texts in foreign languages on signs or other objects in the real world when the user points the smartphone towards those objects.
translated_text: Nogle af applikationerne i denne kategori kan endda oversætte tekster på fremmedsprog på tegn eller andre objekter i den virkelige verden, når brugeren peger smarttelefonen mod disse objekter.

original_text: The translation engines have improved dramatically, and now often give more or less correct translations (and more seldom gibberish), but some care is due, as they still may have gotten it all wrong.
translated_text: Oversættelsesmaskinerne har forbedret sig dramatisk, og nu giver de ofte mere eller mindre korrekte oversættelser (og sjældnere gibberish), men der er behov for en vis omhu, da de stadig kan have fået det helt forkert.

original_text: One of the most prominent apps in this category is Google Translate, which allows offline translation after downloading the desired language data.
translated_text: En af de mest fremtrædende apps i denne kategori er Google Translate, som tillader offline oversættelse efter at have downloadet de ønskede sprogdata.

original_text: Using GPS navigation apps on your smartphone can be the easiest and most convenient way to navigate when out of your home country.
translated_text: Brug af GPS-navigationsapps på din smartphone kan være den nemmeste og mest bekvemme måde at navigere på, når du er ude af dit hjemland.

original_text: It can save money over buying new maps for a GPS, or a standalone GPS device or renting one from a car rental company.
translated_text: Det kan spare penge på at købe nye kort til en GPS, eller en selvstændig GPS-enhed eller leje en fra et biludlejningsfirma.

original_text: If you don't have a data connection for your phone, or when it is out of range, their performance can be limited or unavailable.
translated_text: Hvis du ikke har en dataforbindelse til din telefon, eller når den er ude af rækkevidde, kan deres ydeevne være begrænset eller utilgængelig.

original_text: Every corner store is filled with a confusing array of pre-paid phone cards that can be used from pay phones or ordinary telephones.
translated_text: Hver hjørne butik er fyldt med et forvirrende udvalg af forudbetalte telefonkort, som kan bruges fra betalende telefoner eller almindelige telefoner.

original_text: While most cards are good for calling anywhere, some specialise in providing favourable call rates to specific groups of countries.
translated_text: Mens de fleste kort er gode til at ringe hvor som helst, specialiserer nogle sig i at give gunstige opkaldsrater til bestemte grupper af lande.

original_text: Access to these services is often through a toll-free telephone number that can be called from most phones without charge.
translated_text: Tilgang til disse tjenester er ofte via et gratis telefonnummer, som man kan ringe fra de fleste telefoner uden at betale.

original_text: Rules regarding regular photography also apply to video recording, possibly even more so.
translated_text: Reglerne om regelmæssig fotografering gælder også for videooptagelse, måske endnu mere.

original_text: If just taking a photo of something isn't allowed, then you shouldn't even think of recording a video of it.
translated_text: Hvis bare at tage et billede af noget ikke er tilladt, så bør du ikke engang tænke på at optage en video af det.

original_text: If using a drone, check well in advance as to what you are allowed to film and what permits or additional licensing are required.
translated_text: Hvis du bruger en drone, skal du tjekke godt i forvejen, hvad du er tilladt at filme, og hvilke tilladelser eller yderligere licenser der kræves.

original_text: Flying a drone near an airport or over a crowd is almost always a bad idea, even if it's not illegal in your area.
translated_text: At flyve en drone i nærheden af en lufthavn eller over en skare er næsten altid en dårlig idé, selv om det ikke er ulovligt i dit område.

original_text: Nowadays air travel is only rarely booked directly through the airline without first searching and comparing prices.
translated_text: I dag bliver flyrejser kun sjældent bestilt direkte via flyselskabet uden først at søge og sammenligne priser.

original_text: Sometimes the same flight can have vastly differing prices at various agregators and it pays to compare search results and to also look at the website of the airline itself before booking.
translated_text: Nogle gange kan den samme flyvning have meget forskellige priser på forskellige aggregatorer, og det betaler sig at sammenligne søgeresultater og også at se på selve flyselskabets hjemmeside før booking.

original_text: While you may not need a visa for short visits to certain countries as a tourist or for business, going there as an international student generally requires a longer stay than going there just as a casual tourist.
translated_text: Selv om man måske ikke har brug for visum til kortvarige besøg i visse lande som turist eller for forretnings skyld, kræver det at man som international studerende tager derhen i almindelighed et længere ophold end at man tager derhen som en almindelig turist.

original_text: In general, staying in any foreign country for an extended period of time will require you to obtain a visa in advance.
translated_text: Generelt vil det være nødvendigt at indhente et visum på forhånd for at bo i et fremmed land i længere tid.

original_text: Student visas generally have different requirements and application procedures from normal tourist or business visas.
translated_text: Studentvisumerne har generelt forskellige krav og ansøgningsprocedurer end almindelige turist- eller erhvervsvisum.

original_text: For most countries, you will need an offer letter from the institution you wish to study at, and also evidence of funds to support yourself for at least the first year of your course.
translated_text: I de fleste lande vil du have brug for et tilbudsbrev fra den institution, du ønsker at studere på, samt bevis for midler til at forsørge dig selv i mindst det første år af dit kursus.

original_text: Check with the institution, as well as the immigration department for the country you wish to study in for detailed requirements.
translated_text: Spørg instituttet og indvandringsafdelingen for det land, du ønsker at studere i for at få nærmere oplysninger.

original_text: Unless you are a diplomat, working overseas generally means that you will have to file income tax in the country you are based in.
translated_text: Hvis du ikke er diplomat, betyder det at arbejde i udlandet generelt, at du skal indgive indkomstskat i det land, du er bosat i.

original_text: Income tax is structured differently in different countries, and the tax rates and brackets vary widely from one country to another.
translated_text: Indkomstskatten er struktureret forskelligt i forskellige lande, og skattesatserne varierer meget fra land til land.

original_text: In some federal countries, such as the United States and Canada, income tax is levied both at the federal level and at the local level, so the rates and brackets can vary from region to region.
translated_text: I nogle føderale lande, som f.eks. USA og Canada, opkræves indkomstskat både på føderalt og lokalt plan, så priserne kan variere fra region til region.

original_text: While immigration check is usually absent or a formality when you arrive in your homeland, customs control can be a hassle.
translated_text: Selv om indvandringskontrollen normalt er fraværende eller en formalitet når du ankommer til dit hjemland, kan toldkontrol være en besvær.

original_text: Make sure you know what you can and cannot bring in and declare anything over the legal limits.
translated_text: Sørg for, at du ved, hvad du kan og ikke kan medbringe og erklære noget over de lovlige grænser.

original_text: The easiest way to get started in the business of travel writing is to hone your skills on an established travel blog website.
translated_text: Den nemmeste måde at komme i gang med at skrive om rejser på er at uddybe dine færdigheder på et etableret rejseblog-websted.

original_text: After you become comfortable with formatting and editing on the web, then later, you might create your own website.
translated_text: Når du er blevet behagelig med at formatere og redigere på nettet, kan du senere oprette din egen hjemmeside.

original_text: Volunteering while travelling is a great way to make a difference but it's not just about giving.
translated_text: Frivilligt arbejde under rejser er en god måde at gøre en forskel på, men det handler ikke kun om at give.

original_text: Living and volunteering in a foreign country is a great way to get to know a different culture, meet new people, learn about yourself, get a sense of perspective and even gain new skills.
translated_text: At bo og frivilligt arbejde i et fremmedland er en fantastisk måde at lære en anden kultur at kende, møde nye mennesker, lære om dig selv, få et syn på perspektivet og endda få nye færdigheder på.

original_text: It can also be a good way to stretch a budget to allow a longer stay somewhere since many volunteer jobs provide room and board and a few pay a small salary.
translated_text: Det kan også være en god måde at strække et budget på for at tillade et længere ophold et sted, da mange frivillige job giver plads og mad, og nogle få betaler en lille løn.

original_text: Vikings used the Russian waterways to get to the Black Sea and Caspian Sea. Parts of these routes can still be used. Check possible need for special permits, which may be difficult to get.
translated_text: Vikingerne brugte de russiske vandveje til at komme til Sortehavet og Kaspiskhavet.

original_text: The White Sea–Baltic Canal connects the Arctic Ocean to the Baltic Sea, via Lake Onega, Lake Ladoga and Saint Petersburg, mostly by rivers and lakes.
translated_text: Det Hvide HavBaltikkanal forbinder Arktis med Østersøen via Onega-øen, Ladoga-øen og Sankt Petersborg, hovedsageligt ved floder og søer.

original_text: Lake Onega is also connected to Volga, so coming from the Caspian Sea through Russia is still possible.
translated_text: Onegaøen er også forbundet med Volga, så det er stadig muligt at komme fra Kaspiske Hav gennem Rusland.

original_text: Be assured that once you hit the marinas everything will be pretty obvious. You will meet other boat hitchhikers and they will share their information with you.
translated_text: Du kan være sikker på, at når du er kommet til havnene, vil alt være tydeligt, og du vil møde andre bådstogere, som vil dele deres oplysninger med dig.

original_text: Basically you'll be putting up notices offering your help, pacing the docks, approaching people cleaning their yachts, trying to make contact with sailors in the bar, etc.
translated_text: I bund og grund vil du sætte op advarsler, der tilbyder din hjælp, gå på havnene, nærme dig folk, der renser deres yachts, forsøge at få kontakt med søfolk i baren, osv.

original_text: Try to talk to as many people as possible. After a while everyone will know you and will give you hints as to which boat is looking for someone.
translated_text: Prøv at tale med så mange mennesker som muligt.

original_text: You should choose your Frequent Flyer airline in an alliance carefully.
translated_text: Du bør vælge din Frequent Flyer flyselskab i en alliance omhyggeligt.

original_text: Although you may think it is intuitive to join the airline you fly most, you should be aware that privileges offered are often different and frequent flyer points may be more generous under a different airline in the same alliance.
translated_text: Selv om du måske synes, at det er intuitivt at slutte dig til det flyselskab, du flyver mest til, bør du være opmærksom på, at de privilegier, der tilbydes, ofte er forskellige, og hyppige flyvepunkter kan være mere generøse under en anden flyselskab i samme alliance.

original_text: Airlines such as Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways & Turkish Airlines have greatly expanded their services to Africa, and offer connections to many major African cities at competitive rates than other European airlines.
translated_text: Flyselskaber som Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways og Turkish Airlines har i høj grad udvidet deres tjenester til Afrika og tilbyder forbindelser til mange store afrikanske byer til konkurrencedygtige priser end andre europæiske flyselskaber.

original_text: Turkish Airlines flies to 39 destinations in 30 African countries as of 2014.
translated_text: Turkish Airlines flyver til 39 destinationer i 30 afrikanske lande fra 2014.

original_text: If you have additional travel time, check to see how your total fare quote to Africa compares with a round-the-world fare.
translated_text: Hvis du har ekstra tid til at rejse, skal du se hvordan din samlede billetpris til Afrika sammenlignes med en billetpris over hele verden.

original_text: Don't forget to add in the extra costs of additional visas, departure taxes, ground transportation, etc. for all those places outside of Africa.
translated_text: Glem ikke at tilføje de ekstra omkostninger ved yderligere visum, afgangsafgifter, jordtransport osv. til alle de steder uden for Afrika.

original_text: If you want to fly around the world completely in the Southern Hemisphere, the choice of flights and destinations is limited due to the lack of transoceanic routes.
translated_text: Hvis man ønsker at flyve rundt i verden helt og holdent i den sydlige halvkugle, er valget af fly og destinationer begrænset på grund af manglen på transoceanske ruter.

original_text: No airline alliance covers all three ocean crossings in the Southern Hemisphere (and SkyTeam covers none of the crossings).
translated_text: Ingen luftfartsalliance dækker alle tre havovergange i den sydlige halvkugle (og SkyTeam dækker ingen af de overgange).

original_text: However, Star Alliance covers everything except the eastern South Pacific from Santiago de Chile to Tahiti, which is a LATAM Oneworld flight.
translated_text: Men Star Alliance dækker alt undtagen det østlige sydlige Stillehavet fra Santiago de Chile til Tahiti, som er en LATAM Oneworld flyvning.

original_text: This flight is not the only option if you want to skip the South Pacific and the west coast of South America. (see below)
translated_text: Denne flyvning er ikke den eneste mulighed, hvis du ønsker at hoppe over Sydstillehavsområdet og Sydamerikas vestkyst. (Se nedenfor)

original_text: In 1994, the ethnically Armenian Nagorno-Karabakh region of Azerbaijan waged war against the Azeris.
translated_text: I 1994 indledte den etnisk armenske del af Nagorno-Karabakh-regionen i Aserbajdsjan en krig mod azereerne.

original_text: With Armenian backing, a new republic was created. However, no established nation - not even Armenia - officially recognizes it.
translated_text: Med armensk støtte blev der oprettet en ny republik, men ingen etableret nation - ikke engang Armenien - anerkender den officielt.

original_text: Diplomatic arguments over the region continue to mar relations between Armenia and Azerbaijan.
translated_text: Diplomatiske argumenter om regionen fortsætter med at ødelægge forbindelserne mellem Armenien og Aserbajdsjan.

original_text: The Canal District (Dutch: Grachtengordel) is the famous 17th-century district surrounding the Binnenstad of Amsterdam.
translated_text: Canal District (hollandsk: Grachtengordel) er det berømte 17. århundrede distrikt omkring Binnenstad i Amsterdam.

original_text: The whole district is designated as a UNESCO World Heritage Site for its unique cultural and historical value, and its property values are among the highest of the country.
translated_text: Hele distriktet er udpeget som et UNESCO verdensarvsted for sin unikke kulturelle og historiske værdi, og dens ejendomsværdier er blandt de højeste i landet.

original_text: Cinque Terre, which means Five Lands, comprises the five small coastal villages of Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza and Monterosso located in the Italian region of Liguria.
translated_text: Cinque Terre, som betyder fem lande, omfatter de fem små kystbyer Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza og Monterosso i den italienske region Liguria.

original_text: They are listed on the UNESCO World Heritage List.
translated_text: De er opført på UNESCO's verdensarvsliste.

original_text: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
translated_text: I løbet af århundrederne har folk omhyggeligt bygget terrasser på det robuste, stejle landskab helt op til klipperne med udsigt over havet.

original_text: Part of its charm is the lack of visible corporate development. Paths, trains and boats connect the villages, and cars cannot reach them from the outside.
translated_text: En del af dens charme er manglen på synlig virksomhedsudvikling. Veje, tog og både forbinder landsbyerne, og biler kan ikke nå dem udefra.

original_text: The varieties of French which are spoken in Belgium and Switzerland differ slightly from the French spoken in France, though they are similar enough to be mutually intelligible.
translated_text: De franske varianter, der tales i Belgien og Schweiz, adskiller sig lidt fra de franske, der tales i Frankrig, selv om de er ens nok til at være gensidigt forståelige.

original_text: In particular, the numbering system in French-speaking Belgium and Switzerland has some slight peculiarities that are different from the French spoken in France, and the pronunciation of some words is slightly different.
translated_text: I særdeleshed har nummereringssystemet i fransktalende Belgien og Schweiz nogle små særtræk, der adskiller sig fra det franske sprog, der tales i Frankrig, og udtalelsen af nogle ord er lidt anderledes.

original_text: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
translated_text: Ikke desto mindre ville alle fransktalende belgere og sveitsere have lært standardfransk i skolen, så de ville være i stand til at forstå dig selv hvis du brugte standardfransk nummerering.

original_text: In many parts of the world, waving is a friendly gesture, indicating "hello."
translated_text: I mange dele af verden er det en venlig gestus at vinge "hej".

original_text: However, in Malaysia, at least among the Malays in rural areas, it means "come over," similar to the index finger bent toward the body, a gesture which is used in certain Western countries, and should be used only for that purpose.
translated_text: Men i Malaysia, i hvert fald blandt malayerne i landdistrikterne, betyder det "kom over", ligesom pegfingeren bøjer sig mod kroppen, en gestus, der anvendes i visse vestlige lande, og bør kun bruges til det formål.

original_text: Similarly, a British traveller in Spain may mistake a wave goodbye involving the palm facing the waver (rather than the person being waved at) as a gesture to come back.
translated_text: På samme måde kan en britisk rejsende i Spanien forveksle en bølgende farvel med en håndflame mod bølgen (i stedet for den person man bølger på) med et gestus om at vende tilbage.

original_text: Auxiliary languages are artificial or constructed languages created with the intent of facilitating communication between peoples who would otherwise have difficulty communicating.
translated_text: Hjælpssprog er kunstige eller konstruerede sprog, der er skabt med det formål at lette kommunikationen mellem folk, der ellers ville have svært ved at kommunikere.

original_text: They are separate from lingua francas, which are natural or organic languages that become dominant for one reason or another as means of communication between speakers of other languages.
translated_text: De er adskilt fra lingua francas, som er naturlige eller organiske sprog, der af en eller anden grund bliver dominerende som kommunikationsmidler mellem talere af andre sprog.

original_text: In the heat of the day, travelers can experience mirages that give the illusion of water (or other things).
translated_text: I den varme dag kan rejsende opleve spøgelser der giver en illusion om vand (eller andre ting).

original_text: These can be dangerous if the traveler pursue the mirage, wasting precious energy and remaining water.
translated_text: Disse kan være farlige hvis den rejsende forfølger miragen og sløser kostbar energi og resterende vand.

original_text: Even the hottest of deserts can become extremely cold at night. Hypothermia is a real risk without warm clothing.
translated_text: Selv de varmeste ørkener kan blive ekstremt kolde om natten.

original_text: In summer, especially, you'll need to watch out for mosquitoes if you decide to hike through the rainforest.
translated_text: Især om sommeren skal man passe på myggene, hvis man skal vandre i regnskoven.

original_text: Even if you're driving through the subtropical rainforest, a few seconds with the doors open while you get inside the vehicle is enough time for mosquitoes to get in the vehicle with you.
translated_text: Selv hvis du kører gennem den subtropiske regnskov, er et par sekunder med dørene åbne mens du kommer ind i bilen nok tid til myggene at komme ind i bilen med dig.

original_text: Bird flu, or more formally avian influenza, can infect both birds and mammals.
translated_text: Fugleinfluenza, eller mere formelt fugleinfluenza, kan smitte både fugle og pattedyr.

original_text: Fewer than a thousand cases have ever been reported in humans, but some of them have been fatal.
translated_text: Mindre end tusind tilfælde er nogensinde blevet rapporteret hos mennesker, men nogle af dem har været dødelige.

original_text: Most have involved people who work with poultry, but there is also some risk to birdwatchers.
translated_text: De fleste har involveret mennesker, der arbejder med fjerkræ, men der er også en vis risiko for fuglevogere.

original_text: Typical for Norway are steep fjords and valleys that suddenly give way to a high, more or less even plateau.
translated_text: Typisk for Norge er stejle fjorde og dale, der pludselig giver plads til en høj, mere eller mindre lige plateau.

original_text: These plateaus are often referred to as "vidde" meaning a wide, open treeless space, a boundless expanse.
translated_text: Disse platæer kaldes ofte "vidde", hvilket betyder et bredt, åbent træløst rum, et ubegrænset område.

original_text: In Rogaland and Agder they are usually called "hei" meaning a treeless moorland often covered in heather.
translated_text: I Rogaland og Agder kaldes de normalt "hei", hvilket betyder et træløst moorland ofte dækket af heder.

original_text: The glaciers are not stable, but flow down the mountain. This will cause cracks, crevasses, which may be obscured by snow bridges.
translated_text: Gletsjarerne er ikke stabile, men de strømmer ned ad bjerget, hvilket vil forårsage sprækker, sprækker, som kan blive dækket af snebroer.

original_text: The walls and roofs of ice caves can collapse and cracks can get closed.
translated_text: Gletskehulens vægge og tag kan kollapse, og sprækker kan blive lukket.

original_text: At the edge of glaciers huge blocks break loose, fall down and perhaps jump or roll farther from the edge.
translated_text: Ved kanten af gletsjer bryder store blokke løs, falder ned og måske hopper eller ruller længere væk fra kanten.

original_text: The tourist season for the hill stations generally peaks during the Indian summer.
translated_text: Turistsæsonen for bjergstationer er generelt højdepunkt i den indiske sommer.

original_text: However, they have a different kind of beauty and charm during winter, with many hill stations receiving healthy amounts of snow and offering activities such as skiing and snowboarding.
translated_text: De har dog en anden form for skønhed og charme om vinteren, hvor mange bjergstationer modtager sunde mængder sne og tilbyder aktiviteter som ski og snowboard.

original_text: Only a few airlines still offer bereavement fares, which slightly discount the cost of last-minute funeral travel.
translated_text: Kun nogle få flyselskaber tilbyder stadig farer for dødsfald, hvilket lidt rabatter udgifterne til sidste øjebliks begravelsesrejse.

original_text: Airlines that offer these include Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa for flights originating from the U.S. or Canada, and WestJet.
translated_text: Luftfartsselskaber, der tilbyder disse, omfatter Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa for flyvninger med oprindelse i USA eller Canada og WestJet.

original_text: In all cases, you must book by phone directly with the airline.
translated_text: I alle tilfælde skal du bestille via telefon direkte hos flyselskabet.

original_text: On Monday, scientists from the Stanford University School of Medicine announced the invention of a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type: a tiny printable chip that can be manufactured using standard inkjet printers for possibly about one U.S. cent each.
translated_text: Op maandag kondigden wetenschappers van de Stanford University School of Medicine de uitvinding aan van een nieuw diagnostisch hulpmiddel dat cellen per type kan sorteren: een kleine afdrukbare chip die kan worden vervaardigd met behulp van standaard inkjetprinters voor mogelijk ongeveer een Amerikaanse cent elk.

original_text: Lead researchers say this may bring early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria to patients in low-income countries, where the survival rates for illnesses such as breast cancer can be half those of richer countries.
translated_text: Vooraanstaande onderzoekers zeggen dat dit kan leiden tot vroege opsporing van kanker, tuberculose, HIV en malaria bij patiënten in landen met een laag inkomen, waar de overlevingscijfers voor ziekten zoals borstkanker de helft kunnen zijn van die van rijkere landen.

original_text: The JAS 39C Gripen crashed onto a runway at around 9:30 am local time (0230 UTC) and exploded, closing the airport to commercial flights.
translated_text: De JAS 39C Gripen crashte rond 9:30 uur lokale tijd (0230 UTC) op een landingsbaan en explodeerde, waardoor het vliegveld werd afgesloten voor commerciële vluchten.

original_text: The pilot was identified as Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee.
translated_text: De piloot werd geïdentificeerd als Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee.

original_text: Local media reports an airport fire vehicle rolled over while responding.
translated_text: Plaatselijke media berichten dat een brandweervoertuig van het vliegveld omgedraaid is tijdens het reageren.

original_text: 28-year-old Vidal had joined Barça three seasons ago, from Sevilla.
translated_text: De 28-jarige Vidal kwam drie seizoenen geleden bij Barça, vanuit Sevilla.

original_text: Since moving to the Catalan-capital, Vidal had played 49 games for the club.
translated_text: Sinds hij naar de Catalaanse hoofdstad verhuisde, had Vidal 49 wedstrijden voor de club gespeeld.

original_text: The protest started around 11:00 local time (UTC+1) on Whitehall opposite the police-guarded entrance to Downing Street, the Prime Minister's official residence.
translated_text: Het protest begon rond 11:00 uur lokale tijd (UTC+1) op Whitehall tegenover de door de politie bewaakte ingang van Downing Street, de officiële residentie van de premier.

original_text: Just after 11:00, protesters blocked traffic on the northbound carriage in Whitehall.
translated_text: Net na 11:00 uur blokkeerden demonstranten het verkeer op de wagen naar het noorden in Whitehall.

original_text: At 11:20, the police asked the protesters to move back on to the pavement, stating that they needed to balance the right to protest with the traffic building up.
translated_text: Om 11.20 uur vroeg de politie de demonstranten om terug te gaan naar het trottoir en ze zeiden dat ze het recht om te protesteren moesten in evenwicht brengen met het toenemende verkeer.

original_text: Around 11:29, the protest moved up Whitehall, past Trafalgar Square, along the Strand, passing by Aldwych and up Kingsway towards Holborn where the Conservative Party were holding their Spring Forum in the Grand Connaught Rooms hotel.
translated_text: Rond 11.29 uur verhuisde het protest naar Whitehall, voorbij Trafalgar Square, langs de Strand, langs Aldwych en op Kingsway richting Holborn waar de Conservatieve Partij hun Spring Forum hield in het Grand Connaught Rooms hotel.

original_text: Nadal's head to head record against the Canadian is 7–2.
translated_text: Nadal's head-to-head record tegen de Canadees is 72.

original_text: He recently lost against Raonic in the Brisbane Open.
translated_text: Hij verloor onlangs tegen Raonic in de Brisbane Open.

original_text: Nadal bagged 88% net points in the match winning 76 points in the first serve.
translated_text: Nadal scoorde 88% netto punten in de wedstrijd en won 76 punten in de eerste serve.

original_text: After the match, King of Clay said, "I am just excited about being back in the final rounds of the most important events. I am here to try to win this."
translated_text: Na de wedstrijd zei King of Clay: "Ik ben gewoon opgewonden om terug te zijn in de laatste ronden van de belangrijkste evenementen. Ik ben hier om te proberen dit te winnen".

original_text: "Panama Papers" is an umbrella term for roughly ten million documents from Panamanian law firm Mossack Fonseca, leaked to the press in spring 2016.
translated_text: "Panama Papers" is een omvattende term voor ongeveer tien miljoen documenten van het Panamaanse advocatenkantoor Mossack Fonseca, die in het voorjaar van 2016 in de pers lekken.

original_text: The documents showed fourteen banks helped wealthy clients hide billions of US dollars of wealth to avoid taxes and other regulations.
translated_text: De documenten toonden aan dat veertien banken rijke klanten hielpen om miljarden Amerikaanse dollars rijkdom te verbergen om belastingen en andere regelgeving te vermijden.

original_text: British newspaper The Guardian suggested Deutsche Bank controlled roughly a third of the 1200 shell companies used to accomplish this.
translated_text: De Britse krant The Guardian suggereerde dat Deutsche Bank ongeveer een derde van de 1200 shellbedrijven beheerde die hiervoor gebruik maakten.

original_text: There were protests worldwide, several criminal prosecutions, and the leaders of the governments of Iceland and Pakistan both resigned.
translated_text: Er waren wereldwijde protesten, verschillende strafrechtelijke vervolging, en de leiders van de regeringen van IJsland en Pakistan trokken beide af.

original_text: Born in Hong Kong, Ma studied at New York University and Harvard Law School and once held an American permanent resident "green card".
translated_text: Geboren in Hong Kong, studeerde Ma aan de Universiteit van New York en de Harvard Law School en had ooit een Amerikaanse permanente verblijfplaats "groene kaart".

original_text: Hsieh implied during the election that Ma might flee the country during a time of crisis.
translated_text: Hsieh impliceerde tijdens de verkiezingen dat Ma het land zou kunnen vluchten in een tijd van crisis.

original_text: Hsieh also argued that the photogenic Ma was more style than substance.
translated_text: Hsieh betoogde ook dat de fotogene Ma meer stijl dan stof was.

original_text: Despite these accusations, Ma won handily on a platform advocating closer ties with the Chinese mainland.
translated_text: Ondanks deze beschuldigingen won Ma gemakkelijk op een platform dat voorstander was van nauwere banden met het Chinese vasteland.

original_text: Today's Player of the Day is Alex Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals.
translated_text: De speler van de dag is Alex Ovechkin van de Washington Capitals.

original_text: He had 2 goals and 2 assists in Washington's 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers.
translated_text: Hij had 2 doelpunten en 2 assists in Washington's 5-3 overwinning op de Atlanta Thrashers.

original_text: Ovechkin's first assist of the night was on the game-winning goal by rookie Nicklas Backstrom;
translated_text: Ovechkin's eerste assist van de avond was op het game-winnende doel van rookie Nicklas Backstrom;

original_text: his second goal of the night was his 60th of the season, becoming the first player to score 60 or more goals in a season since 1995-96, when Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux each reached that milestone.
translated_text: zijn tweede doelpunt van de nacht was zijn 60ste van het seizoen, het wordt de eerste speler die 60 of meer doelen in een seizoen sinds 1995-96, toen Jaromir Jagr en Mario Lemieux elk bereikte die mijlpaal.

original_text: Batten was ranked 190th on the 2008 400 Richest Americans list with an estimated fortune of $2.3 billion.
translated_text: Batten stond op de 190e plaats op de lijst van de rijkste 400 Amerikanen in 2008 met een geschatte fortuin van 2,3 miljard dollar.

original_text: He graduated from the College of Arts & Sciences of the University of Virginia in 1950 and was a significant donor to that institution.
translated_text: Hij studeerde af aan het College of Arts & Sciences van de Universiteit van Virginia in 1950 en was een belangrijke donor voor die instelling.

original_text: Iraq's Abu Ghraib prison has been set alight during a riot.
translated_text: De Iraakse gevangenis Abu Ghraib is in brand gestoken tijdens een opstand.

original_text: The jail became notorious after prisoner abuse was discovered there after US forces took over.
translated_text: De gevangenis werd berucht nadat er misbruik van gevangenen werd ontdekt nadat de Amerikaanse troepen het overnamen.

original_text: Piquet Jr. crashed in the 2008 Singapore Grand Prix just after an early pit stop for Fernando Alonso, bringing out the safety car.
translated_text: Piquet Jr. crashte in de Grand Prix van Singapore in 2008 vlak na een vroege pitstop voor Fernando Alonso.

original_text: As the cars ahead of Alonso went in for fuel under the safety car, he moved up the pack to take victory.
translated_text: Terwijl de auto's voor Alonso brandstof kregen onder de veiligheidswagen, stapte hij om de overwinning te behalen.

original_text: Piquet Jr. was sacked after the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.
translated_text: Piquet Jr. werd ontslagen na de Grand Prix van Hongarije in 2009.

original_text: At exactly 8:46 a.m. a hush fell across the city, marking the exact moment the first jet struck its target.
